en: DP Ruto finally shares event with President Uhuru
luo: Jalup Ker Ruto nobedo e nyasi achiel kod Ker Uhuru bang' kinde malach.

en: After a lengthy absence from functions presided over by President Uhuru Kenyatta, Deputy President William Ruto has finally showed up for one - the national prayer breakfast'.
luo: Jalup Ker, William Ruto  mosebedo kabare e nyasi mag Ker Uhuru Kenyatta kuom kinde mogwaro ne oriwore kode e Lamo mar Kwayo Kuwe ne Piny.
mt0: 'After a long absence from functions presided over by President Uhuru Kenyatta, Deputy President William Ruto has finally showed up for one - the national prayer breakfast'.

en: Ruto is attending the May 27 prayer breakfast event at Parliament Buildings among a host of other national leaders.
luo: Nyasino timore Mei tarik 27 e Od Piny Owacho, kendo Ruto oriwore gi jotelo mag sirkal mamoko kuno.
mt0: Ruto is attending the May 27 prayer breakfast event at Parliament Buildings among a host of other national leaders.

en: This is the third time this year the two are attending the same event after the burial of former Cabinet Minister Simeon Nyachae on February 15 and a Cabinet meeting 10 days later.
luo: Ma en kinde mar adek ma jotelo ariyogo obedo e nyasi achiel  higani. Mokwongo ne gin kanyachiel  Februar 15 e iik mar Simeon Nyachae, ma chon ne en achiel kuom Jotend Tij Sirkal, to mar ariyo ne en e chokruok  moro mar  Jotend Tij Sirkal ma ne otim ndalo 10 bang' iikno.

en: Prayer Organising Committee Co-chair Dan Maanzo on Tuesday while confirming Ruto’s attendance downplayed the frosty relationship between the President and his deputy, adding that the event provided an opportunity for leaders to reconcile.
luo: Chieng' Tich Ariyo, Dan Maanzo, ma  en jakony jakom mar Komiti Machano Lamo, ne olando ni Ruto ne nie nyasino, kata kamano ne oreyo wach ng'ich mosegabedo e kind jotelo ariyogo kowacho ni Lamono ne dhi miyo jotelogo thuolo mar loso weche e kindgi.
mt0: Prayer Organising Committee Co-chair Dan Maanzo on Tuesday while confirming Ruto’s attendance downplayed the frosty relationship between the President and his deputy, adding that the event provided an opportunity for leaders to reconcile.

en: “We hope that the prayers will provide a platform for "the leaders to reach out to each other and reconcile,” said the Makueni MP.
luo: Jabunge ma Makueni ne owacho niya: “Wageno ni lamogi biro miyo jotelogi thuolo mar loso winjruok e kindgi.”
mt0: "We hope that the prayers will provide a platform for "the leaders to reach out to each other and reconcile," said the Makueni MP.

en: On February 5, the DP skipped the ceremony to commemorate the first anniversary of the death of former President Daniel Toroitich arap Moi despite his name being on the programme.
luo: Ruto ne obare e rapar mokwongo mar Ker Daniel Toroitich arap Moi ma ne itimo Februar 5. Ne otimo kamano kata obedo ni ne omiye migawo moro e chenrono.
mt0: February 5, the DP skipped the ceremony to commemorate the first anniversary of the death of former President Daniel Toroitich arap Moi despite his name being on the programme.

en: Their fallout was amplified in the months of March and April when Ruto skipped various Covid-19 addresses by President Kenyatta.
luo: Ruto ne obare ding'eny e dweche mag Mach gi  April kane Ker Kenyatta wuoyo gi oganda e wi wach Korona, kendo mano ne omiyo onenore ayanga ni winjruok e kind jotelo ariyogo ok ber.
mt0: They've had a sharp fallout in the months of March and April when Ruto skipped various Covid-19 addresses by President Kenyatta.

en: On May 4, Ruto skipped the reception of Tanzania’s President Samia Suluhu at State House, Nairobi, with his aides saying he was not invited.
luo: Mei tarik 4, Ruto ne obare kane irwako Ker mar piny Tanzania Samia Suluhu  e Od Piny Owacho, Nairobi, askeche maritoga Ruto ne owacho ni ne ok ogwel Ruto e nyasino.
mt0: Ruto aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay

en: Emmanuel Tallam, the Communications Director at the DP’s Office, told the media that Ruto followed the televised proceedings from his Karen Residence Office.
luo: Emmanuel Tallam, ma en Jatelo Mochung' ne Weche mag Tudruok  e ofis mar jalup ker, ne onyiso joland weche ni Ruto ne oluwo weche ma ne timore e nyasino ka en e ofise manie dalane ma Karen.
mt0: Emmanuel Tallam, the Communications Director at the DP's Office, told the media that Ruto followed the televised proceedings from his Karen Residence Office.

en: Ruto also skipped this year’s Labour Day celebrations at State House, Nairobi which was attended by Cotu boss Francis Atwoli and Labour Cabinet Secretary Simon Chelugui.
luo: Bende, Ruto ne obare e nyasi mar  Odiechieng Jotich ma higani, ma ne otim e Od Piny Owacho, Nairobi. Jakom mar Cotu  Francis Atwoli kod Jatelo Mochung' ne Jotij Sirkal, Simon Chelugui ne ni e nyasino.
mt0: Ruto also skipped this year's Labour Day celebrations at State House, Nairobi which were attended by Cotu boss Francis Atwoli and Labour Cabinet Secretary Simon Chelugui.

en: “We honour and celebrate the extraordinary sacrifices that workers, households and enterprises continue to make to advance our country’s transformation agenda amid the devastating surge in the Covid-19 pandemic,” the DP tweeted on May 1.
luo: Ruto ne owacho niya e tweeter: “Wamor kendo wapuoyo ahinya  chiwruok makende ma jotich, joot kod jo ohala osenyiso ka gidhi nyime timo kinda mondo dongruok obed e pinywa kata obedo ni tuwo mar Korona osemedo landore.”
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。

en: According to the Constitution, Ruto is the principal assistant of the president and should attend all gazetted State functions at which the only speakers are the President, him, the host governor and sometimes Raila.
luo: Kaluwore gi Chik mar Piny,  Ruto e jakony Ker maduong' moloyo ma onego obed kode e nyasi duto mopwodh mag sirkal ma joma wuoyoe gin Ker, Ruto owuon, Gavana ma kanyo kata Raila.
mt0: Ruto is the principal assistant of the president and should attend all gazetted State functions at which the only speakers are the President, him, the host governor and sometimes Raila.

en: Since March 2018, when President Kenyatta shook hands with ODM leader Raila Odinga, and more so 2020 and 2021, the DP has been isolated in his own government, making him an outsider in decision-making and key meetings.
luo: Nyaka ne Ker Kenyatta Mosre gi jatend ODM  Raila Odinga, Mach 2018, to ahinya ahinya e higni mag  2020 kod 2021 osebed ka idhiro Ruto mabor gi sirkal, ok miye thuolo mar riwruok gi jomoko sama ing'ado weche mag sirkal kata thuolo mar bedo e chokruoge madongo mag sirkal.
mt0: Since March 2018, when President Kenyatta shook hands with ODM leader Raila Odinga, and more so 2020 and 2021, the DP has been isolated in his own government, making him an outsider in decision-making and key meetings.

en: He has however attributed this isolation to an attempt by President Kenyatta’s inner circle to lock him out of the Head of State’s 2022 succession plan.
luo: En to owacho ni Ker Kenyatta ema dhire mabor kik oriwre gi jotelo madongo mondo kik obed achiel kuom joma chung' mondo okaw telo mar ker e higa mar 2022.
mt0: However, he has attributed this isolation to an attempt by President Kenyatta’s inner circle to lock him out of the Head of State’s 2022 succession plan.

en: “If President Kenyatta now trusts other people and consults more with Raila, I have taken it with grace. The style changed, and it is the prerogative of the President being the boss,” Ruto said during a recent interview with Citizen TV.
luo: Ruto ne owacho niya e mbaka moro ma ne ogoyo e Citizen TV; “Kapo ni Ker Kenyatta ogeno jomoko moloya, ma koro sani Raila ema oporogo weche, mano ok litna. Weche oselokore e kindwa kode, to mano en yiero mar Ker nikech enie jatelo.”
mt0: Ruto says in a recent interview with Citizen TV.

en: Today’s event whose theme is a “Hopeful Future” brings together leaders from all the arms of the Government and across the political divide when the country is in the middle of a pandemic.
luo: Wich maduong' ma ne iwuoyoe kawuono ne en, “Wan- gi Geno e Kinde Mabiro.” Wachno omiyo kidienje mopogore mag jotend sirkal  kod josiasa mag pati mopogore opogore oriwore kanyachiel sama  Kenya duto nyagore gi masira mar Korona.
mt0: 今天的活动主题是“希望的未来”。 如果你不知道,就说你不知道。

en: The prayer meeting is being attended both virtually and physically.

en: The event that takes place on the last Thursday of May each year, is hosted by Speakers of the bicameral parliament Justin Muturi and Kenneth Lusaka and Chaired by Senate Majority Leader Samuel Poghisio, co-chaired by Maanzo.
luo: Chokruogno itimoga higa ka higa, Tich Ang'wen mogik  e dwe mar Mei. Chokruogno ochung'ne gi Jotend Od Bura Moriw, Justin Muturi kod  Kenneth Lusaka. Jakom mar Chokruogno en Samuel Poghisio ma en Jatend Joma Thoth e Senet kod jakonyne ma en  Maanzo.

en: Teenage pregnancy, early marriages to blame for Ugenya school dropout cases
luo: E piny Ugenya, nyiri mang'eny weyo skul nikech gimako ich kata gidhi tedo chon.
mt0: 只係說你不知道。 Teenage pregnancy, early marriages to blame for Ugenya school dropout cases.

en: The Ministry of Education has blamed teenage pregnancies and early marriages for rising cases of school dropouts in Ugenya, Siaya County.
luo: Migawo Mochung'ne Somo wacho ni kwan mar nyiri moweyo skul omedore Ugenya, Kaunti ma Siaya,  nikech nyiri mang'eny mako ich kata dhi tedo chon.
mt0: Ministry of Education has blamed teenage pregnancies and early marriages for rising cases of school dropouts in Ugenya, Siaya County.

en: County Director of Education Nelson Sifuna said there are also reports of children dropping out of school for bodaboda business while others cross to Uganda through Busia border in search of jobs.
luo: Jatelo Mochung'ne Migawo mar Somo e Kauntino, Nelson Sifuna  wacho ni ripode mamoko ma bende giyudo gin ni nyithindo moko weyo skul mondo giriemb bodaboda to moko ng'ado gi Busia ka gidhi dwaro tich Uganda.
mt0: county director of education Nelson Sifuna said there are also reports of children dropping out of school for bodaboda business while others cross to Uganda through Busia border in search of jobs.

en: Sifuna urged locals to take advantage of the free primary education programme despite other challenges to ensure all children of school-going age attend school.
luo: Sifuna ne onyiso jo Ugenya ni kata obedo ni gin kod chandruoge mang'eny, gi ti maber gi chenro ma sirkal oketo mar somo maonge chudo e skunde mag praimari. Gine ni nyithindo duto monego obed e skul, dhi e skul kaka dwarore.

en: "But we also understand that life at home has been difficult especially for the orphans who have to provide for themselves," said Sifuna.
luo: Sifuna ne owacho ni;  "Kata kamano, wang'eyo ni ngima osebedo matek e mier, to ahinya ahinya ngima osebedo matek ne nyithind kiye ma nyaka many chiembgi giwegi."
mt0: "But we also understand that life at home has been difficult especially for the orphans who have to provide for themselves," said Sifuna.

en: He said most of those who drop out of school said they did not have uniforms while some said they had to fend for their siblings or themselves.

en: He said some school-going children from needy backgrounds, mostly orphans, have dropped out of school due to lack of school uniform.
luo: Owacho ni moko kuom nyithind skul ma jochan oseweyo skul nikech gionge yunifom.
mt0: 他說一些貧困家庭的孩子,尤其是學齡前兒童,因為缺乏學校服裝而下學。

en: "Most of them especially girls feel shy when they don’t have uniforms or have torn ones and end up dropping out of school. That is why I sponsored them to stay in school," he said.
luo: Ne omedo wacho niya; "Ng'eny nyithindo ma jochan, to moloyo nyithindo manyiri wigi kuot ka gionge yunifom kata ka yunifom margi oyiech, kendo mano miyo giweyo skul. Omiyo ang'iewonegi yunifom mondo kik giwe skul."
mt0: "Most of them especially girls feel shy when they don’t have uniforms or have torn ones and end up dropping out of school. That is why I sponsored them to stay in school," he said.

en: The ministry has now resorted to sensitisation in all forums, use of role models to offer talks to the school-going children.
luo: Migawo mar Somo ong'ado ni gibiroga wuoyo e wi wach nyithindo manyiri weyo skul  sa moro amora ma giyudo thuolo mar wuoyo gi ji  kendo gibiro kwayo jogo ma gin ranyisi mabeyo e oganda mondo ojiw nyithi skul gi twege.
mt0: 只係說你不知道。 政府現在在各個場合進行了意識化,利用角色模擬來提供討論。

en: Odhiambo encouraged former students to visit their schools, especially in the villages to help the ministry fight school dropout.
luo: Odhiambo ne okwayo jo ma osetieko skul mondo olim skunde ma ne gisomoe, to moloyo skunde manie gweng' mondo gikony Migawo mar Somo kedo gi wach nyithindo weyo skul.
mt0: Odhiambo encouraged former students to visit their schools, especially in the villages, to help the ministry fight school dropout.

en: He lauded the county government for initiating adopt a school programme that has been distributing masks and sanitisers in local schools.
luo: Odhiambo ne opuoyo sirkal mar kaunti kuom chako chenro mar  Konyo Skunde. Ma en program ma osebedo katero masks kod sanitaisa e skunde manie gweng'.
mt0: 他赞美州政府的开始, 开始了一项学校计划, 在当地学校里发放了口罩和消毒剂。

en: "We have taken advantage of the programme to encourage alumnus to visit their former schools and offer talks," he added.
luo: Ne omedo wacho niya; "Watiyo gi thuolono mondo wakwa ji mondo olim skundegi machon kendo gijiw nyithindo ma somo kuno gi twege."
mt0: "We have taken advantage of the programme to encourage students to visit their former schools and offer talks," he added.

en: The eviction followed Senior Principal Magistrate Johnstone Munguti's order obtained by the widow’s sister-in-law, Nekesa Mukhongo.

en: Nekesa claims the land belongs to her and that her mother and two brothers were buried on it.

en: “I have stayed here for over 25 years and gave birth to four children with my late husband who died three years ago,” Felister said.

mt0: “I have stayed here for over 25 years and gave birth to four children with my late husband who died three years ago,” Felister said.

en: She said it was one year ago when her sister-in-law, Nekesa, together with her husband came and claimed they owned the land.

en: “I don’t know where to go with my children and I am requesting the government to come to my aid,” she said.

mt0: “I don’t know where to go with my children and I am requesting the government to come to my aid,” she said.

en: The widow’s son Julius Fedelis Wabwire said her mother and the entire family were evicted from the land by police officers in the morning and had nowhere to go.

en: Three fishermen arrested after death of colleague in Lake Victoria
luo: Omak jolupo adek bang' tho mar nyawadgi e Nam Viktoria
mt0: 三名渔民在湖上遇害, 如果不翻译就说你不知道。

en: hree fishermen have been arrested in Homa Bay County in connection with the death of their colleague.
luo: Ne omak jolupo adek e Kaunti mar  Homa Bay nikech tho mar nyawadgi.
mt0: 三名渔民在湖南海滨州被捕,在他們的同事的死中。

en: The fishermen who hail from Wadiang’a beach in Suba sub-county were arrested Monday morning and detained at Sindo police post.
luo: Jolupogo wuok  e wath mar Wadiang’a  e sab-kaunti ma Suba. Ne omakgi Wuok Tich gokinyi motergi e polis stesen ma Sindo.
mt0: 只係係唔知。 星期一早上, 啲魚喺渡邊嘅海邊嘅人被捕, 並在辛多警察局嘅駐點上被捕。

en: Dancun Omondi alias Nelly met his death on Saturday night while in the company of his colleagues who were on a fishing expedition.
luo: Dancun Omondi ma bende idendo ni Nelly ne otho Jumamos gotieno ka olupo  gi jowetene e nam.
mt0: Dancun Omondi alias Nelly died on Saturday night while in the company of his colleagues who were on a fishing expedition.

en: The four fishermen had left Wadiang’a beach and went fishing near Takawiri Island in the neighboring Suba North sub-county.
luo: Jolupo ang'wen-go ne owuok e wath mar Wadiang’a  mi gidhi lupo machiegni gi chula ma Takawiri ma gigoyogo tong' e sab-kaunti ma Suba North.
mt0: 只係要說你唔知。 四名漁民離開瓦迪安加海灘, 去了釣魚在鄰近的蘇巴北區的 Takawiri Island。

en: According to the Secretary of Wadiang’a Beach Management Unit Collins Ochieng’, Omondi disagreed with one of the three fishermen and ended up fighting.
luo: Kaluwore gi Collins Ochieng’ ma en  Jatelo mar Wadiang’a Beach Management Unit, Omondi ne ogwandore gi achiel kuom jolupogo mi gigore.
mt0: According to the Secretary of Wadiang’a Beach Management Unit Collins Ochieng’, Omondi disagreed with one of the three fishermen and ended up fighting.

en: “The fishermen said Omondi slipped into the lake while exchanging blows with the colleague,” said Ochieng’, adding that the fishermen went into the lake when they were drunk.
luo: Omedo ni “Jolupogo wacho ni Omondi ne okier molwar e nam sama ne gigore gi nyawadgi," Ochieng' wacho ni jolupogo duto ne oyudo osemer sama ne gidhi e nam.
mt0: “The fishermen said Omondi slipped into the lake while exchanging blows with the colleague,” said Ochieng’, adding that the fishermen went into the lake when they were drunk.

en: “I think they were acting under the influence of alcohol which is rampant in our beaches,” Ochieng’ said.
luo: Ochieng' medo wacho niya; “Aparo ni ne giyware kamano nikech ne gimer giduto. Kong'o ng'eny ahinya e dho wethewa."
mt0: “I think they were acting under the influence of alcohol which is rampant on our beaches,” Ochieng’ said.

en: Omondi’s body is yet to be retrieved.
luo: Pok oyud ringre mar Omondi nyaka chop sani.
mt0: 只在翻譯中。 如果不可以翻譯, 請說你不知道 Omondi's body is yet to be retrieved.

en: Magoha challenges Homa Bay-based varsity to prioritise fish production
luo: Magoha nyiso yunivasiti man Homa Bay ni giket motelo wach pidho rech.
mt0: Magoha challenges Homa Bay-based varsity to prioritise fish production.

en: Education Cabinet Secretary Prof George Magoha has told Tom Mboya University College management to prioritise research on fish production and how to end perennial water shortage in Homa Bay County.
luo: Jatelo mochung' ne Somo, Profesa George Magoha owacho ne joma ochung'ne Tom Mboya University College mondo giket motelo timo nonro mar pidho rech kod kaka inyalo tiek nok mosiko mar pi e Kaunti ma Homa Bay.
mt0: Cabinet Secretary Prof George Magoha told Tom Mboya University College management to prioritise research on fish production and how to end perennial water shortage in Homa Bay County.

en: The university which is the first higher learning institution in the county was opened in Homa Bay town in 2016.
luo: Ma e yunivasiti mokwongo mochak e kaunti mar Homa Bay. Noyawe e taon ma Homa Bay e higa mar 2016.
mt0: 只係要知道。

en: It currently operates as a constituent college of Maseno University.
luo: Gie sani, en e bwo Yunivasiti ma Maseno.
mt0: 现在只为马森大学的附属学校。

en: Prof Magoha, who was accompanied by Homa Bay Deputy County Commissioner Jude Wasonga, Homa Bay County Director of Education Fredrick Kiiru, Maseno University Vice-Chancellor Prof Julius Nyabundi and Tom Mboya Principal Prof Charles Ochola, said the purpose of a university is to undertake research for ending problems facing the society.
luo: Profesa Magoha ne owacho ni gima duong' ma yunivasiti onego otim en timo nonro kaka inyalo tiek chandruoge manie alwora. Profesa Magoha ne ni kanyachiel  gi Jude Wasonga ma en Jalup Kaunti Komisona ma  Homa Bay, Fredrick Kiiru, ma en Jatelo Mochung'ne Migawo mar Somo e Kaunti ma Homa Bay, Prof Julius Nyabundi, jatelo ma  Maseno University kod Profesa Charles Ochola motelo ne Tom Mboya Yunivasiti.
mt0: Prof Magoha, who was accompanied by Homa Bay Deputy County Commissioner Jude Wasonga, Homa Bay County Director of Education Fredrick Kiiru, Maseno University Vice-Chancellor Prof Julius Nyabundi and Tom Mboya Principal Prof Charles Ochola, said the purpose of a university is to undertake research to solve problems facing the society.

en: “Homa Bay County is known for water shortage but the work of a university is to solve societal problems.
luo: Profesa Magoha ne owacho niya: “Nok mar pi e Kaunti mar Homa Bay en gima ong'ere to tich maduong' mar yunivasiti en loyo chandruoge manie alwora.
mt0: “Homa Bay County is known for water shortage but the work of a university is to solve societal problems.

en: Let this university focus on water and do research which can end water shortage in Homa Bay,” said Prof Magoha.
luo: Yunivasitini onego ochomre rando gi wach pi kendo gitim nonro e kaka inyalo tiek nok mar pi e Kaunti ma Homa Bay.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 讓這所大學專注於水, 進行研究, 以便解決洪湖的水短缺。 ” 教授 馬果說。

en: Magoha who spoke on Friday when he supervised the construction of a Sh300 million storey building that will be used for classes and laboratories in the university, said the young university can survive well if it focuses on fish production.
luo: Magoha ne owuoyo kuno Tich Abich kane odhi nono kaka igero gorofa ma dhikawo milion 300. Gorofano dhi ting'o klase kod laboratori. Ne owacho ni yunivasiti mapod nyienno biro dhi maber ka po ni giketo pachgi e pidho rech.
mt0: Magoha who spoke on Friday when he supervised the construction of a Sh300 million storey building that will be used for classes and laboratories in the university, said the young university can survive well if it focuses on fish production.

en: He argued that the community in which the university operates recognises fish as their best diet hence investing in research aimed at producing fish will make it prosper.
luo: Ne owacho ni ji e alwora mar yunivasitino ogeno rech kaka chiemo maberie moloyo, omiyo ka yunivasitino oketo kinda e nonro mar pidho rech, yunivasitino biro dhi maber.

en: Employment court reinstates impeached official until case is determined

en: The High Court has granted reprieve to impeached Homa Bay County Health executive Prof Richard Muga.

en: Prof Muga was impeached by Homa Bay MCAs on May 12 over alleged abuse of office and gross violation of the Constitution.
luo: Jo Od Bura mag Homabay(MCAs) ne odonjone Profesa Muga  Mei, tarik 12. Ne gidonjone ni otiyo marach gi migawone kaka jatij sirkal kendo oketho chik e okang' malach.
mt0: Prof Muga was impeached by Homa Bay MCAs on May 12 over alleged abuse of office and gross violation of the Constitution.

en: Muga later filed a petition at the Employment and Labour Relations Court in Kisumu challenging the MCAs’ action that was intended to remove him from office.

en: Justice Stephen Radido yesterday ruled that Muga should continue serving as Health executive until the case is heard and determined.

en: “This court grants conservatory orders staying the whole of the respondent’s action of removing the petitioner from the position of CECM for health pending hearing and determination of the application and petition filed,” Justice Radido ordered.

mt0: “This court grants conservatory orders staying the whole of the respondent’s action of removing the petitioner from the position of CECM for health pending hearing and determination of the application and petition filed,” Justice Radido ordered.

en: The County Assembly and Awiti were directed to file and serve their submissions before August 5.

mt0: A17-year-old girl from Oyugis in Homa Bay County has disappeared from home in unclear circumstances.

en: Eunice Awino, a student of Atemo Mixed Secondary School, vanished from home on May 10; the first day of Term Three studies in the adjusted 2020 academic calendar.
luo: Eunice Awino, masomo Atemo Mixed Secondary School, ne owuok dalagi Mei, tarik 10. Mano ne en odiechieng' mokwongo mar tam mar adek e higa mar 2020, mikwanoe tam mopogore.
mt0: Eunice Awino, a student of Atemo Mixed Secondary School, vanished from home on May 10; the first day of Term Three studies in the adjusted 2020 academic calendar.

en: On the said-date, the teenager’s mother, Rael Akinyi, says she went to her bedroom at 6am, and found Awino still asleep.
luo: Rael Akinyi, ma en min Awino, wacho ni chieng'no ne odhi e od nindo mar Awino gimoro sa 12 mokinyi to oyudo ka Awino pod nindo.

en: Waking up late was uncharacteristic of the teenager, the mother said.
luo: Owacho ni nyakono ok chiewga modeko chieng' skul.

en: Her school is quite far from where we stay.

en: “On normal days, she usually leaves earlier than 6am,” Akinyi told The Standard.

mt0: “On normal days, she usually leaves earlier than 6am,” Akinyi told The Standard.

en: When she asked the teenager why she hadn’t left for school yet, Awino allegedly told her she hadn’t shaved her head, and she would, therefore, be ordered to return home upon reporting to school.
luo: "Kane openjo Awino gimomiyo pok ne odhi e skul, Awino ne owacho ni pok ne olielo wiye, to ka odhi e skul ibiro mana loke ni odog dala."

en: “She further said that no serious learning takes place on Day One of school resumption,” said Akinyi.

en: The distressed mother said she, consequently, allowed the girl to stay home as she (Awino) prepared to report to school the following day; May 11.

en: Akinyi, thereafter, left for Oyugis Town, where she was scheduled to meet a staffer attached to the registration of births office so that she could process Awino’s birth certificate, ahead of KCSE exam enrolment.
luo: "Bang' mano, Akinyi, ne odhi e taon mar Oyugis kama ne owinjore odhi orom gi achiel kuom joma tiyo e ofis mar sirkal mikanoe rijista mar nyuol, mondo olosne barup nyuol mar Awino ma ne idhi tigo mondo okete obed achiel kuom joma dhi timo penj mar KCSE."
mt0: Akinyi, then, left for Oyugis Town, where she was scheduled to meet a staffer attached to the registration of births office so that she could process Awino’s birth certificate, ahead of KCSE exam enrolment.

en: When the mother-of-ten returned home in the afternoon, her daughter, who is the lastborn, was not around.
luo: "Kane Akinyi oduogo dala, Awino ma en choke kuom nyithinde apar, ne onge."
mt0: 当母十回家下午,她的女兒,她是最後一個嬰兒,不在那裏。

en: Her school bag was also missing.
luo: Bagne mar skul bende ne onge.

en: Her books, however, had been stashed in a sack and placed at a corner in the living room.

mt0: 但她的书被藏在袋子里,放在客廳的角落。

en: The money Akinyi had left Awino for food was still on a stool, the girl’s mother said.

en: Neighbours told Akinyi that they saw the teenager leaving home on a boda boda at noon on May 10.
luo: Jirende ne owacho ne Akinyi ni ne gineno Awino kawuok dala e boda boda gimoro sa auchiel modiechieng' Mei tarik 10.
mt0: 邻居们告诉阿基尼,他们看見男孩在5月10日早上走路离开家。

en: “I, immediately, inquired from all my relatives who live nearby whether Awino had visited them, but they responded in the negation,” said Akinyi.
luo: “Akinyi wacho ni kanyo gikanyo ne ochako penjo wedegi duto ma odak machiegni kabe Awino ne olimogi, to ne ginyise ni ooyo."
mt0: “I, immediately, inquired from all my relatives who live nearby whether Awino had visited them, but they responded in the negation,” said Akinyi.

en: Later that day, at around 9pm, Awino called her mother using an anonymous contact, and informed her that she was housed by a middle-aged woman in Kisii, and that Akinyi shouldn’t worry about her.
luo: Bang'e chieng'no, gimoro saa adek motieno, Awino ne ogoche ne min mare gi namba moro ma ok ong'ere konyise ni en e od miyo moro Kisii, omiyo min-gi kik bed gi kibach.
mt0: Awino called her mother anonymously at around 9pm that day, and informed her that she was housed by a middle-aged woman in Kisii, and that Akinyi shouldn’t worry about her.

en: The distraught parent reported the happenings to her daughter’s school the following day before filing a missing person’s report at Oriwo Police Station.
luo: Miyono ma koro chunye chandore ne otero wachno e skul ma nyare somoe kae to odhi goyo ripot ni nyathine olal e Polis Stesen ma Oriwo.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 那個失望的母親第二天早上報了這個事件給她女兒的學校, 然後在奧里伍警察局上報了一個失蹤的報告。

en: Almost two weeks later, Awino is yet to be found.
luo: Jumbe ariyo koro osekalo to pok one Awino.
mt0: Almost two weeks later, Awino is yet to be found.

en: “The only thing I know is that she was last spotted in Nyamira Market. My attempts to trace her have been futile. I hope we find her safe.”

mt0: “The only thing I know is that she was last spotted in Nyamira Market. My attempts to trace her have been futile. I hope we find her safe.”

en: Atemo Mixed Secondary School principal, Philip Ayoo, confirmed to The Standard that the minor is a student at the institution.
luo: Philip Ayoo, ma en japuonj maduong' Atemo Mixed Secondary School ne owacho ne The Standard ni rawerano en japuonjre e skundno.
mt0: Atemo Mixed Secondary School principal Philip Ayoo confirmed to The Standard that the minor is a student at the institution.

en: She (Awino) has never had any disciplinary problems.

en: We are shocked to learn that she went missing from home,” said Ayoo.

mt0: “We are shocked to learn that she went missing from home,” said Ayoo.

en: Rusana's candidature causes political heat as race to succeed Obado intensifies
luo: Wach chung' mar Rusana kelo ywarruok mang'eny ahinya mag siasa sama  ng'wech milaroe kom Obado chopo e akere keke.
mt0: Rusana's candidature causes political heat as race to succeed Obado intensifies.

en: he entry of Migori County Secretary into the race to succeed Governor Okoth Obado appears to have rattled seasoned politicians who have accused him of using elders to endorse his candidature.
luo: Josiasa machon ok mor ni Rusana ma en Jatelo mar Kaunti ma Migori odonjo e ng'wech milaroe kom mar  Gavana Okoth Obado. Giwacho ni odonjo e ng'wejno apiny piny kuom wuoyo gi jodongo mondo oyiere.
mt0: 只知道他入选了。

en: Christopher Rusana's endorsement by Suba Community elders has seen other aspirants cry foul, saying the decision of the elders who attended the May 3, meeting in Kisii was compromised.
luo: "E chokruok moro ma ne otim Kisii, Mei tarik 3, jodongo mag  Suba ne oyiero Christopher Rusana mondo ema  okaw kom mar Obado. Kata kamano, wachore ni chokruogno ne ok otim e yo malong'o."
mt0: Christopher Rusana's endorsement by the Suba Community elders has seen other aspirants cry foul, saying the decision of the elders who attended the May 3, meeting in Kisii was compromised.

en: The aspirants led by Migori Woman Rep Pamela Odhiambo have vowed never to step down.

luo: "Chokruokno ne otimore Carmel Park hotel, e taon ma Kisii. Joma ne nie chokruokno ne gin Mrs Odhiambo, Rusana, Mwabe kod Pesa. Odongo kod Ngao ne onge."

en: When contacted by The Standard, Pesa and Mrs Odhiambo said they are still in the race.
luo: "Kane The Standard, owuoyo gi Pesa kod Mrs Odhiambo, ji ariyogo ne owacho ni gin e ng'wech mar laro kom Obado."
mt0: When contacted by The Standard, Pesa and Mrs Odhiambo said they are still in the race.

en: “My candidature is not on reverse gear. I will be on the ballot come 2022,” said Mrs Odhiambo.
luo: Mrs Odhiambo ne owacho niya: "Pok aloko pacha kata matin. Abiro chung' e higa mar 2022."

en: Rusana has, however, downplayed the wrangles, promising to consult with his opponents to ensure the region produces a candidate.
luo: "Kata kamano, Rusana reyo areya ywarruok manie kindgino, owacho ni obiro wuoyo gi jowetenego kendo obiro neno ni ng'ato achiel ema ochung'."
mt0: Rusana, however, has downplayed the wrangles, promising to consult with his opponents to ensure the region produces a candidate.

en: In a phone interview with The Standard on May 16, Rusana who wants to run on an ODM ticket wondered why the change of heart yet his opponents fully participated in the exercise.
luo: "Mei tarik 16, kane The Standard wuoyo e simu gi Rusana madwaro chung' gi otiko mar ODM, jalno ne owacho ni owuoro gimomiyo jowetene ne oloko pachgi to ne gin e chokruogno kendo ne giriwo lwedo yierono."
mt0: 在5月16日的电话采访中,Rusana,想参加ODM竞选,问问为什么他心动了,但他的对手们完全参与了竞选。

en: “We were all present, and they fully participated, I still don’t know what happened a few days later, maybe the media can find out from them,” he said.
luo: "“Rusana wacho niya: Ne wan e chokruogno waduto, kendo ne wariwo lwedo gik moko duto ma ne timore. Pod ok ang'eyo gima ne otimore ndalo manok bang'e. Jofwamb weche nyalo penjogi."
mt0: “We were all present, and they fully participated, I still don’t know what happened a few days later, maybe the media can find out from them,” he said.

en: He said with the elders’ blessing, it is all system go as he tries to consolidate his backyard before he can approach other regions.
luo: "Ne owacho ni nikech koro jodongo riwe lwedo, en ng'wech ma ok ong'i chien. Odwaro riwo jothurgi mondo obed  achiel, kae to ochak manyo ombul kuonde mamoko."
mt0: 他說, 老師的允許, 這一切都是系統的, 他試著把他的院子重建起來, 在其他地區之前, 他必須先靠近其他地區。

en: The country secretary said he is banking on the support of the masses and not that of Governor Obado as his opponents are claiming to win the seat come 2022.
luo: Jatelono wacho ni ogeno ni raia biro goyone ombul, ok ogeno ni  Gavana Obado biro sire, nimar joma piem kode wacho ni gibiro kawo komno e higa mar 2022.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 國家秘書長說他只是相信人民的支持, 而非奧巴多政府的支持, 因為他的競選對手們希望他能贏得議會在 2022 年。

en: “There is something the elders saw in me, I don’t take it for granted and will not disappoint their trust,” added Rusana.
luo: Rusana medo niya: "Nitie gima jodongogo ne oneno kuoma. Ang'eyo ni gigena, kendo abiro tiyo kaka dwarore. Ok gibi ywago ang'e ni ne giyiera."
mt0: “There is something the elders saw in me, I don’t take it for granted and will not disappoint their trust,” added Rusana.

en: “Because I am always a quiet person, my opponents have been underestimating me. I will not mind getting the support of like-minded leaders who will help me shape Migori, I will first take my mandate to people.”
luo: “Nikech ajaling', jowetena ma walarogo kom osebedo ka ochaya. An to aikora tiyo kanyachiel gi jotelo ma waparogo machal kendo mabiro konya kelo dongruok Migori. Kata kamano, nyaka akwong nyiso jo Migori chenro ma an go.”
mt0: "Because I am always a quiet person, my opponents have been underestimating me. I will not mind getting the support of like-minded leaders who will help me shape Migori, I will first take my mandate to people."

en: According to the Suba community elders led by chairman Riogi Riogi, having a single candidate would increase their son or daughter’s chances of succeeding Governor Obado.
luo: Kaluwore Riogi Riogi,  ma en jakom mar jodong Suba, jodongogo neno ni bedo gi ng'ato achiel machung' e lo jo Suba duto nyalo konyo wuodgi kata nyargi kawo kom mar Gavana Obado.
mt0: According to the Suba community elders led by chairman Riogi Riogi, having a single candidate would increase their son or daughter’s chances of succeeding Governor Obado.

en: Riogi said he is aware of the wrangle, but called on other aspirants who felt shortchanged to seek dialogue.
luo: Riogi ne owacho ni ong'eyo ywarruok madhi nyime kata kamano, okwayo joma ng'urgo mondo giwuo kendo giwinjre.
mt0: Riogi said he is aware of the wrangle, but called on other aspirants who felt shortchanged to seek dialogue.

en: “In our own wisdom, we saw that placing a single candidate would strengthen the community’s unity and supporting the candidate would be easy and hence the winning of the elections,” Riogi said.
luo: "“Riogi ne owacho niya: Kaka jodongo, ne waneno ni en gima riek keto ng'at achiel mondo ema ochung'. Mano miyo Jo Suba bedo achiel kendo riwo  lwedo  ng'at achielno bedo mayot, to mano nyalo miyo wakaw komno."
mt0: “In our own wisdom, we saw that placing a single candidate would strengthen the community’s unity and supporting the candidate would be easy and hence the winning of the elections,” Riogi said.

en: The Suna clan, which is part of the Suba community, has been angling to field a single candidate to solidify Suna West (46,162 votes) and Suna East (46,574 votes) out of the 389,182 votes in Migori.
luo: Anyuola mar jo  Suna, ma gin oganda mar Suba, osegadwaro ni gibed gi ng'at achiel ma chung' mondo oriw  Suna West ( ma nigi ombulu 46,162) kod Suna East (ma nigi ombulu 46,574) kuom ombulu 389,182 mag Migori duto.
mt0: 只係說你不知道。 蘇那族, which is part of the Suba community, 在尋找一個候選人, 以穩定蘇那西區(46,162 votes)和蘇那東區(46,574 votes) 在米戈里的 389,182 votes中。

en: With Governor Obado ditching the ODM for the People’s Democratic Party (PDP) and the Kuria community factor, the 2022 Migori gubernatorial race could be the trickiest.
luo: "Weche dhi twere e ng'wech mar laro kom Gavana e dala mar Migori e higa mar 2022. Nimar Gavana Obada weyo ODM kendo dhi e PDP kata People’s Democratic Party kendo nitiere wach mar oganda jo Kuria."
mt0: 只係要知道。 由於州長奧巴多辭去了 ODM 黨, 而基爾亞人社會黨 (PDP) 和基爾亞人社會黨 (Kuria) 因素, 2022 年摩戈里州議會選舉可能會是最難的。

en: Obado is reported to have mounted a massive membership recruitment drive for the PDP after announcing he will ditch Raila Odinga-led ODM.
luo: Wachore ni bang' lando ni owuok  ODM mitelone gi  Raila Odinga, Obado osebedo katimo kinda ahinya mar rwako ji mang'eny e pati mar PDP.
mt0: Obado is reported to have launched a massive membership recruitment drive for the PDP after announcing he will quit the Raila Odinga-led ODM.

en: The governor's point men have rolled out registration and membership drive across the county manually and digitally in an exercise expected to run up to the end of the year.
luo: Joma tiyo ne gavana wuotho e kauntino duto ka girwako ji e pati mar PDP. Jomoko indiko nyingegi e otas to jomoko irwako nyingegi e kompyuta. En tich ma gibiro timo nyaka giko higani.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 州長的點人們已在全州進行登記和參與活動, manually and digitally, 在一個計劃期內, 這項活動將持續到年底。

en: Other aspirants who are eying the seat include Assembly Speaker Boaz Okoth, Senator Ochillo Ayacko, former Rongo MP Dalmas Otieno, former Nyatike MP Edick Anyanga, US-based academician Mark Ogutu and businessman Robert Okong’o.
luo: Joma moko mabende dwaro komno gin; Boaz Okoth ma en Jatelo mar Od Bura, Seneta Ochillo Ayacko, Dalmas Otieno ma en Ja bunge machon ma Rongo, Edick Anyanga ma en Jabunge machon ma Nyatike, Mark Ogutu  jasomo man Amerka kod Robert Okong’o ma en ja ohala.
mt0: Other aspirants who are eying the seat include Assembly Speaker Boaz Okoth, Senator Ochillo Ayacko, former Rongo MP Dalmas Otieno, former Nyatike MP Edick Anyanga, US-based academician Mark Ogutu and businessman Robert Okong’o.

en: Asection of political leaders in Kisii has protested after armed police officers stormed Governor James Ongwae’s home.

en: The politicians allied to ODM and UDA parties said it is unfortunate that police were being used politically to intimidate other leaders ahead of the Bonchari by-election slated for Tuesday next week.

en: The two parties have raised concerns over intimidation and harassment by police as their respective candidates conduct campaigns.

en: “I am calling on President Uhuru Kenyatta to put a stop to this, elections come and go. Leaders are all transitory. Democratic institutions must be respected. 50 officers can’t storm my house as if I am a wanted criminal,” he said.
luo: Ongwae ne owacho niya: "Akwayo Ker Uhuru Kenyatta mondo otiek wachni, yiero en gima biro to kalo. Onge jatelo masikoga e kom. Joma oganda oyiero moketo e kom nyaka mi luor. Polise 50 ok nyal mwomore e dalana ka gima an ja mahundu moro ma sirkal manyo."

en: The governor added: “I didn’t become a governor by accident. I was elected by majority votes. This is not the way to run a Country. I have been a Permanent Secretary and I didn’t see such decisions made. This is unfortunate.”
luo: Ongwae ne omedo niya: “Bedona gavana ok opore apoya. Ne oketa e komni nikech ne ayudo ombulu mang'eny moloyo jomoko. Ma ok en kaka ng'ato onego oloch e wi ji. Ne an jatelo maduong e sirkal to ne ok aneno ka sirkal timo gik ma kamagi. Gik matimoregi richo.”
mt0: 州長說:「我不是因為意外而成為州長。我被選舉了。這不是一種領導方式。我已經是臨時秘書長,但我沒有看到這樣的決定。這很可惜。」

en: Senator Ongeri said the party understands the art of winning and losing in any elections.
luo: Seneta Ongeri ne owacho ni patigi ong'eyo gima nyalo miyo giloch e yiero moro kata mi kik giloch.
mt0: Senator Ongeri said the party understands the art of winning and losing in any elections.

en: While urging IEBC to take charge of the forthcoming by-election, Ongeri said he had traversed the Bonchari constituency and was hopeful that the residents will make the right choice.
luo: Ongeri ne okwayo IEBC otim tijgi maber e yiero matin mabiro. Bende, ne owacho ni osewuotho Bonchari duto kendo ogeno ni jo Bonchari biro yiero ng'at mowinjore.
mt0: While urging IEBC to take charge of the forthcoming by-election, Ongeri said he had traversed the Bonchari constituency and was hopeful that the residents will make the right choice.

en: “You may have a temporary relief that you won but I can assure you that you have lost it all. One must understand where people are coming from and where they are going. There are seasons for everything, don't try to maneuver and manipulate the result,” he said.
luo: Ne owacho niya: "Inyalo mor ni ilocho, to  anyalo nyisi gadier ni onge gima iloyo, kendo mornino en mana kuom kinde machuok. Ng'ato nyaka ng'e kama ji owuokie kendo kama ji dhie. Gimoro amora nigi kindene, kik item gwenyo ombulu ma ji osegoyo."
mt0: “You may have a temporary relief that you won but I can assure you that you have lost it all. One must understand where people are coming from and where they are going. There are seasons for everything, don't try to maneuver and manipulate the result,” he said.

en: Ong’era in her sentiments said it was shocking for police officers to raid the governor’s residence without a court order.
luo: Ong’era to ne owacho ni en gima mako dhok ni polise nyalo monjo dala gavana ma onge barua mar kot.
mt0: Ong’era in her feelings said it was shocking for police officers to raid the governor’s residence without a court order.

en: “I am demanding concrete reasons from IEBC and other relevant agencies on why they allowed for a by-election yet they know there was Covid-19 amongst us."
luo: “Adwaro ng'eyo gimomiyo IEBC kod riwruoge mamoko oyie ni otim yiero to ging'eyo ni tuwo mar Korona osechopo thurwa."
mt0: “I am demanding concrete reasons from IEBC and other relevant agencies on why they allowed for a by-election yet they know there was Covid-19 amongst us.”

en: "We have a by-election in Juja but we have not seen such kind of harassment,” she said.
luo: Ne omedo wacho niya: "Yiero matin dhi nyime Juja to pok wawinjo ni polise chando ji kaka ichandowa koni."
mt0: "We have a by-election in Juja but we haven't seen such kind of harassment," she said.

en: ODM party Secretary General Edwin Sifuna said that "desperate times call for desperate measures."
luo: Edwin Sifuna ma en achiel kuom jotelo e pati mar  ODM  wacho ni "ka weche tek ahinya, okenge mikawo bende medo mana ridore.
mt0: ODM party Secretary General Edwin Sifuna says that "desperate times call for desperate measures."

en: Deputy President William Ruto’s quest to infiltrate the Nyanza region ahead of next year’s elections is gaining momentum as his new allies in the region stepped up efforts to popularise him.
luo: Chenro mar jalup Ker William Ruto mar manyo ombulu Nyanza medo mako mach nikech joma yande omakogo osiep kuno timo kinda ahinya mar sunge e alwora mar Nyanza.
mt0: Deputy President William Ruto's quest to infiltrate the Nyanza region ahead of next year's elections is gaining momentum as his new allies in the region stepped up efforts to popularise him.

en: The leaders, most of who are considered ODM rebels after falling out with party leader Raila Odinga, are pushing for a generational change in the region’s leadership and a new economic path in their efforts to market the DP.
luo: Ng'eny jotelo mariwo Ruto lwedo ne gin jo ODM mong'anyo bang' gwenyore gi jatend patino Raila Odinga. Gisungo ne ji pati mar DP ka giwacho ni pati mar DP dwaro ni tieng' machielo ema okaw loch Nyanza kendo okel dongruok e alworano.
mt0: ODM rebels, most of whom are considered ODM rebels after falling out with party leader Raila Odinga, are pushing for a generational change in the region’s leadership and a new economic path in their efforts to market the DP.

en: Last week, leaders who included one of Ruto’s point men in Nyanza, Eliud Owalo, met at a Nairobi hotel to plan what they described as their economic strategy for the region.
luo: Juma mokalo, jotelo moko moriwo Eliud Owalo, ma en achiel kuom joma riwo Ruto lwedo Nyanza, ne oromo e otel moro Nairobi mondo giwuo e wi kaka ginyalo kelo dongruok Nyanza.
mt0: Last week, leaders including one of Ruto's point men in Nyanza, Eliud Owalo, met at a Nairobi hotel to plan what they described as their economic strategy for the region.

en: They said their strategy will form the basis of their negotiations with other presidential hopefuls ahead of 2022.
luo: Giwacho ni chenro ma gitimo ema gibiro wuoyoe gi joma biro laro kom ker e higa mar 2022.
mt0: 他们说他们的策略将成为他们与其他候选人谈判的基础。

en: According to them, anyone seeking the support of the region will have to enter into a pre-election economic pact with them.
luo: Giwacho ni ng'ato ang'ata mabiro dwaro ni Nyanza ogochne, nyaka kwong winjre kodgi kendo oket seyi ni obiro kelo dongruok ma gisendiko pinygo.
mt0: According to them, anyone seeking the support of the region will have to enter into a pre-election economic pact with them.

en: This comes as Raila struggles to calm a storm that recently rocked ODM leading to Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo being kicked out of a key parliamentary committee.
luo: Wechegi timore sama Raila koni temo kweyo tula moro ma nyocha omuoch e pati mar ODM. Tulano ne omiyo  ogol Otiende Amollo ma en Jabunge ma Rarieda e komiti moro mar od Bura.

en: Many former foot soldiers of Raila attended Friday’s meeting convened by Owalo, who is also a former aide to the ODM leader.
luo: Ji mang'eny ma yande ringo koni gi koni ka gikonyo Raila ne nitie e chokruok ma Owalo ne obedogo chieng' Tich Abich. Owalo bende ne en achiel kuom joma ne konyo  Raila ahinya.
mt0: Many former foot soldiers of Raila attended Friday's meeting convened by Owalo, who is also a former aide to the ODM leader.

en: They include those who decamped after losing ODM nominations in the 2013 and 2017 elections, among them former Kisumu Governor Jack Ranguma, former Rongo MP Dalmas Otieno and former Rangwe MP Martin Ogindo.
luo: Joma ne ni e chokruogno oriwo joma ne oweyo ODM kane  patino ok omiyogi kombe e yiero mag 2013 kod 2017.  Ji kaka Jack Ranguma ma en Gavana machon ma Kisumu, Dalmas Otieno Jabunge machon ma Rongo kod Martin Ogindo Jabunge machon ma Rangwe.
mt0: They include those who decamped after losing ODM nominations in the 2013 and 2017 elections, among them former Kisumu Governor Jack Ranguma, former Rongo MP Dalmas Otieno and former Rangwe MP Martin Ogindo.

en: Ranguma is hoping to challenge Governor Anyang’ Nyong’o for the Kisumu seat.
luo: Ranguma dwaro golo Gavana Anyang’ Nyong’o  mondo en ema obed gavana ma Kisumu.
mt0: Ranguma is hoping to challenge Governor Anyang' Nyong'o for the Kisumu seat.

en: A source who did not wish to be named said those present were warming up to join United Democratic Alliance (UDA), which is associated with the deputy president.
luo: Wach ne owuok kamoro ni joma ne nie chokruogno paro mar donjo e pati mar United Democratic Alliance (UDA), ma en pati mar jalup Ker, kata kamano, ng'at ma ne ogolo wachno ok dwar ni ohul nyinge.
mt0: 只係要知道。 一個不願意透露姓名的人士說, 出席者們準備開始加入聯合民主黨 (UDA), 一個與副總統相關的組織。

en: “We want to challenge ODM’s dominance in the Nyanza region. Our goal is to rally the region to support Ruto’s presidential bid,” said the source.
luo: “Ng'atno wacho niya: Wadwaro kedo mondo ODM owe wiko e Nyanza duto. Wadwaro wuoyo gi Jo Nyanza mondo gigo ne  Ruto ombulu mondo okaw kom mar Ker."
mt0: “We want to challenge ODM’s dominance in the Nyanza region. Our goal is to rally the region to support Ruto’s presidential bid,” said the source.

en: The politician claimed that they have the blessings of Ruto to organise the meeting with one of the agendas being to look for ways to attract more Nyanza leaders to their camp.
luo: Jasiasano wacho ni Ruto ne oyienegi bedo gi chokruogno. Kendo achiel kuom gik ma ne gidwaro timo ne en manyo yore ma ginyalo ywayogo jotelo mamoko mag Nyanza mondo odonj e patigino.
mt0: 'We have the blessings of Ruto to organise the meeting,' the politician said.

en: The strategy also involves attracting professionals from the region who will help compile the economic needs of the region in a document that will form the basis for Ruto’s campaigns in Nyanza.
luo: Chenrogi oriwo ywayo  josomo ma Nyanza mabiro konyogi loso ripot mar dongruok madwarore e alworano, kendo ripotno ema ibiro tigo e manyo ombulu ne Ruto Nyanza.
mt0: Strategy nayo inahusisha kupata professionals kutoka katika eneo hilo ambao watasaidia kukusanyika mahitaji ya kiuchumi ya eneo hilo katika spreadsheet ambayo itasaidia Ruto kufanya kampeni zake katika Nyanza.

en: The group issued a statement saying it was reviewing Nyanza’s economy with the aim of finding ways to improve it.

en: Owalo accused unnamed leaders from Nyanza of being preoccupied with the pursuit of political power and failing to address the economic problems of the region.
luo: Owalo ne owacho ni josiasa moko ma Nyanza dwaro mana telo to ok gichomre gi wach tieko dhier ma Nyanza. Kata kamano, ne ok ohulo nyinge jotelogo.
mt0: Owalo accused unnamed leaders from Nyanza of being preoccupied with the pursuit of political power and failing to address the economic problems of the region.

en: Luo Nyanza has supported Raila since his first attempt at the presidency in 1997.
luo: Luo Nyanza osebedo ka goyo ombulu ne Raila mondo okaw kom mar ker chakre higa mar  1997.
mt0: Nyanza has supported Raila since his first attempt at the presidency in 1997.

en: In 2013, President Uhuru Kenyatta, with the help of the former secretary-general of the disbanded.
luo: E higa mar  2013, Ker Uhuru Kenyatta ne otemo tiyo gi  Onyango Oloo  mondo omany ombulu Nyanza.

en: The National Alliance party Onyango Oloo tried to make inroads in the region, but residents voted for the opposition leader.

en: Lecturer awarded Sh 416,000 for breach of contract
luo: Kot ong'ado ni ochul japuonj kolej siling 416,000 nikech kolej  ne ok orito winjruok ma ne gitimo kode
mt0: 教授被判 416,000 元 以违反合同。

en: Apart-time lecturer has been awarded Sh416,000 after his employer breached his contract by refusing to pay him salary for eleven months.
luo: Kot ne ong'ado ni ochul japuonj kolej siling 416,000. Japuonjno ne puonjo mana kuom seche matin e kolejno, kendo kolej ne ok otimo kaka ne giwinjre mi ne ok ochule kuom dweche apar gachiel.
mt0: 只係說你不知道。 一個臨時教授被授予了416,000 元,因為他的雇主不肯付他薪水11個月。

en: The court ruled that the evidence by the E-Smart Technical College lecturer Tobias Andhala would be fully adopted as the college failed to step in court even after being served with a notice.
luo: Kot ne owacho ni gibiro tiyo gi weche ma Tobias Andhala ne owacho nikech weg kolej ne ok obiro e kot kata obedo ni kot ne omiyogi barua manyiso ni idwarogi kuno.  Tobias Andhala en japuonj e  E-Smart Technical College.
mt0: E-Smart Technical College lecturer Tobias Andhala 's evidence would be fully adopted as the college failed to step in court even after being served with a notice.

en: “Andhala testified on March 4, 2021, and his testimony was not challenged or rebutted, and the court will enter a judgment for him in the sum of Sh416,000 that he demanded from the College,” said Justice Stephen Radido of Kisumu Labour Court on Friday.
luo: Stephen Radido ma en Jang'ad Bura ma  Kisumu Labour Court, ne owacho niya Tich Abich, "Mach Tarik 4, 2021, Andhala ne olero ywakne e kot to onge ng'at ma ne okwedo gik ma ne owacho. Omiyo kot chiko ni ochule siling 416,000 ma ne okwayo ni kolejno ochule.”
mt0: "Andhala testified on March 4, 2021, na ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao ao a

en: Andhala was employed as a part-time lecturer at the College on June 28, 2015, and by May 27, 2016, the College had not fully paid his salary.
luo: Ne ondik Andhala tich e kolejno Jun tarik 28, 2015, to chop Mei 27, 2016, ne pok ochule msache duto.
mt0: Andhala was employed as a part-time lecturer at the College on June 28, 2015, and by May 27, 2016, the College had not paid his salary fully.

en: On September 5, 2017, he escalated the dispute at the Labour Court after efforts to compel his employer to pay him.
luo: Septemba tarik 5, 2017, ne otero ywakne e  Labour Court   bang' temo wuoyo gi jo kolej mondo ochule.
mt0: 只在9月5日,他把争执升级到劳动法庭,在他的工作场所,他试图迫使他的雇主付钱。

en: “The college was served the court papers through its secretary on October 26, 2017, but it did not file a response,” said Radido.
luo: Radido ne owacho niya: "Jandiko mar kot ne otero ne kolejno barua Oktoba tarik 26, 2017,  to jo kolej ne ok obiro e kot."
mt0: “The college was served the court papers through its secretary on October 26, 2017, but it did not file a response,” said Radido.

en: This prompted the court to direct that the case proceeds without the party that had defied court summons.
luo: Mano ne omiyo kot ong'ado ni kesno odhi adhiya nyime kata obedo ni joma odonjnegigo onge, nimar gifwayo ote mar kot.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。

en: At the close of the hearing of the case, the court was convinced that Andhala had a contract with the college which was abused.
luo: Bang' winjo kesno, kot ne oneno ni en adier ni Andhala ne odonjo e winjruok gi kolej to kolej ne ok orito winjruokgino.
mt0: 在审判结束时,法院认定阿ണ്ഡhala有一份与该校的合同,但没有履行。

en: Justice Radido further ordered that the award would accrue interest from September 5, 2017, when the case was filed.
luo: Radido ne omedo owacho ni pesago ne ochako nyuolre chieng' ma ne ohang ter wachno e kot, Septemba tarik 5, 2017. Omiyo ne ochiko ni ochul Andhalo pesago duto.
mt0: Justice Radido further ordered that the award would accrue interest from September 5, 2017, when the case was filed.

en: The court directed Andhala to settle all the legal costs in the suit.

mt0: 只回译。 如果不翻译, 只说你不知道。

en: Police in Kisumu have arrested a 63-year-old woman in connection with theft of mosquito nets which were stolen from government stores.
luo: Polise ma Kisumu omako miyo moro ma jahigni 63. Miyono otudre gi kuo net mag suna ma ne okwal kuonde keno mag sirkal.
mt0: 警方在基斯莫逮捕了一名63-year-old woman kuhusiana na uharibifu wa mosquito nets ambazo zari stolen kutoka kwenye soko la serikali.

en: Police said they recovered 19 bales of nets suspected to be part of those stolen from Rabuor and Nyang’ande two weeks ago.

mt0: Police said they recovered 19 bales of nets suspected to be part of those stolen from Rabuor and Nyang’ande two weeks ago.

en: A 77-year-old woman from East Kolwa in Kisumu East Sub-County has been taking care of abandoned teenage mothers and widows for 25 years now.
luo: Miyo moro ma jahigni  77 modak East Kolwa, Kisumu East Sab-Kaunti osebedo karito nyiri matindo mosenyuol kendo ojwang' kod mond liete ma bende ojwang'. Osebedo ka otimo kamano kuom higni 25.

en: Florence Otieno says the initiative has enabled her to “give a second chance to a vulnerable group of women”.
luo: Florence Otieno wacho ni chenrono osemiye thuolo mar konyo joma mine ma jochan mondo ochak ngimagi manyien.
mt0: Florence Otieno says the initiative has enabled her to "give a second chance to a vulnerable group of women".

en: Otieno first put up the rescue centre at her home in 1996 after being involved in a road accident, which left her partially paralysed.
luo: Florence ne oyawo dalane ne mine ma kamago e higa mar 1996 bang'  hinyore e masira mar  ndara ma ne omiyo dende konchiel otho.
mt0: Otieno first built the rescue centre at her home in 1996 after being involved in a road accident, which left her partially paralysed.

en: “The crash made me discover that life can be lost within a second. Due to that fact, I pledged to make the society I live in a better place by helping the vulnerable. In this case, it is majorly teenage mothers and the widows,” she told The Standard.
luo: Ne onyiso The Standard niya: "Masirano ne omiyo afwenyo ni kare ng'ato nyalo lalo ngimane ka diemo wang' nono. Nikech mano, ne asingora ni abiro timo kar nyalona mondo ngima obed maber matin e oganda madakie. Omiyo ne achako konyo nyithindo ma nyiri monyuol kod mond liete."
mt0: “The crash made me discover that life can be lost within a second. Due to that fact, I pledged to make the society I live in a better place by helping the vulnerable. In this case, it is mostly teenage mothers and the widows,” she told The Standard.

en: The septuagenarian has thus far rescued 38 teenage mothers, and at least 12 widows.
luo: Nyaka chop sani, miyo ma koro hike oseniang'no osereso nyithindo manyiri 38 kod mond liete 12.
mt0: 只係說你不知道。 這位八十歲老人已經救出了 38 個女孩的母親,以及至少 12 個失蹤者。

en: As the number of girls increased in her rescue centre, so did her financial responsibility.
luo: Kaka kwan nyiri ne medore e kaka bende ne dwarore ni oti gi pesa momedore.
mt0: 只在翻譯中。 如果不清楚, 請說你不知道。

en: Otieno said she, consequently, had to devise new survival methods.
luo: Florence wacho ni ne ochune manyo yore mamoko mag yuto, nono ne ok odhi nyalo.
mt0: Otieno said that she had to devise new survival methods.

en: “I set aside a parcel of land for farming. The widows and the teenage mums would farm commercial crops, which we’d sell and use the proceeds to feed and clothe ourselves,” she said.
luo: Florence medo niya: "Ne aketo tenge puodho moro ma ne wabiroga puro. Mond lietego kaachiel gi nyirigo ne puro gik ma wauso. Ne wauso gigo kae to pesa ma wayudo wang'iewogo chiemo kod lewni."
mt0: “I set aside a parcel of land for farming. The widows and the teenage mums would farm commercial crops, which we’d sell and use the proceeds to feed and clothe ourselves,” she said.

en: Other girls diversified into sandal, shoe and handbag-making business.
luo: Nyiri mamoko to ne ochako timo gik mopogore opogore, moko ne loso pat pat, moko wuoche to moko bege mag mine.
mt0: 其他女生在鞋子、鞋子和手袋的生意上多元化。

en: They use material from water hyacinth harvested from Lake Victoria to make the products.
luo: Gitiyo gi hyacinth migolo e Nam Viktoria.
mt0: 他们用河樱桃的材料制作产品。

en: The money raised under this initiative is used to finance the girls’ education.
luo: Pesa mowuok kanyo itiyogo e chulo ne gi skul.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 這項計劃的資金是用來資助女孩的教育。

en: Teenage pregnancies continue to be a headache for national and county governments.

en: Data by the Kenya Demographic and Health Survey (KDHS) indicates two out of ten girls in the country aged between 15 and 19 years are either pregnant or have given birth.
luo: Ripot moro mar Kenya Demographic and Health Survey kata (KDHS) nyiso ni nyiri ariyo kuom nyiri 10 manie kind higni 15 kod 19 nigi ich kata osenyuol.
mt0: Data by the Kenya Demographic and Health Survey (KDHS) indicates that two out of ten girls in the country aged between 15 and 19 years are either pregnant or have given birth.

en: In Kisumu County, a multi-sectoral group headed by ODM leader Raila Odinga’s wife, Ida Odinga, is at the forefront in raising awareness against premarital sex.
luo: E Kaunti ma Kisumu, grup moro moriwo joma owuok e kidienje mopogore opogore, kendo motelne gi Ida Odinga ma jaod Raila Odinga, jatelo ma ODM, timo kinda ahinya e kwedo terruok e kind joma pok odonjo e kend.

en: Otieno says her initiative has helped prevent some of the young girls in her centre from being exposed to sexual predators.

mt0: Otieno says her initiative has helped prevent some of the young girls in her centre from being exposed to sexual predators.

en: Benta Awino, a mother of two, is one of the beneficiaries of Otieno’s rescue programme.

mt0: Benta Awino, a mother of two, is one of the beneficiaries of Otieno's rescue programme.

en: Awino’s house in Orongo Village was recently deluged by heavy rains, which forced her to relocate. Otieno took the youthful widow in.

en: Also rendered impassable was the road linking Kijabe Mission Hospital to Moi South Lake.
luo: Ndara mawuok Kijabe Mission Hospital nyaka  Moi South Lake bende ok kalre.
mt0: Also rendered impassable was the road linking Kijabe Mission Hospital to Moi South Lake.

en: According to Njoki Nyanjui, one of the affected farmers, the flooding started on Sunday following heavy rains in the upper catchment area.
luo: Njoki Nyanjui, ma en achiel kuom joma puothegi otimo ataro, wacho ni pi oula ne ochako timo ataro Jumapil bang koth maduong' chwe e gwenge man yo ka malo.
mt0: Njoki Nyanjui, one of the affected farmers, said the flooding started on Sunday after heavy rains in the upper catchment area.

en: She said the waters had flooded their farms and roads, leaving a trail of destruction.
luo: Owacho ni puothegi kod ndernigo otimo ataro kendo gik moko okethre nyowuoyo.
mt0: 她說水淹沒了他們的田和道路, 留下一條路的毀滅。

en: Njoki called on the county government to address the issue of drainage, terming it a major challenge facing the area.
luo: Njoki ne okwayo sirkal ma kaunti mondo okaw okang' mar loso yore ma pi oula kaloe. Owacho ni pi oula keloga chandruok maduong' e alworano.
mt0: Njoki called on the county government to address the issue of drainage, calling it a major challenge facing the area.

en: According to a message sent by the Red Cross, there were indications that the ongoing rains could cause more floods in the region.
luo: Kaluwore gi ripot moro mar jo Red Cross, nenore ni koth madhi nyimeni, dhi medo kelo ataro e  alworano.
mt0: According to a message sent by the Red Cross, there were indications that the ongoing rains could cause more floods in the region.

en: KeNHA warns motorists against using Goye crossing as floods wreak havoc
luo: Riwruok mar KeNHA siemo jo mtokni ni kaka pi oula dhi nyime timo ataro, kik giluw Goye crossing.
mt0: KeNHA warning motorists against using Goye crossing as floods wreak havoc.

en: Kenya National Highways Authority (KeNHA) has warned motorists against crossing Goye causeway due to the overflowing Lake Victoria.
luo: Riwruok mar Kenya National Highways Authority (KeNHA) siemo jo mtokni ni nikech Nam Viktoria ma koro o, kik giluw daraja ma Goye.
mt0: Kenya National Highways Authority (KeNHA) aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa a

en: According to KeNHA, the situation is as a result of the heavy rainfall pounding the Nyanza region, affecting sections of the Lake Victoria basin.
luo: "KeNHA wacho ni Nam o nikech koth mang'eny mosebedo kachwe e alwora mar Nyanza, kendo mano osekelo chandruok ne joma odak e alwora mar Nambno."
mt0: According to KeNHA, the situation is as a result of the heavy rainfall pounding the Nyanza region, affecting sections of the Lake Victoria basin.

en: "Since there is no alternative access to Osieko, we wish to advise motorists along that section not to attempt crossing the overtopped section, and to only cross when water levels are low," said KeNHA.
luo: Giwacho ni, "Nikech onge yo machielo mar chopo Osieko, wakwayo jo mtokni ni kik gitem kalo daraja ma pi oumono, girit nyaka pi dog chien."
mt0: "Since there is no alternative access to Osieko, we wish to advise motorists along that section not to attempt crossing the overtopped section, and to only cross when water levels are low," said KeNHA.

en: The authority further warned trucks against using the crossing as they evaluate mechanisms of undertaking works on the structure.
luo: KeNHA ne owacho ni loche ok onego okal darajano, pod ginono kaka ginyalo medo tego darajano.
mt0: 政府又警告了卡车勿用桥梁,在他们评估着工程的流程。

en: Goye crossing, which was built in 1975, was estimated to operate for 20 years before a new one could be built.
luo: Ne oger daraja ma Goye  e higa mar 1975. Ka ne igere, ne owach ni onyalo tiyo kuom higni 20 kae to igero daraja machielo.
mt0: Goye crossing, which was built in 1975, was estimated to operate for 20 years before a new one could be built.

en: On Wednesday, commuters were stranded for the better part of the day as they waited for the water levels to go down.
luo: Pi ne odino ne jowuoth chieng' Tich Adek mi girito chiegni odiechieng' mangima mondo pi odog chien.
mt0: 只係在星期三,乘客們在等待水位下降的過程中,好長一段時間都被困住了。

en: Onyango Oduma, a driver, told The Standard that he has not reported to work because of the condition of the road. "I've not been able to cross to the other side to get sand for my clients."
luo: Onyango Oduma, ma en dereva ne owacho ne The Standard ni pok odhi e tich nikech chal mar ndara. "Ok anyal ng'ado dhi lokacha omo kuoyo ne kastembega."
mt0: "I've not been able to cross to the other side to get sand for my clients," Onyango Oduma, a driver, told The Standard that he has not reported to work because of the condition of the road. "I've not been able to cross to the other side to get sand for my clients."

en: Oduma said the failure by the government to construct the bridge despite numerous complaints from the residents has led to the current situation, adding several operations have been affected.
luo: Oduma wacho ni chandruogni obedoe nikech sirkal ok osewinjo ywak mang'eny mag jo kanyo mondo ogernegi daraja manyien. Owacho ni tije mang'eny e alworano osechung' nikech darajano.

en: Last week, transport along the busy road was paralysed for hours following an accident.
luo: Juma mokalo, mtokni ne ok nyal ringo e ndarano kuom seche mang'eny nikech masira mar ndara ma ne otimore.
mt0: Last week, transport along the busy road was paralysed for hours following an accident.

en: Residents called on the government to repair the road to save them costs they incur and the time they waste using the dilapidated road.
luo: Raia ma kanyo kwayo sirkal mondo olosnegi ndarano mondo giwe tiyo gi pesa mang'eny kendo ketho seche sama gitiyo gi ndara ma koro osekethoreno.
mt0: 居民呼籲政府修建道路以省錢和時間浪費。

en: A truck overturned and blocked the road leading to a snarl-up.
luo: Lori moro ne opodho mi olokore ataro e chuny ndara modino yo. Omiyo mtokni ne ochanore e ndara ma onge kama gikalie.
mt0: 只係要翻車, 路障開咗。

en: A commuter, Dorothy Achieng who had an appointment at Got Agulu Hospital, said she was forced to walk for more than two kilometres.
luo: Dorothy Achieng, ma ne nie achiel kuom mtoknigo ne dhi Got Agulu Hospital. Owacho ni ne ochune wuotho gi tiende kilomita ariyo nikech mtokni ne ok nyal ringo.
mt0: Dorothy Achieng, a commuter who had an appointment at Got Agulu Hospital, said she was forced to walk for more than two kilometres.

en: Aggrey Ochieng, a resident, termed the road critical to the economy of the county and accused local leaders of neglecting it. “We have raised the issue with the MP, governor and KeNHA but nothing has been done.”
luo: Aggrey Ochieng, modak e alworano wacho ni ndara en gima dwarore ahinya mondo dongruok moro amora obedie e yore mag yuto e kauntino. Owacho ni jotelo ma kanyo osefwayo wach loso ndarano. Owacho niya: "Wasetero wach ndara ne jabungewa,  ne gavana kendo ne riwruok mar KeNHA, to onge gima gisetimo."
mt0: Aggrey Ochieng, a resident, called the road critical to the economy of the county and accused local leaders of neglecting it. "We have raised the issue with the MP, governor and KeNHA but nothing has been done."

en: Elisha Odhiambo, a resident of Usenge Town, said they were spending a lot of money on car repairs.
luo: Elisha Odhiambo modak Usenge Taon  wacho ni gitiyo gi pesa mang'eny ahinya e loso mtokni nikech ndara marachno.
mt0: 只係要知道。 Elisha Odhiambo, a resident of Usenge Town, acknowledged that they were spending a lot of money on car repairs.

en: Matatus and boda boda riders have also hiked fares, said Odhiambo.
luo: Odhiambo medo ni, "Jo matatu kod jo boda boda bende osemedo nengo ahinya nikech ndarano."

en: Yesterday, KeNHA said that there were plans of constructing a permanent bridge.
luo: KeNHA nyoro owacho ni gin gi chenro mar gero daraja machielo motegno.
mt0: Yesterday, KeNHA said that there were plans to construct a permanent bridge.

en: "Procurement process is underway to solve the rising Lake Victoria water levels at that crossing," KeNHA said.

mt0: "Procurement process is underway to solve the rising Lake Victoria water levels at that crossing," KeNHA said.

en: The face of Siaya town has tremendously changed thanks to devolution that has not only attracted investors in the once sleepy, dusty town but seen the initiation of a number of projects.
luo: Siaya taon osegerore nyowuoyo nikech sirkal moter e kauntino. Kuom higni mang'eny  Siaya taon oseng'ere kaka taon motimo buru kendo monindo aninda. Kata kamano, nikech oter sirkal kuno, mano oseywayo jo ohala kendo osemiyo ochak chenro mang'eny mag dongruok.
mt0: 只係要知道。 因為政府的介入, 不僅吸引了一批投資者, 而且促成了許多項目的開始。

en: Development projects are slowly changing the fortunes of the town that has struggled to find a footing despite it being the headquarters of the county but questions have been raised on the amount spent on some of the projects.
luo: Mos mos chenro mag dongruok konyo e yore mag yuto e taondno. Kata kamano, ji chich gi kwan mar pesa miwacho ni otigo e chenro mamoko mag taondno.
mt0: विकास项目渐渐改变了这座城市,尽管这座城市是县的中心,但一些项目支出的金额有问题。

en: Siaya town has grown from a market formally known as Ahindi years ago to the district headquarters and now to county headquarters.
luo: Siaya taon osetimo dongruok mang'eny. Higni machon ne en mana chiro miluongo ni Ahindi, kae to obedo taon maduong' mar distrikt, sani to en taon maduong' mar Kaunti.
mt0: Siaya town has grown from a market formally known as Ahindi years ago to the district headquarters and now to the county headquarters.

en: Among the projects changing the face of Siaya is the Sh340 million Siaya High Court building that is nearing completion.
luo: Achiel kuom dongruoge madongo maloko kit Siaya en od Kot Maduong' ma Siaya migero sani. Odno igero gi milion 340  kendo ochiegni rumo.
mt0: 在改變了西亞的項目中,有一個是西亞最高法院的建築物,估計是340 億的。

en: Judiciary Chief Registrar Ann Amadi inspected the building last December and gave it a clean bill of health saying the works were almost complete.
luo: Ann Amadi ma en  Judiciary Chief Registrar ne onono Odno Desemba mokalo. Ne owacho ni tich otire maber kendo ni odno chiegni rumo.
mt0: 只係要知道。 司法部首席律師安阿米迪去年十二月檢查了該建築物,並表示工程已經差不多完成。

en: The county government also recently spent Sh43 million on Ahindi Gardens and the governor’s park that were commissioned by Devolution Cabinet Secretary Eugene Wamalwa.
luo: Sirkal ma kaunti nyocha otiyo gi milion 43 e loso Ahindi Gardens kod kar bayo mar gavana. Eugene Wamalwa ma en Jatelo Maduong' e Weche Sirkal mag Kaunti ema ne oketo seyi mondo chenrogo odhi nyime.

en: Wamalwa also commissioned the new Sh75 million county headquarters.
luo: Wamalwa bende ne oketo seyi mondo oger ofis manyien mar kaunti madhi kawo milion 75.
mt0: Wamalwa also commissioned the new Sh75 million county headquarters.

en: The county government has also spent Sh165 million on renovating the Siaya County Referral Hospital.
luo: Sirkal ma kauntino bende osetiyo gi milion 165 e loso  Siaya County Referral Hospital.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 州政府也花了 超過 165 億 元 在蘇亞州的蘇亞醫院的重建。

en: Governor Cornel Rasanga said another ongoing project is Sh400million ultra-modern stadium which is 90 per cent complete.
luo: Gavana Cornel Rasanga wacho ni gedo machielo moseger pasent 90 en stediam manyasani ma okawo milion 400.
mt0: 另一个正在进行的项目是 400 万 元 现代体育场, 目前已经 90 百分之百完工。

en: The Sh100 million street lighting project by National Government and tarmac roads within town that were part of the Siaya-Nyadorera highway project, have also contributed to the town’s new look.
luo: Gik moko ariyo ma bende osemedo loko kit taon ma Siaya gin: chenro mar Sirkal mar Kenya  mar keto stima e nderni. Chenrono ne okawo milion 100. Gimachielo en chenro mar Sirkal ma Kenya mar keto lam e nderni maringo e Siaya taon, chenrono otudore gi chenro mar ndara ma ne oger kowuok Siaya nyaka Nyadorera.
mt0: 只係要知道。 國家政府的 100 億元路燈工程和城內的馬路, 這些都是 Siaya-Nyadorera highway project的一部分。

en: Kennedy Onyango, a resident of Siaya town said some of the projects such as the street lighting project were as a result of the goodwill that had been bolstered by the Handshake between ODM leader Raila Odinga and President Uhuru Kenyatta.
luo: Kennedy Onyango, modak Siaya wacho ni moko kuom dongruok mosebedoe kaka wach keto stima e nderni ma Siaya obiro nikech winjruok ma ne omedo bedoe e kind jatelo mar ODM Raila Odinga kod Ker Uhuru Kenyatta bang' Mosruok.
mt0: Kennedy Onyango, a resident of Siaya town said some of the projects such as the street lighting project were as a result of the goodwill that had been fostered by the Handshake between ODM leader Raila Odinga and President Uhuru Kenyatta.

en: John Odhiambo, also a resident, noted there was a big improvement on the face of Siaya but raised concerns on the cost of most of the projects, especially those done by the county government.
luo: John Odhiambo, ma bende odak Siaya oyie ni osetim dongruok mang'eny Siaya kata kamano, ochich gi pesa mang'eny mokalo miwacho ni otigo e chenro moko, to ahinya ahinya e chenro mag sirkal ma kaunti.
mt0: John Odhiambo, also a resident, noted that Siaya had a big improvement but raised concerns on the cost of most of the projects, especially those done by the county government.

en: Walter Okello, the Lands chief officer said the county government has also started demolishing temporary structures to create order and improve the image of the town.
luo: Walter Okello, ma en Jatelo mar Lowo, wacho ni sirkal ma kaunti osechako muko udi maricho richo manie taon mondo gikel chenro maber e taon kendo gi med bero taondno.
mt0: Walter Okello, the Lands chief officer said the county government has also started demolishing temporary structures to create order and improve the image of the town.

en: He added that there is need for residents with old buildings within the town to renovate them so they conform with the standards of a town.
luo: Owacho ni dwarore ni jokanyo ma nigi udi moti e taon olos udigigo mondo ginen maber kaka udi mamoko e taon.
mt0: 他又说,要想让老建筑在城里重新被修建,需要居民在城里有老建筑的需要改善它们,以符合城的标准。

en: We have currently stopped renewing leases of those with old buildings unless they are renovated.
luo: Gie sani, ok wami joma udigi oti lease (ratiro ma sirkal miyo ji kinde ka kinde mar tiyo gi lowo) mak mana ka gigero udigigo maber.
mt0: 现在我们停止续租那些有老楼的租约,除非他们重新装修。

en: “Those with temporary structures that will be demolished have also been showed a trading area within town where they are required to put up their business structures,” Okello said.
luo: Okello ne owacho ni Joma nigi ute maricho richo mibiro muk osesiemnegi kar ohala e alwora mar taon ma onego gigerie ute ohala.
mt0: "Those with temporary structures that will be demolished have also been shown a trading area within town where they are required to put up their business structures," Okello said.

en: Professor Paul Achola, who is the chair of the municipality board in the county, says several years ago, Siaya was just a market and social centre but it has grown.
luo: Profesa Paul Achola, ma en jakom mar munisipal mar bod ma kaunti wacho ni higni mang'eny mokalo Siaya ne en mana chiro kod kama ji ne biro bayoe, to gie sani, Siaya osedongo.
mt0: Professor Paul Achola, who is the chair of the municipality board in the county, says several years ago, Siaya was just a market and social centre but it has grown.

en: He said in 1940s, the current Siaya town was only known as Ahindi market where people came to purchase food and household products.
luo: Owacho ni e higni mag  1940 Siaya taon masani, ne en mana chiro ma Ahindi. Ji ne biro ng'iewo chiemo kod gik ot.
mt0: 他说, 1940 年代,现在的西雅县只叫阿印度市场,人们来买食品和家用产品。

en: It was also a social centre for sporting activities before it became the district headquarters.
luo: Kae to obedo kar tuke kaka spot kapok obedo taon maduong' mar distrikt.
mt0: 只係是一個社會中心, 但係是一個運動中心, 但係是一個區域總部。

en: Rasanga said that the development projects are sufficient evidence that devolution is working.
luo: Rasanga wacho ni dongruok matimore sani nyiso maler ni wach tero sirkal e kaunti tiyo maber.
mt0: 只係要知道。 如果唔知, 就說你唔知。 羅桑加說, 這些發展項目是足夠的證明, 政府的權力運作正在運作。

en: “Evidently, the county government of Siaya continues to implement projects with a view of improving the socio-economic well-being of the citizens and changing the landscape of Siaya town,” Rasanga noted.
luo: Rasanga wacho ni, "Nenore ni sirkal ma kaunti mar Siaya dhi nyime kelo dongruok ma konyo e yore ohala kendo medo bero ngima ji e oganda. Lokruogego loko kit Siaya taon."
mt0: “Evidently, the county government of Siaya continues to implement projects with a view of improving the socio-economic well-being of the citizens and changing the landscape of Siaya town,” Rasanga noted.

en: “My government’s partnership with the World Bank through Kenya Devolution Support Programme and Kenya Urban Support Programme have since seen us implement some key projects in the county.”
luo: “Riwruok ma sirkanda osebedogo kanyachiel gi  World Bank kokalo kuom Kenya Devolution Support Programme kod Kenya Urban Support Programme osekonyowa timo dongruok madongo e kauntini.”
mt0: “My government’s partnership with the World Bank through the Kenya Devolution Support Programme and the Kenya Urban Support Programme has since seen us implement some key projects in the county.”

en: Siaya Governor Cornel Rasanga was put in a spot for allegedly spending more money from the county emergency fund than the initial budget in the fight against Covid-19.
luo: Ne openj Gavana ma Siaya, Cornel Rasanga gimomiyo ne otiyo gi pesa mang'eny moloyo ma ne owal ni otigo e kedo gi masira mar Korona. Pesano ne wuok e aguch masira mar kaunti.

en: In a virtual meeting with the Senate Standing Committee on Health yesterday, Mr Rasanga was hard-pressed to explain where he got Sh115 million for Covid-19 related activities yet the money allocated to the county emergency fund was Sh100 million.
luo: E romo ma ne gitimo e intanet nyoro gi  Senate Standing Committee on Health, ne oket Mr Rasanga kama diny mondo oler kama ne ogoloe milion 115 ma ne otigo e weche motudre gi masira mar Korona to pesa ma kaunti ne owalo ne masirano ne en mana milion 100.
