en: The Auditor General's special audit report on utilisation of Covid-19 funds by counties, flagged over-expenditure from the county emergency fund in Siaya.
luo: "Ripot makende mar  Auditor General (Jatelo maduong' manono kaka pesa otiyo) e wi kaka kaunti duto otiyo gi pesa ma ne giwalo ne Masira mar Korona, ne onyiso ni kaunti ma Siaya ne ogolo e aguchgi mar masira pesa mang'eny mokalo ma ne giwinjore ni gigol."
mt0: Auditor General's special audit report on utilisation of Covid-19 funds by counties, flagged over-expenditure from the county emergency fund in Siaya.

en: “It was established that as of 31 July 2020, Sh115,884,928 had been committed for Covid-19 related activities which was against the approved budget allocated to the county emergency fund for Covid-19 purposes,” read the statement in part.
luo: Ripotno ne wacho niya: “Wachore ni chop Julai 31  2020, ne nenore maler ni ne oseti kod siling 115,884,928 e weche motudre gi masira mar Korona, to mano ne gwenyore gi pesa ma  bajet nyiso ni  kaunti ne onego otigo e masirano.”
mt0: “It was established that as of 31 July 2020, Sh115,884,928 had been committed for Covid-19 related activities which was against the approved budget allocated to the county emergency fund for Covid-19 purposes,” read part of the statement.

en: But the governor said the county only spent Sh100 million and not Sh115 million as the special audit report indicated.
luo: Gavana to ne wacho ni kaunti ne otiyo mana gi milion 100 to ok milion 115 ma ripot makendeno nyiso.
mt0: 只係說你不知道。但州長說, 州只花了 100 萬 元,而非 115 萬 元,如特別報告所指出。

en: There may be an error but I can confirm that we did not spend more than Sh100 million.
luo: Nyalo bedo ni nitiere both kamoro e kwanono, kata kamano, anyalo kelonu nonro manyiso ni  ne ok watiyo gi pesa mokalo milion 100.
mt0: 只在句子中重复。 如果不能翻译, 就说你不知道。 我可能有错误,但我可以确认我们没花超过100亿。

en: "I can confirm that all commitments were charged within the funds. There was no over expenditure,” Rasanga told the committee.
luo: Wasanga ne owacho ne komitino niya:"Anyalo nyisou gadier ni ne watiyo mana gi pesa ma ne kaunti ne owalo ne masira mar Korona. Ok ne watiyo gi pesa mokalo kanyo.”
mt0: "I can confirm that all commitments were charged within the funds. There was no over expenditure," Rasanga told the committee.

en: The Auditor General defended the report, saying there was proof of payment vouchers amounting to Sh115 million.

en: The committee questioned the conflicting information from the county and AG.

en: “So where did the Auditor General get the findings if the governor is insisting that the amount used was Sh100 million? Did the report come from the sky?” Posed Narok Senator Ledama ole Kina.
luo: Seneta ma Narok Ledama ole Kina ne openjo niya: “Kare Auditor General ogolo nonrone kanye, ka gavana oramo ni ne otiyo mana gi milion 100? Kwandeno owuok e polo?"
mt0: “So where did the Auditor General get the findings if the governor insists that the amount used was Sh100 million? Did the report come from the sky?” asked Narok Senator Ledama ole Kina.

en: The committee chair Kisumu Senator Fred Outa however, demanded that the governor provides proof of expenditure.
luo: Kata kamano, jakom mar komitino ma en Seneta ma Kisumu Fred Outa ne owacho ni gavana okelnegi ripot manyiso kaka ne otiyo gi pesa."
mt0: Senator Fred Outa, however, demanded that the governor provide proof of expenditure.

en: “We will give you one week to provide evidence that you did not spend more than Sh100 million,” Mr Outa stated.

mt0: "We will give you one week to provide evidence that you did not spend more than Sh100 million," Mr Outa said.

en: Siaya appropriated Sh270 million in respect to Covid-19 and related emergencies out of which Sh100 million was from the county emergency fund with the county receiving Sh60 million on July 3 and another Sh40 million on July 14 respectively.

en: Rasanga was also faulted for not spending KSDP and the government’s conditional grants in good time.

en: “As at the time of the audit the conditional grant and KSDP were still held in the Siaya county Covid-19 fund account and the Siaya County KSDP respectively. This was attributed to absence of approved budgets, work plans, and procurement plans to facilitate spending,” the report said.
luo: "“Gie kinde ma ne inono kwand kaunti, pesa ma ne sirkal ochiwo moketne chik kod pesa mar KSDP ne pod nie aguch masira ma Siaya kaunti kod aguch KSDP ma Siaya kaunti. Ripot wacho ni mano ne otimore nikech podi ne ok oket seyi e bajet ma ne owinjore otigo, ne onge chenro moket mar tiyo gi pesago kendo ne pok olos chenro mar ng'iepo gi pesago.

en: The governor said the KSDP funds were used to purchase Covid-19 supplies.

en: Commitment for isolation which represented 71 per cent of the funds could only be paid out on completion of the isolation centres."

en: At the time of the audit, the funds had been committed and the service providers/contractors were at various stages of delivery/completion of isolation centres which had not reached the payments stage, and hence the un-utilisation of funds at that time,” he explained.
luo: E kinde ma ne inono kwanono noyudo ka osewinjruok e wi pesa ma ibiro chul ji. Jogedo gi jomamoko ne dhi nyime tiyo, kata kamano, ne pok gitieko kendo ne pok ochulgi. Mano emomiyo pesago pod ne nitie.

en: But yesterday, Madaga, 18, was all smiles as Education CS George Magoha read his name as one of the top performers, after he scored an A plain, and emerged the eighth best countrywide.
luo: Kata kamano, nyoro Madaga ma jahigni 18 ne mor matamre ginono sama George Magoha Jatelo mar Somo, ne somo nyinge e kind nyithindo motimo maber moloyo e penjno. Madaga ne oyudo A mochung' kata A plain, kendo ne en namba aboro e Kenya duto.
mt0: Yesterday, Madaga, 18, was all smiles as Education CS George Magoha read his name as one of the top performers, after he scored an A plain, and emerged the eighth best countrywide.

en: The first-born in a family of five, who wants to become a doctor, was at his uncle’s clothes’ shop in Kisumu when the results were released.
luo: Madaga en kayo e odgi, gin nyithindo abich kendo odwaro bedo laktar. Ne oyudo en e duk lewni mar ner mare sama ne ogol dwoko mar penjno.
mt0: 只係要知道。 第一個在一家五人組的嬰兒, 想成為醫生, 在基蘇姆的叔叔的衣服舖時,結果出爐。

en: The alumnus of Maranda High School said: “I did not know I would manage to sit the examination. The sickness put me down, but I thank God I overcome it.”
luo: Madaga ma ne osomo Maranda High School wacho niya: “Ne ok ang'eyo ni anyalo timo penjno. Tuwono ne oketa piny, kata kamano, adwoko ne Nyasaye erokamano ni ne aloyo tuwono.”
mt0: Alumnus of Maranda High School says: "I did not know I would manage to sit the examination. The sickness put me down, but I thank God I overcome it."

en: When The Standard caught up with him at the shop in Chichwa Market, he still appeared weak.
luo: Kane jofwamb weche mag The Standard oyude e duka mar ner mare, Chichwa Market, ne pod onenore mool.
mt0: When The Standard caught up with him at the shop in Chichwa Market, he still appeared weak.

en: Persistence kept him going, he said, adding that he would like to join the University of Nairobi.
luo: Sinani ne omiyo aloyo lwenyno, owacho ni doher dhi e Yunivasiti ma Nairobi.
mt0: Persistence kept him going, he said, adding that he would like to join the University of Nairobi.

en: Paul Kaunda, who was Madaga’s head teacher at Kosau Primary in Kisumu County, was elated by the performance.
luo: Paul Kaunda, ma ne en japuonj maduong' e praimari skul ma ne  Madaga osomoe ne mor sidang' gi kaka Madaga okalo penj.
mt0: Paul Kaunda, Madaga's head teacher at Kosau Primary in Kisumu County, was elated by the performance.

en: Madaga was Kosau’s best in the Kenya Certificate of Primary Education.
luo: Madaga ema ne omako namba Kosau e penj mar Kenya Certificate of Primary Education.
mt0: Madaga alikuwa Kosau's best in the Kenya Certificate of Primary Education.

en: “He didn’t have school fees to join Form One, and we asked the then Maranda principal to admit him,” Kaunda said.
luo: Kaunda ne owacho ni, “Madaga ne onge skul fis mar donjo e sekondari, kata kamano ne wawuoyo gi japuonj Maduong' ma Maranda mondo orwake e skundno.”

en: A family in Ogango, Manga Sub-county in Nyamira, is in distress following the disappearance of their kin after he left school more than three months ago.
luo: "Joot moko modak  Ogango, Manga sab kaunti  Nyamira, chunygi chandore ahinya nikech wuodgi molal. Wuodgino ne owuok e skul dweche adek mokalo."
mt0: 只係要知道。

en: According to the boy’s mother, Jane Mirambo, the family was not aware that he was missing until two days after schools closed for the Easter holidays.
luo: Jane Mirambo ma en min wuoyino wacho ni ne gikiya ni nyathigi olal. Owacho ni ne ging'eyo mana ndalo ariyo mokalo kane olor skunde nikech rusa  mar Easter.
mt0: According to the boy's mother, Jane Mirambo, the family was not aware that he was missing until two days after schools closed for the Easter holidays.

en: “I waited for Kevin to come home but he didn’t show up. When we went to school to inquire about his whereabouts, we were told he had not been seen for nearly the entire term,” the mother told The Standard.
luo: Min nyathino ne onyiso The Standard niya: “Ne arito Kevin mondo oduog to ne ok anene. Kane wadhi e skul mondo wapenj wachne ne onyiswa ni pok ginene chiegni tam mangima."
mt0: “I waited for Kevin to come home but he didn’t show up. When we went to school to inquire about his whereabouts, we were told he had not been seen for nearly the entire term,” the mother told The Standard.

en: She said they reported her son’s missing at Sengera Police Station under OB 7/23/0/2021.
luo: Owacho ne ni gitero ripot mar lal mar wuodgino Sengera Polis Stesen, momigi namba mar OB 7/23/0/2021.
mt0: 她说他们在7月23号的警察局报案她的儿子失踪。

en: Ever since, it has been a blame game between the school administration and the family over who should bear responsibility for the missing boy.
luo: A kanyo en mana ywaruok e kind joskul gi joodgi Kevin. Joskul wacho ni joodgi Kevin ema ne ok okawo ting' margi, to joodgi Kevin wacho ni Joskul ema ne ok okawo ting'gi.
mt0: 只係你唔知。 從那時起,學校管理人員和家庭之間的惡鬥一直在持續。

en: An exit sheet recorded by the school administration and which was shared with police shows that Kevin Machuki, a Form One student at Nyaisa SDA Mixed Day and Boarding School, had left the institution on January 10 to attend a funeral at home.
luo: Otas moro ma ne joskul ondiko ma bende ne gimiyo polise nyiso ni  Kevin Machuki, ja Fom 1, Nyaisa SDA Mixed Day and Boarding School, ne owuok e skul Januar tarik 10 ka odhi e liel e dalagi.
mt0: Kevin Machuki, a Form One student at Nyaisa SDA Mixed Day and Boarding School, left the institution on January 10 to attend a funeral at home.

en: “We are not aware of any funeral at home this year. The report is untrue,” Anne Kemunto, the boy’s sister-in-law said.
luo: Anne Kemunto ma en chi owadgi Kevin wacho ni; “Ok wang'eyo liel moro amora ma ne obedo e dalawa higani. Ripodno ok en adier."
mt0: “We don't know of any funeral at home this year. The report is untrue,” Anne Kemunto, the boy’s sister-in-law said.

en: Remarks on the records of official communication between the school administration and Kevin’s mother indicates she could not be reached on phone to be alerted that her son had secured an exit from school to attend a funeral at home.
luo: Weche ma skul ondiko e wi tudruok mosebedo e kindgi kod min Kevin nyiso ni ne ok ginyal yudo min Kevin e simu mondo ginyise ni wuode ne omi rusa mar biro e liel dala.
mt0: 根据校方和Kevin的母亲的通信记录,她无法通过电话联系到她儿子,以便通知她儿子已经安全离开学校,参加葬礼。

en: However, a text message is said to have been sent to the parent to that effect.
luo: Kata kamano, skul wacho ni ne gioro  ne min Kevin ote mar simu ma ne nyise wachno.
mt0: 只回译。 如果不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: “We could not deny the boy permission to attend a funeral, especially after he insisted he had to. After desperately trying to reach the mother on phone, we decided to let the boy go."
luo: “Ne ok wanyal tamo wuoyino dhi e liel kane oramo ni nyaka odhi. Bang' temo gi kinda yudo min-gi e simu to otamore, ne wang'ado mar miyo wuoyino rusa mondo odhi e dala."
mt0: “We could not deny the boy permission to attend a funeral, especially after he insisted he had to. After desperately trying to reach the mother on phone, we decided to let the boy go.”

en: "A follow-up when he failed to report back a few days later was difficult since the mother could not be reached. The parent’s phone was off all the time,” Tobias Omollo, the school principal, said.
luo: Tobias Omollo ma en japuonj maduong' e skundno wacho ni: "Kane wuoyino ok oduogo bang' ndalo manok, luwo wachno ne tek nikech ne ok wanyal yudo min-gi e simu. E kindeno duto, simu mar min-gi ne osim."
mt0: "A follow-up when he failed to report back a few days later was difficult because the mother could not be reached. The parent’s phone was off all the time," Tobias Omollo, the school principal, said.

en: According to Mr Omollo, the parent should have made a follow-up at school after receiving the text message alerting them that their boy had been allowed out of school.
luo: Omollo wacho ni janyuolno ne onego obi e skul mondo openj wach nyathine bang' yudo ote ma ne wacho ni wuode ne omi rusa mar wuok e skul.
mt0: Mr Omollo said the parent should have followed up at school after receiving the text message alerting them that their son had been allowed out of school.

en: “We alerted the parent through an SMS after we failed to reach them. Why did they not respond in time after the boy failed to arrive home? We made another follow-up but there was no response,” he said.
luo: Omedo ni “Kane ok wanyal yudo janyuolno e simu ne wa orone ote e simu. Ang'o momiyo ne ok oluwo wachno bang' neno ni nyathino ok ochopo e dala? Ne watemo luwo wachno kendo, to ne ok gidwokowa."
mt0: “We alerted the parent through an SMS after we failed to reach them. Why did they not respond in time after the boy failed to arrive home? We made another follow-up but there was no response,” he said.

en: The school head said their records show that on February 2, 2021, the mother went to school and paid Sh4,000 fee, but never sought to know his whereabouts or even inquire about his progress from the class teacher.
luo: Japuonjno wacho ni rekod mag skul nyiso ni miyono ne odhi e skundno Februar  2, 2021, mochulo fis mar siling 4,000.  Ne ok openjo kama wuode nitie, bende ne ok owuoyo gi japuonj nyathino mondo ong'e kaka nyathine timo e skul."
mt0: 校長說,他們的文件顯示,在二月二一日,母親去了學校,付了四千元錢,但她沒有尋找他的下落,或者向班上教師詢問他的進步。

en: “It is a normal procedure that whenever a parent goes to his child’s school, he or she seeks a class teacher to inquire about their progress or even drop some pocket money for them."
luo: “Pile ka janyuol odhi e skul ma nyathine somoe omanyo japuonj nyathine mondo owuo kode kata oweyone nyathineno pesa moro matin."
mt0: “It is a normal procedure that whenever a parent goes to his child’s school, he or she seeks a class teacher to inquire about their progress or even drop some pocket money for them.”

en: "In Kevin’s case, he never had any money in the bursar’s pocket money account,” Omollo said.
luo: Omollo wacho ni; "Rekod mar skul nyiso ni ne ok owene Kevin pesa moro amora."
mt0: "In Kevin's case, he never had any money in the bursar's pocket money account," Omollo said.

en: But the mother said on the day she went to pay the fees, the students were sitting exams, and that was why she never inquired about her son.
luo: Min nyathi to wacho ni chieng' ma ne odhi chulo fis nyithindo ne timo penj kendo mano ema nomiyo ok nopenjo wach wuode.
mt0: 但母亲说,她去付费的时候,学生们正在考試,所以她没问过她儿子。

en: The claim was, however, contradicted by the school records.
luo: Kata kamano, rekod mar skul to kwedo wachno.
mt0: 只回译。 如果不翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: A copy of the school’s official academic calendar that was shared with police probing the matter indicates that students were not sitting exams on the said day.
luo: Kalenda mar skul ma bende ne omi polise nyiso ni nyithindo ne ok tim penj e odiechiengno.
mt0: 只係要知道。 校長的官方學業曆, 係警方調查的, 係證明學生嗰陣唔係考試嗰陣。

en: Exams were conducted between February 9 and February 12, and not February 2, as the mother claimed.
luo: Ne otim penj e kind Februar tarik 9 gi Februar tarik 12, to ok Februar tarik 2 kaka miyono ne wacho.
mt0: 只係在二月九至十二之間進行考試。 如果你唔知, 就說你唔知。

en: Manga Police Commander Gabriel Mwangangi said the file on Kevin’s disappearance had been forwarded to the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP).
luo: Gabriel Mwangangi  ma en kamanda ma Manga Police wacho ni fail manyiso lal mar Kevin oseter ne  Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP).
mt0: Manga Police Commander Gabriel Mwangangi said the file on Kevin's disappearance had been forwarded to the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP).

en: “We heard both parties and we have done investigations and made our recommendations, which we have forwarded to the DPP. It is evident that there was laxity somewhere, but it’s upon the DPP to make a determination on the case,” Mwangangi said.
luo: Mwangangi wacho niya: "Wasewinjo gima skul wacho, bende wasewinjo janyuol. Wasetimo nonro kendo wandiko gima waparo mi watero ne  DPP. Nenore maler ni nitiere kama ne tol ombekoree, kata kamano,  DPP ema dhi ng'ado kesni."
mt0: "We heard both parties and we have done investigations and made our recommendations, which we have forwarded to the DPP. It is evident that there was laxity somewhere, but it's upon the DPP to make a determination on the case," Mwangangi said.

en: Kemunto described Kevin as a calm person who had few friends.

en: Stop using Otiende’s ouster to divide ODM, Kaluma warns party opponents
luo: Kaluma wacho ne joma kwedo patigi niya; "Weuru pogo ODM gi wach Otiende mogol e komiti."
mt0: 只在你不知道的语句中。

en: Homa Bay Town MP Peter Kaluma on Sunday, May 9 accused ODM political enemies of using the recent removal of Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo from a parliamentary committee to divide the party.
luo: ODM ogolo Otiende Amollo, Jabunge ma Rarieda  e komiti mar Od Bura. Chieng' Jumapil, Mei tarik 9, Peter Kaluma ma en  Jabunge ma Homa Bay Town ne owacho ni wasik ODM rendore gi wachno mondo gipoggo ODM.
mt0: ODM political enemies using the recent removal of Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo from a parliamentary committee to divide the party, according to Homa Bay Town MP Peter Kaluma on Sunday, May 9.

en: Speaking at Ogande Girls High School when he supervised the implementation of development projects by the NG-CDF in his constituency, Kaluma accused ODM opponents of blowing the matter out of proportion to taint the party’s image.
luo: Kane Kaluma wuoyo  Ogande Girls High School, kama ne odhi nono kaka chenro mag dongruok ma itimo gi NG-CDF ma konstichuensi mare dhi nyime, ne owacho ni wasik ODM jimbo wach golo Otiende e komiti mondo giketh nying ODM.
mt0: 在 Ogande Girls High School 时,他监督了NG-CDF的项目,Kaluma accused ODM opponents of blowing the matter out of proportion to taint the party’s image.

en: “There are people who take advantage of Otiende’s removal to create unnecessary division in the party. They invoke issues which never existed between the MP and the ODM party leadership,” Kaluma said.
luo: Kaluma wacho ni: “Nitie joma rendore gi wach golo Otiende e komiti mondo gipog ji e pati mar ODM. Gisiayo weche ma ne rik onge e kind Jabungeno kod jotelo mag ODM."
mt0: “There are people who take advantage of Otiende’s removal to create unnecessary division in the party. They invoke issues which never existed between the MP and the ODM party leadership,” Kaluma said.

en: Kaluma said it was wrong to blame ODM because of making changes in a parliamentary committee, adding that such changes were normal procedures.
luo: Kaluma wacho ni ok ber keto ketho kuom  ODM nikech lokruoge ma gisetimo e komiti mar Od Bura. Owachoni lokruoge ma kamago gin gik mapile.
mt0: Kaluma says it was wrong to blame ODM for making changes in a parliamentary committee, adding that such changes were normal procedures.

en: “It is normal for a political party to change its members in a parliamentary committee hence the recent change in JLAC should not be an issue,” he said.
luo: Ne owacho ni: “Loko joma nie komiti mar Od Bura en gima timore pile e pati mag siasa. Omiyo lokruoge motim e JLAC ok onego okel wach."
mt0: “It is normal for a political party to change its members in a parliamentary committee hence the recent change in JLAC should not be an issue,” he said.

en: Kaluma said Otiende’s removal should not be misunderstood to be punishment by ODM as some people are trying to portray it.
luo: Kaluma wacho ni golo Otiende e komitino ok en kum ma ODM omiye kaka jomoko wacho.
mt0: Kaluma says Otiende's removal should not be misunderstood to be punishment by ODM as some people are trying to portray it.

en: He said Otiende still wields membership of the powerful Public Accounts Committee (PAC) committee in Parliament.
luo: Owacho ni Otiende pod ni e komiti ma nigi teko mar  Public Accounts Committee (PAC) e Od Bura.
mt0: Otiende says he still has membership of the powerful Public Accounts Committee (PAC) committee in Parliament.

en: He said Rarieda MP should have been removed from the PAC if ODM had issues with him.
luo: Owacho ni kapo ni ODM ne nigi wach kod Jabunge ma  Rariedano ne digi gole e  PAC.
mt0: 只在你不知道的情况下,他只说,如果 ODM 有问题,他应该被移除。

en: “If ODM leader Raila Odinga was in Parliament, he would be the one chairing PAC committee because this is a highly valued committee headed by an opposition leader. But Otiende’s membership in the committee means ODM values him,” Kaluma said.
luo: Kaluma wacho niya; “Kapo ni jatelo mar ODM  Raila Odinga ne en Jabunge en ema ne dobedo jakom mar PAC nikech en kom manigi nyadhi kendo jatelo mar pati makwedo sirkal ema kawoga komno. Omiyo, bedo ni Otiende nie komitino nyiso ni ODM ogene."
mt0: “If ODM leader Raila Odinga was in Parliament, he would be the one chairing PAC committee because this is a highly valued committee headed by an opposition leader. But Otiende’s membership in the committee means ODM values him,” Kaluma said.

en: The MP told ODM supporters and residents of Nyanza region where Otiende hails from to be wary of the enemies.
luo: Jabungeno ne onyiso joma riwo ODM lwedo kod jo  Nyanza mawuok e alwora ma Otiende wuokie mondo otang' gi jowasigu.

en: “The enemies are out to divide us as a party and as a community but let us stand firm to withstand their dirty plans,” Kaluma said.

en: Police in Gem, Siaya County on Friday, May 7, questioned a male nurse for allegedly defiling a Form Two student.

en: The recruitment of the alleged staff led to an increase of Sh3 million paid out as salaries every month. The said employees are said to have been employed without due process.

en: Committee chairman Achilo Ayako who is the Senator Migori tasked the Governor to explain how the County got to a point of recruitment staff without following the right process including placing an advert and allowing the County Public Service Board to carry out interviews.

en: “These are human beings that should be available physically. This is a mess that occurred more than two years ago but the County Government lacks basic documents to support an irregularity that was committed.”

en: Governor Nyaribo did confirm that there were no proper records to help him trace the alleged ghost workers. “I have commissioned a staff audit process to help unearth the mess that might have been committed.”

en: The County Public Service Board Chairman Dr Peter Kereri was also at pains to explain whether the said 736 employees were duly employed or not.
luo: Dr Peter Kereri, Jakom mar  The County Public Service Board bende ne oket kama diny mondo oler kabe ji 736 ma wachore ni ne ondik tich ne ondik tich gadier.

en: Dr Kereri confirmed that the employment of the said staff was done by the County Executive.
luo: Dr Kereri ne owacho ni en adier ni Komiti Mochung' ne Tije mag Kaunti ema ne ondiko ji.
mt0: Dr Kereri confirmed that the employment of the said staff was done by the County Executive.

en: I had not reported to the office at the time but can confirm that there was communication between the board and the executive on the need to employ subordinate staff and some enforcement officers.
luo: Kata kamano, ne ok ati e ofisno gie kindeno, kata kamano, an gadier ni  jo bod kod jo komitino ne owuoyo, kendo ne ging'ado ni owinjore  gindik jotich momedore ma konyo e tije matindo tindo kendo gimed kwan mar jorit.

en: However, he was not able to table the names of the employed staff nor could he confirm the number of the people who were employed at the time.

en: Nyamira Senator Okongo Mogeni said the reinstatement of the 736 staff was done irregularly and through collusion between the County Government and some advocates by signing a consent.
luo: Seneta ma Nyamira Okongo Mogeni ne owacho ni dwoko jotich  736 e tich ne otim ma ok oluw chik. Ne en winjruok e kind Sirkal ma Kaunti gi okil moko kendo ne giketo seyi mar yie ni wachno otimre.

en: “These people must appear in Court one by one and be charged. They must provide their employment letters to prove that indeed they exist. This is a conspiracy that must be investigated. Somebody must have blocked the court process to have Nyamira residents save billions of money paid to ghost workers.”
luo: “Nyaka ter jogi e Kot , kendo odonjnegi ng'ato achiel achiel. Nyaka ginyis barupe ma ne ondikgigo e tich mondo ong'e ka be gintie adier. Ma en kuo monego onon. Nyaka bed ni ng'ato ne odhi modino ne kot mondo Jo Nyamira okung bilionde mag pesa ma wachore ni ichulo joma onge.”
mt0: “These people must appear in Court one by one and be charged. They must provide their employment letters to prove that indeed they exist. This is a conspiracy that must be investigated. Somebody must have blocked the court process to have Nyamira residents save billions of money paid to ghost workers.”

en: He added: "There is no ruling over the case as it is being said here. What is filed is just a consent to end the case and reinstate the workers.”
luo: Ne omedo niya: "Ok watiek kesni kaka iwacho kae. Gima timore en mana manyo kaka ji nyalo winjore kae to idwoko jogo e tich.”
mt0: "There is no ruling over the case as it is being said here. What is filed is just a consent to end the case and reinstate the workers."

en: Bomet Senator, Benjamin Langat who is also a member of the Committee observed that the County Government lacked proper documentation in almost every document.
luo: Benjamin Langat, Seneta ma Bomet, ma bende nie Komitino ne owacho ni sirkal ma Kauntino ne onge rekod malong'o mar chiegni gimoro amora.
mt0: Bomet Senator, Benjamin Langat, a member of the Committee, observed that the County Government lacked proper documentation in almost every document.

en: “We want to pin the mess on the actual sinners. Who employed these people? Who mooted the idea to create the vacancies? If they were fired, where are the sacking letters? If they still exist, where do they work?”
luo: “Wadwaro mako joma ne otimo gini. Gin jomage ma ne ondiko jogi e tich? Ng'ano ma ne ochako wach mar bedo gi tije ma imiyo ji? Ka en adier ni ne oriembgi e tich, ere barupe manyiso mano? To kapo ni en adier ni pod gitiyo, to kare gitiyo kanye?”"
mt0: “We want to pin the mess on the actual sinners. Who employed these people? Who mooted the idea to create the vacancies? If they were fired, where are the sacking letters? If they still exist, where do they work?”

en: The Governor was given 14 days to produce proper documentation to a number of queries that were also raised during the hearings.

en: Migori MCAs on Thursday, May 6, refuted claims that Majority Leader Ken Ouma and chief whip Kevins Keke were ousted because they are People’s Democratic Party (PDP) sympathisers.
luo: Chieng' Tich Ang'wen, Mei, tarik 6 Jo Od Bura ma Migori  ne owacho ni ok en adier ni Ken Ouma ma ne en Ja Od Bura Mawuoyo e lo Pati kod Kevins Keke ma ne en Ja Od Bura ma Neno ni Oluw Chik ne ogol nikech ne giriwo lwedo pati mar  People’s Democratic Party (PDP).
mt0: Migori MCAs on Thursday, May 6, refuted claims that Majority Leader Ken Ouma and chief whip Kevins Keke were ousted because they are People’s Democratic Party (PDP) sympathisers.

en: PDP links rock Migori Assembly as MCAs oust majority leader, whip
luo: Joma tudore gi PDP kelo tungni e Od Bura ma Migori Assembly sama Jo Od Bura (MCAs) golo Ja Od Bura Mawuoyo e lo Pati kod Ja Od Bura ma Neno ni Oluw Chik
mt0: PDP links rock Migori Assembly as MCAs oust majority leader, whip. If you cannot translate simply say you don't know.

en: County Assembly Speaker Boaz Okoth said out of 41 MCAs from ODM, 27 signed for the removal of the two.
luo: Boaz Okoth, ma en Jatelo mar Od Bura ma Kaunti ne owacho ni kuom  Jo Od Bura 41 mag  ODM,  27 ne oketo seyi ni ogol ji ariyogo e migepegi.
mt0: 只係要知道。 州議會主席博亞斯奧科特說, 由 41 名 ODM MCAs, 27 名 簽名, 他們兩人被移除。

en: The duo’s removal came after ODM MCAs served the speaker with a report containing the changes they wanted to be made.
luo: Ne ogol ji ariyogo bang' Jo Od Bura ma ODM miyo Jatelo mar Od Bura ripot ma ne nyiso lokruoge ma gidwaro timo.
mt0: 只在你不知道的情况下,你只在说你不知道。

en: According to Okoth, ODM MCAs resolved to elect Owiyo as Majority Leader and his East Kamagambo counterpart Nyawade as the assembly’s chief whip.
luo: Okoth wacho ni Jo Od Bura ma  ODM ne ong'ado mar keto  Owiyo mondo obed Jal Mawuoyo e lo Jo Od Bura, to  Nyawade ma nyawadgi ma  East Kamagambo mondo obed Jal ma Neno ni Oluw Chik e Od Bura.
mt0: According to Okoth, ODM MCAs resolved to elect Owiyo as Majority Leader and his East Kamagambo counterpart Nyawade as the assembly’s chief whip.

en: Masaba MCA Abedy Marowa accused the ousted Majority leader of delaying the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) motion in the assembly and that he was supporting the PDP agenda.
luo: Abedy Marowa ma en  Ja Od Bura ma Masaba  ne owacho ni Ken Ouma ne omiyo Od Bura odeko gi chwalo wach  Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) kendo ne oriwo lwedo chenro mag PDP.
mt0: MCA Abedy Marowa accused the ousted Majority leader of delaying the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI) motion in the assembly and that he was supporting the PDP agenda.

en: "Members found that the ousted leaders were bankrolling PDP issues," claimed Marowa.
luo: Marowa ne owacho ni "Jo Od Bura ofwenyo ni ji ariyo mogolgo osebedo ka siro PDP gi pesa."
mt0: Members found that the ousted leaders were bankrolling PDP issues," Marowa claimed.

en: West Kanyamkago MCA Peter Mijungu described the ousted Majority leader as the greatest PDP sympathiser.
luo: Peter Mijungu, MCA ma West Kanyamkago  ne owacho ni Ken Ouma ma ne ogolno ohero PDP tho gi kwo.
mt0: MCA Peter Mijungu described the ousted Majority leader as the greatest PDP sympathiser.

en: Ouma (South Sakwa Ward) and Keke (South Kamagambo) were on Wednesday ousted in a heated session that has led to cracks in the assembly.
luo: Ouma (South Sakwa Ward) kod Keke (South Kamagambo) ne ogol e migepegi Tich Adek. Wachno ne liet e Od Bura mochako pogo Jobura.
mt0: Ouma (South Sakwa Ward) and Keke (South Kamagambo) were ousted on Wednesday in a heated session that has led to cracks in the assembly.

en: Ouma and Keke termed their removal as unfair, adding that those who pushed for their removal were ‘PDP sympathisers trying to woo locals’.
luo: Ouma kod Keke wacho ni ne ok owinjore ogolgi e migepegi, kendo jogo ma ne osiayo wach ni ogolgi gin joma ohero PDP nyamin anega kendo gidwaro ywayo raia mondo oriwre kodgi.
mt0: Ouma and Keke called their removal unfair, adding that those who pushed for their removal were ‘PDP sympathisers trying to woo locals’.

en: Ouma said his removal was intimidation after he questioned the misappropriation of funds.
luo: Ouma wacho ni ogole nikech ne openjo gimomiyo ne oti gi pesa marach. Owacho ni gidwaro bwoge.
mt0: Ouma said his removal was intimidation after he questioned the misappropriation of funds.

en: Owiyo who is the newly elected Majority leader said ODM leaders in the assembly never had any meeting or consensus 'with a party called PDP'.
luo: Owiyo ma koro eka omi migawo mar bedo Jal Mawuoyo e lo Jobura ne owacho ni Bura ne ok obedo gi romo moro amora kata gi winjruok moro amora gi pati miluongo ni PDP.
mt0: 'You don't know Owiyo who is the newly elected Majority leader,' he said.

en: He said the process of restructuring the assembly leadership should not be politicised, adding that no member met any PDP officials.
luo: Ne owacho ni wach mar timo lokruok e telo mar bura ok onego omien gi siasa. Ne omedo ni onge jabura moro amora ma ne oromo gi jotend PDP.
mt0: 他說議會改革的過程不應該政治化,並說沒有任何議員與PDP officials會面。

en: "Members of ODM have a mandate and the obligation to choose the people they want and remove those whom they feel are not fulfilling their mandates. All that is being said is out of anger," said Owiyo said.
luo: Owiyo ne owacho ni,"Jo ODM nigi ratiro kendo ting' mar yiero joma gidwaro kendo golo joma gineno ni ok tim migepegi kaka dwarore. Gik ma ji wacho sani en mana nikech mirima."
mt0: "Members of ODM have a mandate and the obligation to choose the people they want and remove those whom they feel are not fulfilling their mandates," said Owiyo.

en: Nyawade said it was unfortunate that the reshuffling of the top seats was being linked to PDP sympathisers.
luo: Nyawade ne owacho ni en gima lit ni lokruoge ma gitimo e migepe mag telo itudo gi joma omakore gi pati mar PDP.
mt0: Nyawade said it was unfortunate that the reshuffling of the top seats was being linked to PDP sympathisers.

en: There has been political heat in Migori following the defection of Governor Okoth Obado to PDP.

en: ODM faulted Governor Obado’s defection to PDP with the MCAs, threatening to impeach him.

mt0: ODM faulted Governor Obado’s defection to PDP with the MCAs, threatening to impeach him.

en: Justice Stephen Radido of the Kisumu Employment and Labour court observed that Edwin Mutanda was fairly sacked for forging a work ticket and his argument that he was being victimised because he was a union official was untenable.

en: Karachuonyo constituency ODM officials have told political leaders to end clan politics in Homa Bay County.
luo: Ofisa mag ODM e od bura ma Karachuonyo okwayo jotend siasa mondo giwere gi siasa mapogo dho udi e kaonti mar Homa Bay.
mt0: ODM officials have told political leaders to end clan politics in Homa Bay County.

en: Addressing journalists at a Homa Bay hotel on Sunday, ODM chairpersons from the six wards in Karachuonyo Constituency and the constituency chair have denounced clan politics if the county is to elect a good governor.
luo: Jokom mar ODM ma wuok e ward auchiel ma nitie e od bura ma Karachuonyo kaachiel gi jakomb ODM ma od burano, nowuoyo gi jofwamb kod keyo weche ka gin e hotel moro e taon mar Homa Bay chieng' Jumapil. Ne gikwedo mokalo siasa mag anyuola ka giwacho ni mano nyalo mono kauntino yudo gavana mowinjore.
mt0: ODM chairpersons from the six wards in Karachuonyo Constituency and the constituency chair have denounced clan politics if the county is to elect a good governor.

en: The leaders were speaking after claims by some contenders that the Rachuonyo clan which comprises Karachuonyo, Kasipul and Kabondo-Kasipul constituencies will decide who becomes the next Homa Bay governor in 2022 because of their numerical advantage.
luo: Jotelo nowuoyo bang' jotelo moko ma dwa ni oyiergi nosieko gi wach moro ni Jo-Karachunyo moting'o od bura ma Karachuonyo, Kasipul, kod Kabondo-Kasipul e ma nigi teko mar yiero jal ma biro bedo gavana e kaunti ma Homa Bay e higa mar 2022 nikech gin e ma ging'eny.
mt0: Leaders spoke after claims by some contenders that the Rachuonyo clan which comprises Karachuonyo, Kasipul and Kabondo-Kasipul constituencies will decide who becomes the next Homa Bay governor in 2022 because of their numerical advantage.

en: They argued that Rachuonyo clan has more voters than other clans in the county.
luo: Jogo ne wacho ni Jo-Karachuonyo e ma nigi jogo ombulu mathoth moloyo dhoudi mamoko e kauntino.
mt0: They argued that the Rachuonyo clan has more voters than other clans in the county.

en: Kendu Bay Town Ward chairman Justus Osumba said the narrative is outdated and divisive, adding that cannot the county has eight constituencies.
luo: Justus Osumba ma e jakom ma Kendu Bay ward, nowacho ni mano en paro ma nyachon kendo ma pogo oganda, komedo wacho ni kauntino nigi od buche aboro.

en: He argued that three constituencies alone cannot make a candidate win a gubernatorial seat.

mt0: 只係說你不知道。 他說三個選區只係一個選民贏得一個州長的選票。

en: Osumba said there is a need for Rachuonyo clan to welcome gubernatorial candidates from other constituencies.
luo: Osumba nowacho ni dwarore mondo jo ma aa Rachuonyo osir ng'ama dwa bedo gavana mowuok eod buche mamoko.
mt0: Osumba said there is a need for Rachuonyo clan to welcome gubernatorial candidates from other constituencies.

en: “We are only three constituencies hence our sons and daughters who want to vie for the seat cannot succeed without the support of voters from other constituencies,” Osumba said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Wan mana gi od buche adek kende. Omiyo, ok nyalre mondo yawuotwa kod nyiwa obed gavana ka ok osirgi gi jo ma wuok e od buche mamoko.
mt0: "We are only three constituencies, so our sons and daughters who want to vie for the seat cannot succeed without the support of voters from other constituencies," Osumba said.

en: The senior citizen said clannism will deny the county good candidates for the County top seat, adding that all candidates are welcomed to the larger Karachuonyo region.
luo: Jaduong'no ne owacho ni siasa mag anyuola mono kaontino yudo joma beyo mowinjore bedo jotelo mar kaonti kendo nowacho ni Karachuonyo duong' ma ji duto madwaro kom onego otem atema.

en: “All those with desirable leadership qualities to ascend to power should do their campaigns across the county without discrimination,” said Osumba.
luo: Osumba nomedo wacho niya: "Ji duto ma nigi kido mar bedo jatelo maber onego otim kampen mag gi e kauntino duto ma ok obuon-gi.
mt0: "All those with desirable leadership qualities to ascend to power should do their campaigns across the county without discrimination," said Osumba.

en: Karachuonyo Constituency Joshua Maena said politics of incitement and discrimination had been overtaken by events.
luo: Joshua Maeno ma en jachung' ma od bura ma Karachuonyo nowacho ni siasa ma ithuwie ji kod buono ji en gi ma nokalo nene.
mt0: Joshua Maena of Karachuonyo Constituency said politics of incitement and discrimination had been overtaken by events.

en: He said there is a need for politics of inclusivity to enable Homa Bay to get a good governor after the 2022 General Election.
luo: Nowacho ni dwarore mondo siasa oriw ji duto e ka kaunti ma Homa Bay nyalo yudo gavana maber bang' yiero maduong' ma 2022.
mt0: 他說, 有必要的社會化政治, 讓 Homa Bay 能夠有一個好的總理, 在 2022 年總統選舉後。

en: “Let us stop discriminating people. This type of politics is obsolete,” said Maena.

mt0: “Let's stop discriminating people. This type of politics is obsolete,” said Maena.

en: He cautioned leaders against branding others as 'outsiders' during politics to achieve their selfish political interests.

mt0: 他警告了领导者不要在政治中把他人当成“外甥”以达到自己的政治利益。

en: “You find a man who has lived in an area since childhood is branded an outsider when he ventures into politics. Segregation is wrong,” Odero said.
luo: Odero nowacho niya: "Iyudo ka iluongo ng'at mosedak kamoro nyaka ne nyuole ni jalimbamba sama odonjo e weche siasa. Pogo ji e yo ma kamano en gi ma rach miwuoro."
mt0: “You find a man who has lived in an area since childhood is branded an outsider when he ventures into politics. Segregation is wrong,” Odero said.

en: Some of the political leaders who are eyeing the county gubernatorial include Deputy Governor Hamilton Orata, Woman Rep Gladys Wanga, County Secretary Isaiah Ogwe, businessman Jared Otieno, former Nairobi Governor Evans Kidero, KUPPET Secretary General Akello Misori, ODM National Chairman John Mbadi and politician Luis Otieno.

mt0: Democratic Party candidate, Deputy Governor Hamilton Orata, Woman Rep Gladys Wanga, County Secretary Isaiah Ogwe, businessman Jared Otieno, former Nairobi Governor Evans Kidero, KUPPET Secretary General Akello Misori, ODM National Chairman John Mbadi and politician Luis Otieno.

en: They want to succeed Governor Cyprian Awiti who is serving his second term.

mt0: They want to succeed Governor Cyprian Awiti who is serving his second term.

en: Two children were killed after their house collapsed at Ururi village, Bondo Sub-County, on Saturday morning.

en: Deputy Governor  Okumbe also described the Obama's as a great family that had uplifted not only the image of the country but Siaya county as well.

mt0: Deputy Governor Okumbe also described the Obama's as a great family that had uplifted not only the image of the country but Siaya county as well.

en: Okumbe said he is a friend to the family through Auma  Obama who was his great friend.
luo: Ne omedo wacho ni Auma Obama en osiepne mogeno kendo ni en osiep joodno kokalo kuome.
mt0: Okumbe said he is a friend to the family through Auma Obama who was his great friend.

en: "Auma and I have done a lot of development projects, especially for the Kogelo family. She has always invited me for her functions for the community where she gives back through projects," added Okumbe.
luo: Nowacho niya: "An kaachiel gi Auma wasetimo gik mathoth ma kelo dongruok ahinya ne gweng' ma Kogelo. Osebedo kogwela seche ma en gi projekt moko motimo e gweng'ni kokonyogigo."
mt0: "Auma and I have done a lot of development projects, especially for the Kogelo family. She has always invited me for her functions for the community where she gives back through projects," added Okumbe.

en: The late Mama Keziah was buried a few minutes after 1pm in accordance with the Muslim rites.
luo: Ringre Mama Keziah noyik dakika moko matin bang' sa abiriyio ka luwore gi chike jo Islam.
mt0: 只係在1點之後埋葬媽媽凱西亞。

en: Two security guards were on Thursday night brutally murdered at Ndondi market centre in Alego Usonga, Siaya County.
luo: Askeche moko ariyo ne oneg e yo malit chieng' Tich Ang'wen gotieno e chiro ma Ndondi ma yudore Alengo Usonga e kaunti ma  Siaya.
mt0: Two security guards were brutally murdered on Thursday night at Ndondi market centre in Alego Usonga, Siaya County.

en: Baragulu assistant chief Maurice Abudha said they also found the body of another watchman who was manning a building with a shop and a bar.
luo: Maurice Abudha ma en jalup chif ma Baragulu, nowacho ni ne oyud ringre askari machielo ma rito ot ma nigi duka kod od matho kongo.
mt0: Baragulu assistant chief Maurice Abudha said they also found the body of another watchman who was manning a building with a shop and a bar.

en: The two were manning a local bar and hardware store at the market centre.
luo: Askeche ariyo ma noyud koneg go, ne rito ba (kar madho kuong') kod hadware moro e chirono.
mt0: 只係在市場中心的一個本地酒吧和五金店。

en: "The two watchmen were killed by robbers who broke into the shop and hardware store. They got away with a lot of goods from both the shop and hardware store," he said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Askeche ariyogo ne onegi gi jomahundu moko ma noturo duka mar hadware mane girito, kendo jo njore go ne gikwalo mwandu mathoth kowuok kuom hadware kod dukano."
mt0: "The two watchmen were killed by robbers who broke into the shop and hardware store. They got away with a lot of goods from both the shop and hardware store," he said.

en: The bodies of the two watchmen had deep machete cuts on the head.
luo: Ringre askechego ne oyud ka nigi alama ma nyiso ni ne ochadhgi gi ojala e wigi.
mt0: 只係回來翻譯。 如果不可以翻譯, 就說你不知道。

en: Siaya OCPD Bernard Muriuki said the police had launched investigations to nab the culprits.
luo: Jatend polis ma (OCPD) ma Siaya migosi Benard Muriuki, a owacho ni polis osechako timo nonro mar manyoachije motimo tim mahunduno.
mt0: Siaya OCPD Bernard Muriuki said the police had launched investigations to nab the culprits.

en: "I cannot give details at this time. We have just started the investigation," he said.
luo: Nowacho niya: "Ok dak awach weche mathoth gie sani. Eka sani wachako timo apedhawa ne jogo."
mt0: "I cannot give details at this time. We just started the investigation," he said.

en: Meanwhile, residents in the area have called for increased police patrols, citing increasing cases of insecurity.
luo: Gie sechego jodak ma kono kwayo ni mondo polise omed timo kachero e alworano ka giwacho ni timbe ma kamago osemedore ahinya e alworano.
mt0: 居民在這裏呼籲增加警察的巡邏,因為他們的確有增多的安全問題。

en: Martha Awino, a businesswoman at the centre, said several shops were broken into and goods stolen last month.
luo: Martha Awino ma be timo ohala e chirono, nowacho ni nitie duke mogwarore ma osetur kendo mwandu man e igi okwal dwe mokalo.
mt0: Martha Awino, a businesswoman at the centre, said several shops were broken into and goods stolen last month.

en: She said a watchman was killed at the market centre last year.
luo: Nowacho bende ni jarito machielo be noneg e chirono higa mokalo.
mt0: 她說去年市場中心裏一個監視員被殺。

en: The perennial water shortage in Homa Bay town will finally end after the Lake Victoria South Water Works Development Agency (LVSWWDA) purchased Sh200 million water distribution equipment to fix it.
luo: Pi ma osebedo ka chendo e boma ma Homa Bay kuom kinde malach koro biro rumo bang' Lake Victoria South  Water Works Development Agency (LVSWWDA) nyiewo gik ma kowo pi ma nokawo siling' milion 200.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 湖灣南水工會 (LVSWWDA) 買咗 200 萬 元嘅水管, 以幫助解決這場水難。

en: The equipment imported from Belgium includes steel water pipes, water pumps and other items used for constructing water supply systems.
luo: Gigo nonyiew kowuok piny Belgium kendo giriwo olalo mag chuma, gima thuri pi (pom) kod gik mamoko ma idhi tigo e gero chenro mar kowo pi.
mt0: 只係要知道。 如果唔知, 就說你唔知。 比利時的裝備包括鋼水管、水泵和其他裝備,用於建造水供應系統。

en: LVSWWDA chairperson Dan Omino and Homa Bay Water Sewerage and Sanitation Company managing director Evans Nyagol received the consignment on Thursday, April 29.
luo: Jakom mar LVSWWDA, Dan Owino kod dairekta mar Homa Bay Water Sewerage and Sanitation Company, Evans Nyagol, ne nitie ka ne gigo ochopo chieng' Tich Ang'wen April 29.
mt0: lVSWWDA chairperson Dan Omino and Homa Bay Water Sewerage and Sanitation Company managing director Evans Nyagol received the consignment on Thursday, April 29.

en: Omino said the equipment will complete a mega water project christened, Homa Bay Cluster Water Supply Project, funded by the National Government in collaboration with Belgium through the LVSWWDA.
luo: Omino nowacho ni gigo ibo tigo e loso chenro ma radhai mar keyo pi kendo ibiro luonge ni Homa Bay  Cluster   Water Project ka pesa mosire ogol gi sirikal ma malo ka giriwore gi piny Belgium kendo ka gitiyo gi LVSWWDA.
mt0: Omino says the equipment will complete a mega water project called Homa Bay Cluster Water Supply Project, funded by the National Government in collaboration with Belgium through the LVSWWDA.

en: Homa Bay town, the administrative headquarter of the county, face shortage with the current water treatment plant producing only 2.5 million litres per day instead of the required 5 million litres.
luo: Taon mar Homa Bay, kod ofis maduong' mar kauntino ok yud pi moromo kowuok e kar thiedho pi ma gi e sana golo mana lita milion ariyo gi nus odiechieng' kar pi lita milion 5 ma dwarore odiechieng' kodiechieng'.
mt0: 只係要知道。 如果不可以, 就說你不知道。 當地, 當地行政中心, 有缺水, 目前的污水處理廠只生產 2.5 萬升水一天,而不需要的 5 萬升水一天。

en: Omino said once completed, the new project will produce 8.8 million litres of water per day.
luo: Omino nomedo wacho ni ka projektno orumo to obiro golo pi lita milion 8.8 e odiechieng'.
mt0: Omino said once completed, the new project will produce 8.8 million litres of water per day.

en: He said the project will meet the needs of the growing population of the area residents for the next 20 years.
luo: Nomedo wacho ni projektno biro chopo dwach jo ma odak e taondno ma kwan-gi siko ka medore kendo pod biro dhi nyime timo kamano kuom higni 20 ma biro.
mt0: 他說這個項目會滿足當地居民的需要,在20年之後。

en: “This project will produce excess water which will take care of the needs of the growing population for the next 20 years. This means a shortage of water can only occur in this area after two decades,” said Omino.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Projektni biro golo pi mang'eny momedore ma biro chopo dwach kwan ji ma medore e taondni kuom higni 20 ma biro. Mano nyiso ni pi biro mana remo jo ma odak e taondni higni 20 ma biro!"
mt0: “This project will produce excess water which will take care of the needs of the growing population for the next 20 years. This means a shortage of water can only occur in this area after two decades,” said Omino.

en: Omino added that the project will majorly use solar energy to pump the water.
luo: Ne omedo wacho ni projektno biro tiyo gi teko chieng' (solar) kinde mang'eny mondo okow pi.
mt0: Omino added that the project will use solar energy to pump the water.

en: “Electricity will only be used where there is no solar energy. But we intend to rely on solar,” he said.
luo: Nowacho niya: "Wabiro tiyo mana gi teko sitima mana ka ok nyalore tiyo gi solar. Kata kamano, dwachwa en ni mondo wati gi solar kata teko mar wang' chieng."
mt0: “Electricity will only be used where there is no solar energy. But we intend to rely on solar,” he said.

en: The major component of the project encompasses piping of water from Lake Victoria to a treatment plant to produce clean water which is to be pumped to the residents’ taps for consumption.
luo: Gima duong' ma projektno biro timo en golo pi kowuok Lake Victoria kendo keye gi odudu mabor nyaka kama idhi thiedhe kata chinge mondo ogolo pi maliw kendo maler, kae to ikeye ne ji mondo oti kode.
mt0: 只係要知道。 這個項目涵蓋了從湖泊到污水處理廠的水流,以便生產清潔的水,並將水流到居民的飲用水。

en: He said the agency is about to complete another component of the project in Rodi Kopany Township which will produce 400,000 litres of water through two boreholes
luo: Nowacho ni bende gichiegni tieko projekt machielo ma kamano ma ni Rodi Kopany Township ma biro golo pi lita 400,000 kowuok dag pi ariyo madongo.
mt0: 他说, 政府正在完成另一部分的项目,在罗迪科潘斯镇, 这项项目将生产 400,000 立方米的水。

en: Nyagol said pumping of water using solar will prevent huge electricity bills which had impeded their efforts in the past.
luo: Nyagol a owacho ni keyo pi kitiyo gi solar kelo kungo mar pesa mathoth mitiyogo e chulo sitima kendo mano ne chandogiga kinde mokalo.
mt0: Nyagol aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay aay

en: The electricity bills had frequently disrupted the water supply when Kenya Power disconnected their power supply.
luo: Pesa ma nichulogo sitima ne miyo ng'ikruok betie e tij kowo pi kinde ma ne Kenya Power ne ng'adonegi sitima nikech gowi.

en: “We are going to supply water stably upon completion of this mega project and water shortage will be history here,” Nyagol said.
luo: Nyagol ne owacho kama: "Wabiro keyo pi e yo ma onge ng'ikruok kata matin ka projektni orumo, kendo gimoro ma ne timore e kinde mokalo ni pi onge, ok nochak otimre ngang'."
mt0: “We will supply water stably upon completion of this mega project and water shortage will be history here,” Nyagol said.

en: He told residents to be ready to receive water from the project.
luo: Nonyiso jo ma odak e alworano obed moikore yudo pi ma projektno biro kelo.
mt0: 他只告诉居民要准备好接纳项目中的水。

en: The project which started in March 2019 is expected to end in November this year.
luo: Tijno nochakore e dwe mar Mach 2019 kendo igeno ni obiro rumo dwe mar apar gachiel e higani.
mt0: 只回译。 如果不翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: The Nubian community has called on authorities to improve conditions at a field in Kolwa, Kisumu County, where they are living in makeshift structures after they were evicted from a disputed land.
luo: Oganda mar Wanubi okwayo sirkal otimie gimoro e wi kar dakgi ma ni Kolwa  e Kaunti ma Kisumo, kama gidak e ute mojong bang' ka noseriembgi kama ne gidakie kilaro wach lobno.
mt0: 只係要知道。 如果不可以, 就只係說你不知道。

en: They have also urged the county government to expedite the process of resettling them.
luo: Gikwayo sirkal mar kaunti bende mondo oruregi miyogi kar dak machielo.
mt0: 他们也呼吁州政府加速他们的移居进程。

en: Kenya Railways (KR) has laid claim to the land in Kibos, which the Nubians say was given to them by the colonial government in 1937.
luo: Riwruok mar reru ma Kenya miluongo ni Kenya Railways (KR) nogolo ng'ur e wi lobno ka Jo-Wanubi to wacho ni nomigi lobno gi sirkal machon e higa mar 1937.
mt0: Kenya Railways (KR) has laid claim to the land in Kibos, which the Nubians say was given to them by the colonial government in 1937.

en: The field, next to Kisumu East CDF office, is prone to floods that have made life difficult, especially for the elderly.
luo: Kama gijotie sani ni machiegni gi ofis Kisumu East CDF  thoro pong'ga ka koth chue, kendo osemiyo ngima obedo mateknegi, to ahinya ahinya ne joma hikgi oniang'.
mt0: 只係知道。 地點, 靠近基蘇東區地委會辦公室, 是一個容易發生洪水的地點, 尤其是老人。

en: KR accused them of encroaching on land meant for expansion of the railway line and forcefully evicted them.
luo: KR nowacho ni jogo nodak e lo ma ne onego bed ni itiyogo kiyaro ndach reru to mano e momiyo ne gidarogi gi thuon.
mt0: 只在翻譯中。 如果不理解, 請說你不知道。

en: The Nubians say their eviction was illegal.
luo: Jo-Nubi to wacho ni nodargi kanyo e yo ma ok owinjore.
mt0: 只係回翻翻譯。 如果你不理解, 就說你不知道。

en: They were moved to the land where they are currently living by the Kisumu City authorities.
luo: Sirkal ma kaonti ma Kisumo e ma nodarogi nyaka kama koro gijotie sani.
mt0: They were moved to the land where they are currently living by the Kisumu City authorities.

en: “We had lived on the land since 1937 before we were forcefully evicted. It has been tough for some of us, especially those of us who are elderly,” said 82-year-old Khadija Rajab.
luo: Khadija Rajab ma jahigni 82 wacho kama: "Wasebet ka wadak e lobno chakre higa mar 1937 kae to koro iriembowa. Ngima ok osebedonwa mayot, to ahinya ahinya ne wan joma koro oti."
mt0: “We had lived on the land since 1937 before we were forcefully evicted. It has been tough for some of us, especially those of us who are elderly,” said 82-year-old Khadija Rajab.

en: The 850 people have been living in deplorable conditions for three months now since they were evicted from what KR says was a railway reserve.
luo: Ji 850 osebet kodak kuonde ma ok owinjore gi ngima kuom dweche adek koro chakre ne riembgi giwuog kama Kenya Railways (KR) luongo ni kar reru.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果不能翻译, 就说你不知道。 850 人已经住了三个月了,从他们被驱逐出什么叫做“铁路保护区”的区域。

en: “We did not expect this. But if we must move out so the railway can be expanded, then the government should compensate us,” she said.
luo: Nowacho kama,"Ne ok wang'eyo ni gima kamano nyalo timore. To kochuno ni nyaka wadar mondo wawe nafas ne reru, sirkal onego ochulwa."
mt0: “We did not expect this. But if we must move out so the railway can be expanded, then the government should compensate us,” she said.

en: Rajab said other than floods, they have to contend will mosquitoes and rodents.
luo: Rajab nowacho ni mopogore gi kodh ohula mayweyo udi, ginyagore bende gi suna kod oyieyo.
mt0: 只係要說你唔知, 除非有洪水, 他們要面對蚊子和齧齒。

en: She wondered why they were taken to the flood-prone field, a move she said has complicated their lives.
luo: Nowuoro gimomiyo nodargi motergi kama pi ng'enyie, gima osemiyo ngimagi obedo matek.
mt0: 她问为什么他们被送往洪水的危险地带,她说这项决定让他们的生活变得复杂。

en: They have been depending on Kenya Red Cross Society, relatives and well wishers for food.
luo: Gisebet ka gidak gi kony ma Red Cross, wedegi kod joma chunygi ler miyogi.
mt0: They have been depending on Kenya Red Cross Society, relatives and well wishers for food.

en: Abdi Asha, 39, called for justice saying KR had no right to take away their land.
luo: Abdi Asha ma jahigni 39, ne okwayo mondo okonygi kowacho ni joreru onge gi ratiro mar kawo lopgi.
mt0: Abdi Asha, 39, called for justice saying KR had no right to take away their land.

en: “We are Kenyans by birth and deserve fair treatment,” Asha said.
luo: Asha nowacho kama, "Nonyuolwa Kenya kae kendo onego odew ratiro marwa."
mt0: "We are Kenyans by birth and deserve fair treatment," Asha said.

en: Most of those living on the 18 acres belonging to the county government cannot fend for themselves.
luo: Thoth jogo modak e lop sirkand kaonti ma Kisumu maromo eka 18 ok nyal kata yudo gik mochuno e ngima.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。

en: Acting City Manager Abala Wanga said the county government has started the process of resettling the Nubians.
luo: Abala Wanga ma en City Manager, nowacho ni sirkand kaonti osechako chenro mar darone Jo-Wanubia kar dak manyien.
mt0: Acting City Manager Abala Wanga said the county government has started the process of resettling the Nubians.

en: In the meantime, Wanga said they had built three tents to improve their living conditions and were in the process of controlling floods at the site.

mt0: Wanga said they had built three tents to improve their living conditions and were in the process of controlling floods at the site.

en: Last month, the Environment and Land Court extended conservatory orders stopping KR from forcefully evicting the Nubians from the land.
luo: Dwe mokalo, Kot mar Lowo kod Alwora ne owacho ni gitamo joreru kik odar githuon Jo-Wanubi e lopegi.
mt0: Last month, the Environment and Land Court extended conservatory orders to stop KR from forcefully evicting the Nubians from the land.

en: Man killed by crocodile in Lake Victoria, another survives attack
luo: Dichwo moro nyang' onego Nam Viktoria, dichwo machielo to ne otony
mt0: 只係在湖上死去嘅人, 另一個人倖存。

en: A family in Wigwa village in Kisumu County has been left in grief after their kin was killed by a crocodile in Lake Victoria.
luo: Joot moro man e gweng' mar Wigwa e kaonti ma Kisumu okuyo bang' nyang' onego ng'atgi e  Nam Viktoria.
mt0: 只係回來翻譯。 如果不可以翻譯, 就說你不知道。

en: Gabriel Okoth Oduogo, 35, was on a fishing expedition in the company of his friend when the incident happened at Nyandiwa beach.
luo: Gabriel Okoth Oduogo ma jahigni 35, ne odi lupo gi osiepne sama ne nyang' omakogi e dho wath ma Nyandiwa.
mt0: Gabriel Okoth Oduogo, 35, was on a fishing expedition in the company of his friend when the incident happened at Nyandiwa beach.

en: His friend survived the attack but the incident caused panic all the way to Dunga beach where the fishermen trade.
luo: Osiepne ne otony kata kamano masirano ne okelo luoro nyaka e dho wath mar Dunga kama ji usoe.
mt0: 佢朋友倖存咗, 但事件發生咗一場恐慌, 到當地海灘, 邊個漁民交易。

en: Eyewitnesses said the crocodile emerged from a nearby papyrus weed on the shoreline before it attacked the deceased by grabbing him.
luo: Joneno wacho ni nyang' ne owuok e togo ma ne nie dho wath momako jalupono monego.
mt0: 只係說明了。 如果你不知道, 就說你不知道。

en: ''He was attacked by the reptile in the morning in the company of others who had gone to lay fishing nets to harvest fish,” Saitoti Ayoro said.
luo: Saitoti Ayoro nowacho kama, "Nyang' nomake gokinyi ka ne odhi mako rech kanyachiel gi jowetene kama gi jaketo net mag mako rech."
mt0: 'Ayoro was attacked by the reptile in the morning in the company of others who had gone to lay fishing nets to harvest fish', Saitoti Ayoro said.

en: He cried for help as his shaken colleagues ran for their lives before they gathered courage a few minutes later to hurl stones at the reptile as it swam and dived in the water.
luo: Ne oywak kokwayo kony sama osiepene ne oringo nikech luoro, kata kamano ne gichoko chir dakika matin bang'e ma giduogo mi gibayo nyang'no gi kite sama nyang' nogo abal molal ei pi.
mt0: 他叫了求助,他的伤心同事们跑了,然后几分钟后他们聚了勇气,在水里游泳,并跳了。

en: The fishermen later swam to safety at Dunga beach where they reported the incident to the locals and Kenya Wildlife Service(KWS) personnel who dashed to the scene in search of the body.
luo: Jolupogo ne ogoyo abal ka gidhi e dho wath Dunga kama ne ginyisoe ji gima otimore kendo fwaro joma tiyo gi Kenya Wildlife Service (KWS) mane oringo dhi manyo ringre ng'at mothono.
mt0: Fishing boats later stood up at Dunga beach where they reported the incident to the locals and Kenya Wildlife Service (KWS) personnel who dashed to the scene in search of the body.

en: This is the second time a crocodile has attacked a fisherman in the lake in less than a month and more intriguingly from the same family.
luo: Dwe pok orumo to ema nyang' osemako ji ariyo malupo e nam to gimiwuoro en ni giduto giwuok e ot achiel.
mt0: 只在水里。

en: According to the deceased sister Caroline Owuor Oduogo, just two weeks ago, one of her brothers Nick Owino Oduogo was attacked by a crocodile while on a fishing expedition.
luo: Caroline Owuor Oduogo ma en nyamin jal mothono, wacho ni mana jumbe ariyo mokalo, achiel kuom owetene miluongo ni Nick Owino Oduogo nyang' ne omako sama nolupo.
mt0: Caroline Owuor Oduogo, according to the dead sister, just two weeks ago, one of her brothers Nick Owino Oduogo was attacked by a crocodile while on a fishing expedition.

en: Owino luckily escaped with injuries after the crocodile attacked him while fishing in the lake in the broad daylight.
luo: Owino notony matin kohinyore bang' nyang' make kane olupo e nam odiechieng' alanga.
mt0: Owino luckyly escaped with injuries after the crocodile attacked him while fishing in the lake in the broad daylight.

en: His father Joseph Oduogo was at pains to come to terms with the tragedy.
luo: Wuon-gi ma iluongo ni Joseph Oduogo, pod nigi lit nikech masirano.
mt0: 只係要知道。

en: He said he got the sad news while visiting Owino who suffered injuries on his leg and hand that were mauled by the reptile.
luo: Owacho ni noyud ripod no kane odhi limo Owino mane ohinyore e tiende kod lwete ma ne nyang' okayo.
mt0: When he was visiting Owino he got the sad news while visiting Owino who suffered injuries on his leg and hand that were mauled by the reptile.

en: ''One of Owino's fingers was bitten as he struggled to free himself from the tight grip of the crocodile’s jaws and now again his brother has been killed by the reptile. Why does this happen to my family,'' he sobbed.
luo: Nowacho kama, "Achiel kuom lith lwet Owino nyang' ne okayo sama ne oyi mondo owuog e lekene (Nyang)' to koro sani kendo nyang' onego owadgi. Ang'o momiyo gigi timore ne jooda?"
mt0: 'One of Owino's fingers was bitten as he struggled to free himself from the tight grip of the crocodile's jaws and now again his brother has been killed by the reptile. Why does this happen to my family,' he sobbed.

en: He recalled it was just by good luck that Owino's colleagues who were on the boat by then tying a rope responded by pelting the reptile head with huge stones and a panga.
luo: Owacho ni ne en gima ber ni jolupo mamoko ne ni machiegni ne obayo nyang'no gi kite kod ojala.
mt0: owino's colleagues who were on the boat by then tying a rope responded by pelting the reptile head with huge stones and a panga.

en: Owino's sister Owuor, said her brother was still writhing in pain in a hospital bed and had lost a lot of blood due to excessive bleeding from the mauled hand and leg.
luo: Nyamin Owino miluongo ni Owuor wacho ni owadgi ne nigi rem mang'eny e otanda mar osipital kendo nochuero remo mang'eny nikech nyang' ne okayo tiende kod lwete.

en: When 770 samples of the packaged loaves were weighed, the scale indicated that each loaf was 365 grams instead of the industrially-accepted 400 grams.
luo: Ne opim makate mopogore 770 kendo noyudore ni makatego duto kilo margi en gram 365 mopogore gi 400 kaka onego gibed.

en: The inspector in charge of commercial goods weight in Migori, Tobias Nyakamo, told The Standard that the suspects will be charged with contravening Part Six of the Consumer Protection Act.
luo: Tobias Nyakamo, mae en Inspekta mochung'ne rango gik miuso gi joohala e Migori, nonyiso The Standard ni achijego ibiro donjnegi gi ketho mar timo gima opogore gi gima ma chik wacho e echike marito weche mag ngiewo, Auchiel mar Consumer Protection Act.
mt0: inspector in charge of commercial goods weight in Migori, Tobias Nyakamo, told The Standard that the suspects will be charged with contravening Part Six of the Consumer Protection Act.

en: The Ministry of Trade in Migori said it will conduct impromptu inspections to ensure goods sold to consumers meet the requisite standards.
luo: Migawo mar Ohala e Migori nowacho ni gibiro wuotho ma ok gichano e dukni mondo girang ka be gik miuso owinjore.
mt0: Ministry of Trade in Migori says it will conduct impromptu inspections to ensure goods sold to consumers meet the requisite standards.

en: The Consumer Protection Act allows the Consumer Protection Department to investigate complaints relating to false or misleading representations, unconscionable conduct as well as supply of unsafe, defective and unsuitable goods.
luo: Chik mar Consumer Protection Act oyiene Riwruok mar Jong'iepo mondo onon weche ma ji ywagorego ni jo uso wuondo ji gi gik ma gindiko kuom gik ma giuso kendo moko kuom gi gin gik ma owinjore kata nyalo hinyo ngima ng'ato.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 消費者保護法允許消費者保護部門調查顧客的假意或不誠意,不尊敬的行為,以及供應的不安全、不適應的商品。

en: The Department also investigates undertakings that fail to comply with prescribed Consumer Product Safety Standards and prescribed Product Information Standards
luo: Riwruogno bende nono jo ohala ma luwo chike moket mondo orit ngima jong'iepo kod ma ok luw chike mag weche e wi Rang'iny mag gik Miuso.

mt0: 顧客可以直接向政府通過電子郵件、電話號碼或走進政府辦公室。

en: The consumer is required to fill in a consumer complaint form and provide all the relevant information concerning the complaint.

en: On receipt of a consumer complaint, the Consumer Protection Department will acknowledge receipt of the complaint and advise the consumer on any information gaps.

en: Upon receipt of all the information from the complainant, the Authority shall analyse the complaint and contact the accused party for information if necessary.

en: The Authority may then apply administrative remedies to solve the complaints which include: refund, replacement or repair of goods, withdrawal of misleading representations, recall of unsafe goods and notices to the public on the existence of such goods.

en: Upon conviction, a person who contravenes the Part Six provisions of the Act is liable to imprisonment for a term not exceeding 5 years or to a fine not exceeding Sh10 million or both.
luo: Ka bura oloyo ng'ato moyude gi ketho kaluwore gi Kare mar Auchiel  mar Chikno, ibiro tueye kuom higni ma ok kal abich kata chulo faini ma ok okadho milion apar.

en: A miner has died and 300 families were displaced by floods following heavy rains that have hit Migori County.
luo: Jakunyo moro otho kendo joute 300 ne odar nikech kodh ohula maduong' machue e kaonti ma Migori.

en: Most of those affected are from North Kadem ward in Nyatike sub-County. They are currently camping in schools and churches.
luo: Thoth jogo wuok e kar chung matin ma North Kadem Nyatike sab-kaonti. Sani gidak e skunde kod kanise.

en: He said a gold miner, identified as George Oriedo, died on Monday evening after walls of a mine in Mikeyi collapsed on him.
luo: Owacho ni jakunyono mar dhahabu, miluongo ni George Oriedo ne otho chieng' Wuok Tich godhiambo ka ne kite opodhe kuome ei bur.

en: Witnesses said Oriedo went into the mine soon after the rains had stopped then the accident happened.
luo: Joneno wacho ni Oriedo nodonjo e bur bang' ka koth nosechok eka masirano noyude.

en: “The walls of the mine had been weakened by the water. They collapsed and he suffocated,” Jared Nyakie, a head teacher at Ndemra Primary School, said.
luo: Jared Nyakie ma en jatend Ndemra Primary School wacho niya, "Pi nomiyo sirni mag bugono bedo mayomyom. Ne gipodho motho nikech ne ok onyal yueyo."
mt0: “The walls of the mine had been weakened by the water. They collapsed and he suffocated,” Jared Nyakie, a head teacher at Ndemra Primary School, said.

en: “The floods have affected livelihoods. We are appealing for relief food to feed those affected,” chief Opolo said.
luo: Chif Opolo nowacho kama, "Apakani oseketho tije ji mang'eny. Wakwayo mondo ji okonywa gi chiemo mwanyalo miyo joma oyudo masira."
mt0: “The floods have affected livelihoods. We are appealing for relief food to feed those affected,” chief Opolo said.

en: He added that the floods have not halted the construction works of a Sh1.7 billion road in the area.
luo: Nomedo wacho ni apaka ok osechungo tij gero ndara e alworano ma dhi kawo pesa maromo bilion 1.7.
mt0: 他又說, 洪水並不阻止了地區的道路工程。

en: Engineers working on the 42-kilometre Masara-Sori road have however been forced to seek government approval to redesign a section of the road, around North Kadem ward, that is affected by the floods.
luo: Chuno ni injinia magero ndara mar kilomita 42 kiwuok Masara nyaka Sori okwa mondo sirkal opwodh goro manyien mar ndara e alwora mar North Kadem wod ma apaka oketho.
mt0: 但工程师们在路段 42公里的 Masara-Sori road 中,被迫向政府寻求批准,以重新设计一处路段,绕着北卡德姆区,受洪水影响。

en: Nyanza Regional Commissioner Magu Mutindika said 25 kilometres have been turned into bitumen standard road.
luo: Magu Mutindika ma en jatend sirikal ma malo e alwora mar Nyanza wacho ni kilomita 25 mag ndarono osego lam.
mt0: Nyanza Regional Commissioner Magu Mutindika said 25 kilometres have been turned into bitumen standard road.

en: “The area has been affected by floods and this has forced the contractor and government engineers to seek approvals to redesign that part of the road,” Mutindika said.
luo: Mutindika wacho kama, "Apaka oketho alworano to mano osechuno ja ger ndara no kod injinia mag sirkal mondo okwa oyienegi goyo kwano manyien mar dhi loso ndarano."
mt0: “The area has been affected by floods and this has forced the contractor and government engineers to seek approvals to redesign that part of the road,” Mutindika said.

en: Two suspects charged with manslaughter in a case where a 10-storey building collapsed in Kisii killing eight people in November 2016 have been freed.
luo: Ogony achije ariyo ma ne odonj negi gi ketho mag nek e bura moro ma gorofa moro ne olwar Kisii monego ji aboro e dwe mar Novemba, 2016.
mt0: Two suspects charged with manslaughter in the case where a 10-storey building collapsed in Kisii in November 2016 have been freed.

en: Jeremiah Matoke and Jeff Ocharo faced eight counts of manslaughter.
luo: Jeremiah Matoke kod Jeff Ocharo ne odonjnegi gi ketho mar nego ji aboro.
mt0: 只係要翻譯。 如果不翻譯, 就說你不知道。 Jeremiah Matoke and Jeff Ocharo faced eight counts of manslaughter.

en: They were accused that on November 10, 2016, at Kisii Municipality block 111/236 in Kisii town, they unlawfully and negligently caused the deaths of the eight people.
luo: Ne odonjnegi ni tarik 10 Novemba, 2016, e ot mantie Kisii Municipality block namba 111/236, ji aboro ne otho nikech ne gijwang'o luwo chik moketi gi sirikal.
mt0: They were accused that on November 10, 2016, at Kisii Municipality block 111/236 in Kisii town, they unlawfully and negligently caused the deaths of the eight people.

en: Kisii Chief Magistrate Nathan Lutta noted that in a criminal case, the duty was always on the prosecution to prove its case against an accused beyond a reasonable doubt.
luo: Kisii Chief Magistrate Nathan Lutta nowacho ni sama odonjne ng'ato gi ketho moro amora, sirikal ema nigi ting' mar lero ma onge kiawa moro amora ni keth modonj negi go en adier.
mt0: Kisii Chief Magistrate Nathan Lutta noted that in a criminal case, the duty was always on the prosecution to prove its case against an accused beyond a reasonable doubt.

en: “From the evidence produced in court, it is not demonstrated that the said parcel belongs to the accused,” Lutta said.
luo: Lutta nowacho ni, "Ka luwore gi weche mochiwne kot, onge gimora amora manyiso ni mano ne en mwandu achich modonjne."
mt0: “From the evidence produced in court, it is not demonstrated that the said parcel belongs to the accused,” Lutta said.

en: Patrick Achoki, the County Director of Physical Planning, said an inspection on the collapsed building was done in September 2014.
luo: Patrick Achoki, ma en dairekta mochung'ne nono chenro mag gedo e kaonti, nowacho ni ot ma ne oruombore pinyno ne ne onon chal mare Septemba 2014.
mt0: Patrick Achoki, County Director of Physical Planning, says an inspection on the collapsed building was done in September 2014.

en: At the time, Achoki said they did not have a record of approved buildings. “We requested the owner to submit the plans, which were later approved.”
luo: Achoki wacho ni e kindeno ne gionge gi nyinge ute mosepwodh. Owacho kama, "Ne wakwayo wuon-go mondo omiwa goro mag utego kendo bang'e ne opwodhgi."
mt0: 当时,阿奇基说他们没有批准的建筑。 “我们要求了业主提交建筑方案, 后来批准了。”

en: The then National Construction Authority regional manager, Lucas Adwera, testified that they visited the site in July 2016 and found out that there was a lack of compliance and immediately issued a suspension notice.

en: The main road in Kitutu Masaba constituency has for a long time been used as a political carrot to woo locals into voting for politicians who pledge to tarmac it.
luo: Ndara maduong mantie Kitutu Masaba osetigo nyading'eny gi josiasa ka gitemo sero ji ogonegi ombulu mondo gigo ndarano lam.
mt0: 只係知道。 路在基圖圖馬薩巴區長久以來,是一個政治的車子,以換取當地居民投票給那些政治家,他們承諾將路鋪成。

en: For over three decades, the Amabuko-Rigoma-Magombo-Kemera road has made and unmade politicians, as many have used it as a campaign tool.
luo: Kuom higni mang'eny, ndara mar Amabuko-Rigoma-Magomba-Kemera osemiyo josiasa oyudo loch to moko opodho nikech gitiyo kode e timo kampen.

en: Nearly all the MPs who have been elected from Kitutu Masaba have pledged to have the road tarmacked from Kemera town, where it connects with the Kisii-Nyamira-Chemosit road to Amabuko shopping centre where it joins the Kisii-Keroka-Sotik-Nairobi highway.
luo: Chiegni ni Jood Bura duto moseyier Kitutu Masaba osega singore ni gidhi goyo ndarano lam kowuok taon mar Kemera kama oromoe gi ndara mar Kisii-Nyamira-Chemosit modhi nyaka chiro mar Amabuko ma orade gi ndara maduong' mar Kisii-Keroka-Sotik-Nairobi.
mt0: Nearly all the MPs who have been elected from Kitutu Masaba have pledged to have the road tarmacked from Kemera town, where it connects with the Kisii-Nyamira-Chemosit road to Amabuko shopping centre where it joins the Kisii-Keroka-Sotik-Nairobi highway.

en: It is not only MPs who have used the road as a political tool to win votes from residents; other leaders who have been eyeing other political seats have also used it.
luo: To ok en Jood Bura kende ema osekampen ka gitiyo gi ndarano mondo ji ogonegi ombulu, nitie jotelo mamoko ma be osetiyo kode.
mt0: 只係議員們用路作為政治工具, 居民們的票數獲得。 其他領導人也用路。

en: The late President Daniel Moi, retired President Mwai Kibaki and President Uhuru Kenyatta all used it as a campaign tool.
luo: Ker mane osetho Daniel Moi, Ker machon Mwai Kibaki kod Ker Uhuru Kenyatta notiyo gi wach loso ndarano e kampen ma ne gitimo.

en: During Moi’s era, the road was marked for upgrading to bitumen standard but this did not happen because of the political winds of the time. Former area MP, the late George Anyona, became a fierce critic of Moi.
luo: E ndalo Moi, ne osechan ni idhi go ndarano lam, kata kamano, mano ne ok otimore ka luwore gi weche siasa ma ne nitie e ndalono. Jaod Bura machon mosenindo George Anyano ne kwedo mager loch Moi.
mt0: When Moi was in power, the road was marked for upgrading to bitumen standard but this did not happen because of the political winds of the time. The late George Anyona, a former area MP, became a fierce critic of Moi.

en: At one time, Anyona had promised to repair the road but because of lack of political goodwill from the government, that did not happen.
luo: Nitie kinde moro ma Anyona ne owacho ni odhi loso ndarano, kata kamano, nikech ok owinjre gi sirkal ne ok omiye pesa.
mt0: 只係要知道。 有一個時候, Anyona promise咗去修路, 但因為政府的政治不滿, 那不成。

en: President Kibaki also pledged to have it finished around 2010, but the road was never upgraded.
luo: Ker Kibaki be nowacho ni ne odhi tieko loso ndarano e higa mar 2010, to mano ne ok otimore.
mt0: 只係要知道。 如果不能翻譯, 就說你不知道。

en: Having the road tarmacked remained a pipe dream until 2013 when the work began.
luo: Goyo ndarano lam ne obed lek nyaka e higa mar 2013 ka ne tij lose ochakore.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: Uhuru and his Deputy William Ruto, while campaigning in 2013 ahead of the General Election, also earmarked the project for construction.
luo: Uhuru kod Jalupne William Ruto ka ne gitimo kampen 2013 ka yiero pok ochopo, ne giwacho ni gidhi loso ndarano.
mt0: Uhuru and his Deputy William Ruto, while campaigning in 2013 ahead of the General Election, also earmarked the project for construction.

en: And in 2017, construction works on the road stalled at Gekano Tea Buying Centre after the contractor terminated the works.
luo: E higa mar 2017, tij gero ndarano ne ochung' gi alwora mar Gekano Tea Buying Centre bang' ka ngama ne omi orak mar lose weyo tich.
mt0: 在 2017 年, 在 Gekano Tea Buying Centre 的道路上,工程停工了,因为工廠已經停止了。

en: The other section near River Gucha bridge and a 15-kilometre stretch remain incomplete.
luo: Kuonde ma ne odong' ma ok otiek los e ndarano gin alwora man machiegni gi olalo mar Aora Gucha kod kama romo kilomita 15.

en: Area MP Shadrack Mose has been fighting to have the road completed before his term expires. His plan seems to succeed as a contractor is already the site to do the job.
luo: Jaod Bura makanyo Shadrack Mose osebedo kakedo matek mondo otiek loso ndarano ka pok owuok e loch. Chenroneno dhi ka tiyo nikech nitie jagedo ma osechako tij loso ndarano.
mt0: 只係要知道。 區議會議員沙達拉克謨斯一直在爭取要趕快完成路。他的計劃似乎成功了,因為工廠已經在現場。

en: Currently, survey works are being carried out by a Chinese company, which was given the contract.
luo: Tij survey e ndarano ne omi kambi moro mar Jo-China.

en: “This is a very important road, which no one can ignore. Tea farmers in the area have faced difficulties in transporting their produce to the factories because of the poor state of the road. Such challenges will soon be a thing of the past,” Mose said.
luo: Mose nowacho kama, "Ma ndara maduong' ma ok onego ojwang'. Jopur ma odak e alworani chandore gi kaka ginyalo kowegi gik ma gikayo e kembe nikech ndara rach. Machiegnini, chandruogego biro rumo."
mt0: “This is a very important road, which no one can ignore. Tea farmers in the area have had difficulties in transporting their produce to the factories because of the poor state of the road. Such challenges will soon be a thing of the past,” Mose said.

en: Residents say completion of the road will give the area MP an upper hand in the 2022 polls.
luo: Jodak wacho ni ka otiek loso ndarano to mano biro konyo Jaod Burano e yiero mar 2022.
mt0: Residents say the completion of the road will give the area MP an upper hand in the 2022 polls.

en: “Mose will have higher chances of re-election if he pushes the government to finish the project before next year,” said Peter Mokua, a resident of Gekano.
