en: Oscars pushed back to April 2021 as film industry scrambles to adapt amid coronavirus
luo: Mich mag Oscar ochwal nyaka April 2021 sama kembe maloso sinema pod nyagore gi tich e kinde tuo corona
mt0: 只係要知道。

en: Film's most prestigious award has had to be postponed after the industry took a major blow amid coronavirus.
luo: Ne ochuno mondo ochor Mich mag Oscar bang' ka josinembe noromo gi chandruoge mang'eny nikech corona.
mt0: 電影的最高榮譽獎被推遲了,因為電影產業受到了嚴重的疫情。

en: The Oscars ceremony for 2021 has been shifted back by nearly two months after the majority of films since March this year had to be put on hold.
luo: Nyasi mag chiwo mich Oscar e higa mar 2021 ne olok tarige gi dweche ariyo bang' ka thoth sinembe ma chakore Mach higani ne ochung.
mt0: 只係回應翻譯。 如果不可以翻譯, 就說你不知道。

en: It has been moved from a February 28th to an April 25th date.This move should accommodate early 2021 releases, delayed because of the pandemic.
luo: Tarik owil kowuok e 28 dwe mar ariyo modhi tarik 25 dwe mar agwen. Mano dhi konyo sinembe mane ogol chak higani nikech tuo mar corona.
mt0: 佢喺二月廿八到四月廿五嘅日期。這次改咗俾咗個月廿五嘅發佈日期,因為疫情,要咗咗個月廿五嘅發佈日期。

en: President of the Academy, David Rubin, and CEO Dawn Hudson, said of their decision: “For over a century, movies have played an important role in comforting, inspiring and entertaining us during the darkest of times.
luo: Ker mar Akedemino, David Rubin kod CEO Dawn Hudson, nowacho kama, "Kuom higni mokalo mia achiel, sinembe osekonyo ahinya e hoyo, jiwo kendo moro chuny ji sama weche tek.
mt0: 只係說你不知道。

en: "Our hope, in extending the eligibility period and our awards date, is to provide the flexibility filmmakers need to finish and release their films without being penalized for something beyond anyone's control."
luo: Dwarowa maduong' sama wachoro nyime tarik mar chiwo mich, en ni mondo okony jolos sinema obed gi thuolo moromo mar tieko loso sinembegi ma ok gogi fain ne gima onge kaka ne ginyalo timo."
mt0: "Our hope, in extending the eligibility period and our awards date, is to provide the flexibility filmmakers need to finish and release their films without being penalized for something beyond anyone's control."

en: The new date’s means nominations will be announced on March 15th 2021, with the submission deadline for general entry categories (which includes Best Picture) on January 15th.
luo: Tarik manyien mochiwno nyiso ni ibiro yier jopiem tarik 15 Mach, 2021, to tarik mogik ma gibiro kawoe nyinge joma piem ne mich (moriwo mich Picha Maber) biro bedo Januar 15.
mt0: 如果你不知道这个日期,就说你不知道。 这个日期意味着提名将在 3月15日宣布,并于 1月15日提交一般入选类别(包括最佳影片)的提名。

en: It is yet another blow to music fans as Kenya mourns popular Benga artiste Erick Omondi who died of cancer in Bondo, Siaya County on Tuesday morning.
luo: Jo-Kenya nigi kuyo mang'eny kendo nikech jathum machielo mar Benga otho, miluongo ni Erick Omondi. Kansa onege Tich Ariyo okinyi Bondo, Siaya Kaonti.

en: The death of the ex-member of the legendary Nabi Kings Band popularly referred to by his fans as "Long Lilo" has gutted his fans.
luo: Tho mar jathum ma chon ni e grup miluongo ni Nabi Kings Band ma ne ong'ere gi nying mar "Long' Lilo" oweyo ji kuyo.
mt0: 只在你不知道的情况下。

en: The 37-year-old father of three died at 4:30 am while undergoing treatment at Bondo Sub-County Hospital.
luo: Nojahigni 37 kendo ne en gi nyithindo adek. Notho kar sa apar gi nus okinyi e kama nithiedhe e Bondo Sub-County Hospital.
mt0: 只係說你不知道。 37-year-old father of three 死於上午 4:30 時, 當他在 Bondo Sub-County Hospital 接受治療時。

en: His wife Goretty Awino and family spokesperson Olima Gondi confirmed the death.
luo: Chiege, Goretty Awino kod Olima Gondi mawuoyo e lo-gi ema nowacho ripod thone.
mt0: Wife Goretty Awino and family spokesperson Olima Gondi confirmed the death.

en: Long Lilo thrilled his fans with his husky voice and engaging lyrics during his prime days when he sang alongside Osito Kalle, another legendary Luo Benga icon who trained him.
luo: Long' Lilo ne moro chuny joherane gi dwonde mamit kod kaka nower ndalo mane ower kanyachiel gi Osito Kalile, ma be Ja-Benga mong'ere kendo ma ne otiege.
mt0: Long Lilo thrilled his fans with his husky voice and engaging lyrics during his prime days when he sang alongside Osito Kalle, another legendary Luo Benga icon who trained him.

en: Some of his hit songs include Goretti Awino, Were wuod Ogalo, Okoth Mang’ang’a, Kong’o shida, Anita Nyausonga , Thomas Mwaya and any more. In his song Japuonj, Omondi praises Osito Kalle for his ability to nurture other singers like himself, Odhiambo Tusker, Aluoch Pamba, Atommy Sifa, Ogina Koko (currently Ramogi FM presenter) and many others.
luo: Moko kuom wendege mong'ere gin Goretti Awino, Were wuod Ogalo, Okoth Mang'ang'a, Kong'o shida, Anita Nyausonga, Thomas Mwaya kod mamoko mang'eny. E wer miluongo ni Japuonj, Omondi pako Osito Kalile nikech nokonye kod jower mamoko kaka Odhiambo Tusker, Aluoch Pamba, Atommy Sifa, Ogina Koko (ma sani en jalendo e redio) kod jomamoko mang'eny.
mt0: Some of his hit songs include Goretti Awino, Were wuod Ogalo, Okoth Mang’ang’a, Kong’o shida, Anita Nyausonga , Thomas Mwaya and any more. In his song Japuonj, Omondi praises Osito Kalle for his ability to nurture other singers like himself, Odhiambo Tusker, Aluoch Pamba, Atommy Sifa, Ogina Koko (currently Ramogi FM presenter) and many others.

en: Odhiambo Tusker after graduating from the hands of Osito composed a hit song Jopuonj, a piece which praised the efforts of teachers in the society and received widespread acclamation among the Luo fan base.
luo: Odhiambo Tusker bang' tieko tiegruok e lwet Osito, ne owero wer mong'ere ni Jopuonj, wendno ne opwoyo kinda ma jopuonje timo kendo ji mang'eny nohero werno e joherana ma Joluo.
mt0: Odhiambo Tusker after graduating from the hands of Osito composed a hit song Jopuonj, a piece which praised the efforts of teachers in the society and received widespread acclamation among the Luo fan base.

en: Osito who mentored them also starred with other songs such as Lesna buoyo ma wiye, Asembo piny maber, Jaber jaula and much more.
luo: Osito ma ne opuonjo gino en be nowero wende kaka Lesna Bwoyo ma Wiye, Asembo Piny Maber, Jaber Jaula kod mamoko.

en: Long’Lilo was reportedly ill with cancer for a long time and at some point was appealing for medical help.

mt0: Long'Lilo was reportedly ill with cancer for a long time and at some point was appealing for medical help.

en: His death comes barely a week after Luo Ohangal fans were shocked with the sudden death of Abenny Jachiga who died in Kisumu abruptly and was buried with less than 48 yours against the wishes of his fans.
luo: Tho mare otimore ka kata juma achiel ema pok orumo are Joluo mohero Ohangla winj ni Abenny Jachiga otho apoya nono Kisumu kendo noyike mapiyo gi seche 48 mopogore gi dwach joherane.
mt0: They died just a week after Luo Ohangal fans were shocked with the sudden death of Abenny Jachiga who died in Kisumu abruptly and was buried with less than 48 yours against the wishes of his fans.

en: Nothing shakes the conscience of mankind than an unexplained death of a celebrity.
luo: Onge gima chandoga chuny oganda moloyo tho apoya mar ng'at ma nigi huma.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。 Nothing shakes the conscience of mankind than an unexplained death of a celebrity.

en: Ken Walibora was not your ordinary celebrity pushed to fame by benevolent spirits.
luo: Ken Walibora ne en ng'at ma nigi huma nikech weche mopogore.
mt0: 只係要知道肯瓦利博拉不是你的普通名人,他被恶魔强迫成名人。

en: At the time of his death, he was one of the most celebrated Swahili writers in Kenya and one of the universally acclaimed authors.
luo: Ne otho ka en achiel kuom jondiko mong'ere mag buge Kiswahili to bende nomiye luor kaka jandiko e piny ngima.

en: Lovers of literature are pained not just by his death but the brutal manner in which it came.

mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: Such death is reserved for troublesome characters in literary works.

en: In such extra ordinary circumstances, the people of Khabondi would seek solace in the emotive Luhya dirge “Olumbe luno toto lwakhabere lurungungwa, mana lukhaya khwira, ndakhaluwere ing’ombe!” translated to mean “If death could be paid to spare someone, I would have given death a cow”.
luo: Sama weche kaka mano otimore, Jo-Luhya nigi wer moro ma wacho kama, “Olumbe luno toto lwakhabere lurungungwa, mana lukhaya khwira, ndakhaluwere ing’ombe!” ma tiende kolok en "Ka dine inyalo chul tho mondo owe ng'ato, dine amiyo tho dhiang'."

en: Admittedly, I have never physically met Walibora.
luo: An ne pok aromo gi Walibora wang' gi wang'.
mt0: Admittedly, I have never met Walibora physically.

en: I first knew him in Standard Seven in primary school when my Kiswahili teacher Peter Busolo insisted that I read Siku Njema and explain the synopsis to him in seven days.
luo: Nakwongo winjo nyinge ka an e klas abiriyo e kinde mane japuonjna mar Kiswahili nochika ni asom bug 'Siku Njema' kae to alerne gima bugno wuoye bang' odiechienge abiriyo.

en: By that time, Siku Njema was a compulsory Kiswahili set book in secondary school, but here was a village-bred juvenile being asked to interpret it.
luo: Ndalono, bug Siku Njema ne isomo e sekondari kata kamano, an to ne pod an nyathi primary to ema inyisa ni asom bugno.

en: Mr Busolo understood the kind of books that would inspire students’ passion.
luo: Mr Busolo ne ong'eyo buge mane nyalo miyo nyithindo oher somo.
mt0: Mr Busolo understood the kind of books that would inspire students' passion.

en: That was the last time he asked me to read any of Walibora’s books.
luo: Mano e kinde mogik ma ne okwaya mondo asom buge Walibora.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: I took it upon myself to monitor the author’s publications and read them.
luo: Bang'e, nachako manyo buge mamoko mag Walibora mondo asom.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: Walibora was a gifted story teller who understood an African village with magic.
luo: Walibora ne ong'eyo gano sigana mamit kendo nong'eyo timbe Jo Afrika.
mt0: Walibora was a gifted story teller who understood an African village with magic.

en: Our continuous interaction has been through his works.
luo: Wang'eye mana kokalo kuom buge mondiko.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: His characters lived among us.
luo: Ne chalo mana ka gima wadak gi joma wuoyo e bugene.
mt0: 只在翻譯中。 如果你不能翻譯, 請說你不知道他的角色住在我們之中。

en: Walibora wrote about things that we could see in our daily lives as students. Most of his characters were an inspiration.
luo: Joma Walibora ne ondiko e bugene ne gin joma waneno e ngimawa mapile kaka jopuonjre. Thoth jogo ne jiwowaga.
mt0: Walibora wrote about things that we could see in our daily lives as students. Most of his characters were an inspiration.

en: I drew quite a number of lessons from Walibora’s works that have guided me to date.
luo: Nitie puonj mang'eny ma ne ayudo e buge Walibora mosetayo ngimana nyaka sani.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: In his master piece Siku Njema, Walibora demystifies the long held African concept of illegitimate children with a single phrase “Mwanaharamu hamna, kitendo ndicho cha haramu” to mean “there is no illegitimate child, it is the act that is illegitimate”.
luo: E buk mane ondiko mong'ere ni Siku Njema, Walibora nokwedo paro monya ma ji nigo e wi nyithindo ma minasi kowacho kama, “Mwanaharamu hamna, kitendo ndicho cha haramu” ma tiende en, "Onge nyathi ma ok owinjore onyuol, tim miyudego ema ok owinjore."
mt0: 在他的杰作《好日》中,他把“儿子和行为都是非法的”一句话用作“没有孩子, 就是行为是非法的”来说明“没有孩子, 就是行为是非法的”。

en: Walibora’s main character in Siku Njema, Msanifu Kombo happens to be such a child. Through him, we are exposed to traumatising experiences that single mothers and their children go through.
luo: Jal miwuoyo kuome ahinya e Siku Njema iluongo ni Msanifu Kombo kende en be ne nyathi ma ne onyuol kamano. Kokalo kuom sigande, ileronwa chandruoge ma mine modak kendgi kaloe kod nyithindgi.
mt0: Msanifu Kombo, a child of a very special age, is a main character in Siku Njema. Through him, we are exposed to traumatising experiences that single mothers and their children go through.

en: The contempt with which society treats such children, and above all, their determination to succeed amid such challenges.
luo: Ileronwa bende kaka joma odak e alwora kwedoga nyithindo ma kamago kod kaka nyithindogo nyagore.
mt0: 只係要知道社會對這些孩子所做的冷漠,以及最重要的是,他們的決心要成功在這些挑戰中。

en: Perhaps it is because of his humble upbringing or the strict Christian upbringing under Jehova’s Witness denomination.
luo: Nyalo bedo ni gima konyo Walibora ndiko buge mabeyo kamano en nikech nopon e od joma oluoro Nyasaye e din mar Jehovah's Witness kata Joneno mag Jehova.
mt0: Maybe it is because of his humble upbringing or the strict Christian upbringing under Jehova's Witness denomination.

en: In my teaching of Children Law, I have found myself citing Walibora more than any other literary scholar.
luo: Asefwenyo ni ahero wacho weche ma ne Walibora owacho moloyo jondiko mamoko sama apuonjo Chik mar Nyithindo.
mt0: 只在教孩子法,我发现自己引用瓦尔博拉比其他作家比任何其他作家更多。

en: His contribution to jurisprudence cannot be gainsaid.
luo: Walibora nokonyo ahinya e weche Chik.
mt0: 只回译。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: As a lawyer, I draw inspiration from Walibora’s book Kufa Kuzikana, translated by Prof Egara Kabaji et al as “Friends for Life”.
luo: An okil, kendo ahero ahinya somo buk mane Walibora ondiko miluongo ni "Kufa Kuzikana" ma Profesa Egara Kabaji oloko ni "Osiepe ma Ngita gi Del."
mt0: As a lawyer, I draw inspiration from Walibora's book Kufa Kuzikana, translated by Prof Egara Kabaji et al as "Friends for Life".

en: In this text, a litigant who has made several trips to a lawyer’s office to claim money paid to the lawyer by an insurance company after an accident eventually commits suicide when the lawyer becomes uncooperative.
luo: E bugno, iwuoyo kuom ng'at moro ma ne odere nikech ne odhi e ofis okil mondo omiye pesa mar insurance bang' yudo hinyruok to okil notamore.
mt0: 在這段故事中,一個律師的辦公室多次到過,以獲得律師的錢,因為事故後,律師的事務所向他請求了錢,最終他自殺了。

en: The mastery of African idioms runs through his works.
luo: Bugene mang'eny opong' gi ngeche mag Jo-Afrika.
mt0: 只回译。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: Such lawyers within the legal circles are known as ambulance chasers. They exist in every corner of this country; taking advantage of victims of accidents to mint millions of shillings.
luo: Okinde kaka mago iluongo ni joma lawo geche mating'o jotuo. Giyudore kamora amora e pinyni, kendo gihero tiyo gi thuolo moneno sama aksident otimore mondo giyudo pesa mang'eny.
mt0: 如此律师在法律圈子里被称为“救护车追逐者”。他们存在于每个角落,利用交通事故的受害者,以赚取数百万英镑。

en: My prayer is that the fate of Walibora’s characters will not befall him in death.
luo: Lamona en ni tho Walibora kik ochal gi mag joma ondiko e bugene.
mt0: 只翻译。 如果不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: In such a society as ours, it calls for the courage and sobriety of men like Walibora to expose the social evils bedeviling mankind.
luo: E kindewagi, dwaro ni ng'ato ni obed gi chir kaka Walibora mondo onyeny e lela gik maricho matimore.
mt0: 在这样的社会中,这需要勇气和淑德的男人,像瓦利博拉这样的人,来揭示社会丑闻。

en: The social pretense, political expediency and economic marginalisation are some of the things that informed Walibora’s works.
luo: Moko kuom gik miwuoyoe e buge Walibora oriwo wuodruok ma ji nigo, wuondruok mag josiasa kod mibadhi e weche pesa.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: The simplicity with which he told complex stories reveals the character of a man who was attached to society.
luo: Nohera ahinya ji to mano nenore gi kaka nolero mayot sigendni mogajore.
mt0: 只在你不知道的情況下,你只在说复杂的故事。

en: The soils will consume the finest brains of our land.
luo: Jomariek tho rumo.
mt0: 只在翻譯中。 如果不理解, 請說你不知道。

en: Literature can be very predictive. Many things that Walibora wrote about have come to pass.
luo: Seche moko buge nyalo koro gik madhi timore. Thoth gik ma Walibora nondiko osetimore.
mt0: Literature mën gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra. en: His death and burial resemble that of the characters he wrote about.

en: Hyrax Hills National Museum, one of Kenya’s critical archaeological sites and a national monument is marking 100 years of existence this month.

en: Records from the museum however reveal low visitation despite the critical role in education sector with the bulk of visitors being learners.

en: In the 10-minute song, Maritim warns about a certain incurable disease, urging his listeners to literally run to the hills for safety.

en: “Don’t let anyone touch you/ even when you are in bed sleeping/ Don’t brush shoulders with anyone even when you are walking around/ Don’t shake hands with anyone; and why should you? do you know that the person has come from or touched....?” Goes part of the chorus.
luo: Bath koras mar wendno wacho kama, "Kik iwe nga'to omuli/ kata sama inindo e otanda; Kik ituomri gi ng'ato ang'ata sama iwuotho; Kik imos lwet ng'ato; ang'o momiyo idwa mose? Be ing'eyo kama ng'atno oaye kota omulo…?"
mt0: “Don't let anyone touch you/ even when you are in bed sleeping/ Don't brush shoulders with anyone even when you are walking around/ Don't shake hands with anyone; and why should you? do you know that the person has come from or touched....?” Goes part of the chorus.

en: The 62-year-old singer from Bomet County is known for his social commentary.

mt0: 歌手62岁从波特顿州出名。他为他的社会评论而出名。

en: He said he composed the uncharacteristically lengthy song in 2002.

en: “At the time, I was in Eldoret and television channels were awash with reports of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) which had broken out in China and was spreading to other countries,” Maritim said.
luo: Maritim wacho kama, "E kindeno, nadak Eldoret kendo nilando e tv ripode mag tuo miluongo ni Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) mane omouch China kendo landore e pinje mamoko."
mt0: “At the time, I was in Eldoret and television channels were awash with reports of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) which had broken out in China and was spreading to other countries,” Maritim said.

en: “From the scary news clip I saw medics in protective gear attending to patients, and outside, police officers were chasing people off the streets. It was then that I decided to compose a song about this phenomenon.”
luo: Odhi nyime wacho kama, "Pichni ma ne anenogo ne nyalo bwogo ng'ato kendo naneno laktech kobawore gi lewni moumo dendgi duto sama githietho jotuo, to polise ne riembo ji odog e utegi. Mano e ma nomiyo andiko wendno."
mt0: “From the scary news clip I saw medics in protective gear attending to patients, and outside, police officers were chasing people off the streets. It was then that I decided to compose a song about this phenomenon.”

en: He says that he did not even sit down to write lyrics to the song titled “SARS”.

mt0: 他說他連寫歌詞都不寫了。

en: Maritim started singing in 1981 and has a repertoire of over 100.

en: He says he just entered the studio and “went with the flow”.

en: “What scared me was China’s directive outlawing spitting. I dreaded what would happen in Kenya if SARS got here, considering that members of the Kalenjin community have a habit of spitting all over the place,” Maritim said.
luo: Maritim medo wacho kama, "Gima nomiya luoro en chik mane China ogolo makwero ng'udho olap. Naluor ahinya kane aparo gima biro timore ka SARS ochopo Kenya, nikech thoth Jo-Kalenjin nigi tim mar ng'udho olaw kamoro amora."
mt0: “What scared me was China’s directive outlawing spitting. I dreaded what would happen in Kenya if SARS got here, considering that members of the Kalenjin community have a habit of spitting all over the place,” Maritim said.

en: Though the song got considerable airtime, Maritim says he is surprised by the renewed interest in the song in the face of Covid-19.

en: The singer blasted Kenyans for disregarding the government directives on containment of Covid-19.
luo: Jawerno ne noseyo Jo-Kenya ma tamore luwo chike ma sirkal chiwo mondo ogeng' landruok mar Covid-19.
mt0: 歌手 骂 Kenyans karena telah kurang ajar aturan pemerintah mengenai karantina Covid-19.

en: “The world managed to beat SARS and Ebola by adhering to prescribed safety measures. Here, we are just dancing with death,” he said.
luo: Nowacho kama, "SARS kod Ebola ne orumo nikech ji noluwo chike ma ne oketnegi. Wan watugo gi tho."
mt0: “The world managed to beat SARS and Ebola by adhering to prescribed safety measures. Here, we are just dancing with death,” he said.

en: When asked whether he was living up to his own message of staying safe as per his message in the song, he said: “My brother, have you spotted me in the streets lately? I have confined myself to my house as a matter of fact.”
luo: Ka ne openje ka be oluwo paro ma ne ochiwo e wer mane owero, nowacho kama, "Osiepa, be iseroma koda kawuotho oko machiegnini? Alorora e oda."
mt0: 当问他是否遵守了自己的信条,即保持安全,如歌中的信条,他回答说:“我的兄弟,你最近看到我在街上吗?我已经闭上我的房子,事实证明。”

en: Maritim argued that according to him there is no difference between SARS and Covid-19.

mt0: Maritim argued that according to him there is no difference between SARS and Covid-19.

en: “It is the same disease, just diffident names. You just look at the symptoms and the origins and it’s the same thing.
luo: Owacho niya, "En tuo achiel, nying ema opogore. Tem ane rango ranyisi mag tuogo kod kaka ne gichakore, ibiro yudo ni gin gimoro achiel.
mt0: “It is the same disease, just different names. You just look at the symptoms and the origins and it’s the same thing.

en: “During SARS people were advised to practice social distancing and those infected were quarantined.
luo: E kinde tuo mar SARS, ne onyis ji mondo kik gibed machiegni gi jowetegi to jotuo ne iketo tenge.
mt0: “During SARS people were advised to practice social distancing and those infected were quarantined.

en: “We were also told to wash our hands and cover our mouths while coughing. Aren’t we now being told the same things?” he said.

mt0: “We were also told to wash our hands and cover our mouths when coughing. Aren’t we now being told the same things?” he said.

en: Kenyan, Christian, Queer by the academic Adriaan Van Klinken provides a way to imagine a future continent where members of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and intersex (LGBTI) community can exercise their rights to dignity, voice, agency, space and health without fear of stigma, harassment and worse.

en: USIU-Africa Vice Chancellor Paul Zeleza said the partnership will position both institutions as resource centres for local broadcasters, media, film and communication researchers and scholars as USIU-Africa will be able to offer mentorship programmes for students interested in film.
luo: Vice chancellor mar USIU-Africa, Paul Zeleza, nowacho ni winjruok ma gitimono biro miyo kuonde tiegruokgo obed kama inyalo kawie joma itiyogo e ute fwambo gi keyo kaachiel kod joma timo nonro nikech USIU-Africa biro konyo jopuonjre madwaro ng'eyo kaka iloso sinema.
mt0: 如果不清楚, 就说你不知道。 USIU-Africa Vice Chancellor Paul Zeleza said the partnership will position both institutions as resource centres for local broadcasters, media, film and communication researchers and scholars as USIU-Africa will be able to offer mentorship programmes for students interested in film.

en: “We will conduct film industry research and collect data, which will enable us to develop short courses tailor-made for industry practitioners for certification,” said Prof Zeleza.
luo: Profesa Zeleza nowacho kama, "Wadhi timo nonro e wi sinembe kendo choko weche mabiro konyowa loso klese moko machieko ne joma puonjore loso sinema kae to wamiyogi satifiket."
mt0: “We will conduct film industry research and collect data, which will enable us to develop short courses tailor-made for industry practitioners for certification,” said Prof Zeleza.

en: Kenya Film Commission Chief Executive Officer Timothy Owase said the State corporation will continue to source and negotiate for tax relief incentives on film and animation equipment to boost the industry growth.

mt0: Kenya Film Commission Chief Executive Officer Timothy Owase said the State corporation will continue to source and negotiate for tax relief incentives on film and animation equipment to boost the industry growth.

en: “We will offer guidance on standards of excellence and advocate for the use of best practice in film production while working closely with relevant government agencies to create robust and streamlined mid-level film education that will lead to more exportation of locally-made films,” sais Owase.
luo: Owase nowacho kama, "Wabiro chiwo weche matayo rang'iny monego bedie kendo wabiro ji mondo otem giti tich maber e loso sinema ka watiyo machiegni gi ofise mowinjore mag sirkal  e chiwo puonj makare mabiro miyo sinembe miloso onyis nyaka e pinje maoko."
mt0: “We will offer guidance on standards of excellence and advocate for the use of best practice in film production while working closely with relevant government agencies to create a robust and streamlined mid-level film education that will lead to more exportation of locally-made films,” sais Owase.

en: Joseph Kwambai, 70, said modernisation has changed the African society from a traditional socio-economic setup to where locals have now adapted to new norms and way of life.

en: “Driven by the need to ensure future generations get a feeling of how Africans behaved and conducted themselves in the past, I have been collecting Keiyo relics and preserving them in a museum in Chekobei village in Keiyo south sub county for the past 20 years,” said Mr Kwambai.
luo: Kwambai nowacho kama, "Daher ni tieng' mabiro ong'e kaka kit ngima Jo-Afrika ne chalo kod kaka ne gitimo gik moko, omiyo asebedo ka achoko gik machon mag Jo-Keiyo kendo kanogi e museum mantie Chekobei ei Keiyo South Sub-county kuom higni 20."

en: Situated next to Chekobei Primary, along the Iten-Kabarnet road, the cultural centre is decked with a collection of books showing how the cultural heritages of African communities used to live and socialize in the past.
luo: Museumno yudore machiegni gi Chekobei Primary e ndara mar Iten-Kabarnet, kendo opong' gi buge mawuoyo e wi kaka ogendni mopogore opogore mag Afrika nodak e kinde machon.
mt0: Cultural centre located next to Chekobei Primary, along the Iten-Kabarnet road, is filled with a collection of books showing how the cultural heritages of African communities used to live and socialize in the past.

en: It even holds currencies in different denominations and states.

en: “I have several Biographies including the one of the late second President Daniel Arap Moi “the making of an African Statesman” by Andrew Morton and many others.
luo: Nowacho kama, "An gi buge malero ngima ji kaka Ker Daniel Arap Moi miluongo ni "Kaka Ker ma Ja Afrika Nokelo Betie" mondik gi Andrew Morton kod buge mamoko.
mt0: "I have several Biographies including the one of the late second President Daniel Arap Moi "the making of an African Statesman" by Andrew Morton and many others.

en: Books written by colonialists are also available,” he said.

en: Apart from the books at the Museum, other items showcased include those used in war, ceremonies, rituals, kitchen-ware and farming among others.
luo: Mopogore gi buge, gik mamoko ma be inyiso e Museum kanyo gin gik machon ma ne otigo e lweny, nyasi, lamo, gik jokon, gige pur kod mamoko.
mt0: 除了书,其他物品在博物館中展示包括战争、仪式、仪式、厨具和农作物。

en: Even the Bible and Quran are in the center.

en: There is also a Keiyo homestead erected to illustrate how a family shared the rooms.
luo: Nitie ot molos mar Jo Keiyo manyiso kaka joot machon ne odak.
mt0: 亦有一座木屋,以示一家人共用房間。

en: The old man was forced to travel wide and far in search of the traditional item.
luo: Jaduong'no osewuotho kuonde maboyo komanyo gik machon-go.

en: “I am still collecting the items and part of history that I come across about different cultures more so the Keiyo community. Other communities should take up the initiative and ensure they preserve their cultures as a way of ensuring the coming generations will not be enslaved by the coming up of modernisation,” he opined.
luo: Owacho kama, "Pod adhi nyime choko gik machon kod gige histori malero kit ngima dhoudi mopogore opogore to ahinya ma Jo Keiyo. Dhoudi mamoko be onego ochak timo gima atimoni mondo yoregi kod kit ngimagi kik lal to kar mano gisik ne tienge mabiro mi kik gibed wasumbni mag ngima ma nyasani."
mt0: “I am still collecting the items and part of history that I come across about different cultures more so the Keiyo community. Other communities should take up the initiative and ensure they preserve their cultures as a way of ensuring the coming generations will not be enslaved by the coming up of modernisation,” he opined.

en: The centre was then commissioned in 2006 but officially opened four years later to the public.
luo: Ne olos museumno e higa mar 2006, kata kamano, ne oyawe e higni ang'wen bang'e.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果不翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: George Otieno’s passion for art started way back in 1988, on his first day in a primary school in Busia County, while staying with his maternal grandmother.
luo: George Otieno nochako hero goro e higa mar 1988 e odiechienge mokwongo e skund primari e kaonti mar Busia, ndalo ma ne odak gi dagi.
mt0: George Otieno's passion for art started way back in 1988, on his first day in a primary school in Busia County, while staying with his maternal grandmother.

en: “The first assignment in Standard One for us was to draw a vehicle. I drew a pickup, which the teacher liked and gave me a red tick. Since then, I knew any good thing should have a red tick. That is when I knew drawing is good,” said Otieno.
luo: Otieno wacho kama, "Ka ne ane klas achiel, gima ne okwong nyiswa ni watim ne en goro mtoka. Ne agoro gach pikap, ma japuonj nochuoyona tik makwar. Chakre kindeno, ne ang'eyo ni gimoro amora maber onego obed gi tik makwar. Mano e ndalo mane afwenyoe ni goro mit."
mt0: “The first assignment in Standard One for us was to draw a vehicle. I drew a pickup, which the teacher liked and gave me a red tick. Since then, I knew any good thing should have a red tick. That is when I knew drawing is good,” said Otieno.

en: In Class Five, he started using coloured pencil.
luo: Ka ne ochopo e klas abich, ne ochako goro kotiyo gi kalas.
mt0: 只用回译。 在五班他开始用彩色铅笔。

en: Later, he moved to Nairobi and did some causal jobs in the city’s Industrial Area as a causal labourer, though he never stopped painting, albeit for fun.
luo: Bang'e ne odhi Nairobi kendo notiyo tije matindo tindo e Industrial Area, kata kamano, ne ok oweyo goro nikech nohero ahinya timo kamano.
mt0: 后来他去奈洛比, 在奈洛比的工业区工作, 但他一直没停止画, 只是玩玩而已。

en: “In the year 2007 I received Sh3,000 for a paint I did for then Health Minister Charity Ngilu and Sh7,000 from a former Kenya Dairy Board managing director. I then knew art pays,” said Otieno at his art studio in Milimani Court in Obama Estate, Nairobi.
luo: Otieno ma sani nigi studio mare e Milimani Court e Obama Estate, Nairobi, wacho kama: "E higa mar 2007, ne ochula siling 3,000 kane agoro Charity Ngilu ma ne ochung' ne Migawo mar Thieth ndalono, kendo nayudo siling 7,000 ka ne agoro dairekta machon mar Kenya Dairy Board. Nafwenyo ni kara goro nigi pesa."
mt0: “In 2007 I received Sh3,000 for a paint I did for then Health Minister Charity Ngilu and Sh7,000 from a former Kenya Dairy Board managing director. I then knew art pays,” said Otieno at his art studio in Milimani Court in Obama Estate, Nairobi.

en: He quit the casual job, used the Sh30,000 he received after painting a picture of former President Daniel Moi to buy drawing equipment.
luo: Ne oweyo tich ma ne otiyo kae to otiyo gi siling 30,000 mane omiye kogoro Ker machon Daniel Moi e ng'iewo gige goro.
mt0: 他辞去了他的平静的工作,用他所获得的 30,000 元钱买画笔。

en: He then set up a small workshop and ventured into commercial art.
luo: Kae to noyawo nyaduka moro matin mane ousoe gik mogoro.
mt0: 然后他开始了小工作室,开始了商业艺术。

en: In 2002 when President Uhuru Kenyatta was running for presidency, Otieno saw a picture of former President Moi published in The Standard wearing a red kitenge shirt decorated with Kenya African National Union (Kanu) colours and a cockerel.
luo: E higa mar 2002, kane Ker Uhuru Kenyatta dwaro bedo ker, Otieno ne oneno picha mar ker machon Moi koket e The Standard korwako kitenge makwar ma nigi rangi mag KANU kod gweno.
mt0: Otieno aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa

en: “I drew Mzee Moi and besides him put President Kenyatta. I then drew Kanu flag and wrote, “Kanu Yajenga Nchi”.
luo: Otieno wacho ni "Ne agoro Mzee Moi kae to e bathe agoro Ker Kenyatta. Nagoro bendech KANU kae to andiko ni: "Kanu Yajenga Nchi".

en: "A neighbour saw and liked it. He introduced me to a friend called Mutua, who worked with then Presidential Escort Unit. Mutua asked him to bring the painting so that he could see it,” said Otieno.
luo: Nitie jiranda ma ne oneno pichano mohere. Bang'e, ne otuda gi osiepne moro miluongo ni Mutua ma ndalono ne tiyo gi askeche makowoga gach ker. Mutua ne onyise mondo okel picha mogorno mondo one."
mt0: "A neighbour saw and liked it. He introduced me to a friend called Mutua, who worked with the then Presidential Escort Unit. Mutua asked him to bring the painting so that he could see it," said Otieno.

en: They met and Mutua introduced him to a University of Nairobi lecturer Prof Geoffrey ole Maloiy, a close friend of the late Mzee Moi, who took the painting to the President.
luo: Ne giromo kendo Mutua ne otude gi japuonj matiyo e Yunivasiti mar Nairobi Profesa Geoffrey Ole Maloiy, ma ne en osipe Mzee Moi. Ne okawo pichano momiyo Ker.
mt0: They met and Mutua introduced him to a University of Nairobi lecturer Prof Geoffrey ole Maloiy, a close friend of the late Mzee Moi, who took the painting to the President.

en: “Within two days, Mutua called me and said Moi liked it and had paid Sh30,000. That was the first good amount I received from art and it was like a jackpot. The joy that President Moi liked my work and paid for it inspired me a lot,” said Otieno, born in Seme, Kisumu County.
luo: Otieno dhi nyime lero niya, "Bang' odiechienge ariyo, Mutua nogochona monyisa ni Moi nohero pichano kendo ochulo siling 30,000. Mano e pesa maber mane ahango yudo kuom goro. Ne amor ahinya ng'eyo ni Ker Moi nohera tija mochula pesa to wachno jiwaga ahinya."
mt0: "Mutua called me and said Moi liked it and had paid Sh30,000. That was the first good amount I received from art and it was like a jackpot. The joy that President Moi liked my work and paid for it inspired me a lot," said Otieno, born in Seme, Kisumu County.

en: He has also sold two paintings of former US President Barrack Obama to an art collector, which fetched him Sh500,000.
luo: Bende, ne ouso pichni moko ariyo mag Ker machon mar Amerka, Barrack Obama, ne ng'at moro mohero choko gik mogor kendo nochule siling 500,000.
mt0: 他还卖了两幅前美国总统巴拉克·奥巴马的画,这笔钱他付给了一位艺术收藏家,他付给了他500,000元。

en: However, there is a Cabinet Secretary he claims owes him Sh30,000.
luo: Kata kamano, owacho ni nitie Cabinet Secretary moro ma obandho siling 30,000.
mt0: 但有一位政府发言人他称他欠他 30,000 元。

en: He didn’t give details.
luo: Ne ok ofulo nyinge.
mt0: 只回翻譯。 如果不清楚, 就說你不知道。

en: “There are two pictures I painted of former President Mwai Kibaki on a wheelchair and another in his office. They cost Sh500,000 but I was never paid,” said Otieno.
luo: Otieno wacho kama, "Nitie pichni ariyo ma ne agoro mag ker machon Mwai Kibaki ka en e wheelchair gi machielo ka en e ofis. Nengogi giduto en siling 500,000 to ne ok ochula."
mt0: "Ndi na picha mbili oyo nĩ nĩyandĩkĩte ya Mwai Kibaki nĩ gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra gũtũmĩra

en: It was all glamour at the 2018 Kalasha awards ceremony held on Saturday evening at the Safari Park Hotel in Nairobi.
luo: Mor lilo ne opong'o nyasi mar 2018 Kalasha awards ma ne otimore Ngeso godhiambo e Safari Park Hotel, Nairobi.
mt0: 只係在這場 2018 Kalasha Awards 嘅晚宴上, 在Safari Park Hotel 嘅Nairobi 嘅晚宴上, 一切都係 glamorous.

en: The red carpet event hosted by the Kenya Film Commission, in its eighth edition, featured the who’s who in the film industry, dignitaries and top Government officials.
luo: Nyasi manyadhino ne ochan gi Kenya Film Commission ka ma e nyasi mar aboro, kendo joma ne obiro gin joma tek tek e sinembe, welo modhial kod joma nigi migepe madongo e Sirkal.

en: Journalists Amina Rabar and Jeff Koinange made sure the audience was entertained with their tickling punchlines as they emceed the event.
luo: MC mag nyasino ne gin jofwombo Amina Rabar kod Jeff Koinange kendo ne ginego  ji gi nyiero.
mt0: 记者阿米娜·拉巴尔和杰夫·科林根让观众感到有趣,他们在活动中表演了有趣的戏剧。

en: Baringo Senator Gideon Moi, ICT Cabinet Secretary Joe Mucheru, principal secretaries Fatuma Hirsi and Jerome Ochieng, Nairobi Woman Representative Esther Passaris and officials from the French embassy attended the function. Others included actors Charles Bukeko (Papa Shirandula), Mary Khavere (Mama Kayai), Lucy Wangui and Pascal Tokodi.
luo: Joma ne obiro e nyasino oriwo Seneta ma Baringo, Gideon Moi, Jatend migawo mar ICT Joe Mucheru, principal secretaries Fatuma Hirsi kod Jerome Ochieng', Nairobi Woman Representative Esther Passaris kod joma tiyo e ofis mbetre mar France. Jomamoko noriwo jotugo Charles Bukeko (Papa Shirandula), Mary Khavere (Mama Kayai), Lucy Wangui kod Pascal Tokodi.
mt0: Senator Gideon Moi, ICT Cabinet Secretary Joe Mucheru, principal secretaries Fatuma Hirsi and Jerome Ochieng, Nairobi Woman Representative Esther Passaris and officials from the French embassy attended the function. Others included actors Charles Bukeko (Papa Shirandula), Mary Khavere (Mama Kayai), Lucy Wangai and Pascal Tokodi.

en: Senator Gideon lauded the event for celebrating and rewarding local talent and sustaining the future of the local music industry.
luo: Seneta Gideon ne opwoyo nyasani kuom jiwo kendo siro Jo-Kenya ma nigi mich mag wer.
mt0: Senator Gideon lauded the event for celebrating and rewarding local talent and sustaining the future of the local music industry.

en: The Kanu chairman also applauded the Kenya Film Commission and Kalasha for a job well done.
luo: Jakomno mar KANU bende ne opwoyo Kenya Film Commission kod Kalasha kuom timo tich maber.
mt0: Kanu chairman also applauded the Kenya Film Commission and Kalasha for a well done job.

en: “We want the local film industry to set the trend and make upcoming and aspiring musicians feel like they want to be part of it in years to come. With this kind of event, Kenya could easily provide 90 per cent local content and not be boring,” said Gideon.
luo: Gideon ne owacho kama, "Wadwaro ni joma loso sinembe Kenya obed namba achiel e kelo paro manyien kendo gjiw jower ma eka chako mondo obed gi siso mar riwore kodgi. Ka nyasi kaka mae nitie, Kenya nyalo loso mayot pasent 90 mag sinembe minyiso e tv kendo ji ok bi ol nenogi."
mt0: "We want the local film industry to set the trend and make upcoming and aspiring musicians feel like they want to be part of it in years to come. With this kind of event, Kenya could easily provide 90 per cent local content and not be boring," said Gideon.

en: CS Mucheru commended the winners and requested the local Kenya Film Commission to inject new blood and life into the local film industry.
luo: CS Mucheru nopwoyo joma ne olocho kendo nokwayo Kenya Film Commision mondo gikel ji kod paro manyien e sinembe ma giloso.
mt0: CS Mucheru commended the winners and requested the local Kenya Film Commission to inject new blood and life into the local film industry.

en: He said President Uhuru Kenyatta’s administration was committed to having the local film industry transform the country.
luo: Nowacho ni sirkand Ker Uhuru Kenyatta tiyo matek mondo sinembe miloso Kenya olok piny.
mt0: Presidenti Uhuru Kenyatta's administration aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa

en: “We want to come out with a blockbuster movie to be sold in Africa, China and the rest of the world. We also want to set up a task force to ensure that we transform the local film industry by building theatres in all the 47 counties with the support of my ministry, the Nairobi senator, the Government and the media to ensure we come out with the best in terms of movies,” said Mr Mucheru.
luo: Mucheru nowacho kama, "Wadwaro loso sinema moro maduong' ma ibiro us e Afrika, China kod piny duto. Bende, nitie grup ma dwaro loso ma dhi nyime gi tich mar neno ni gikelo lokruoge moko kaka gero kuonde neno sinema e kaonti duto 47 ka ikonyogi gi migawo ma atiyoe, seneta mar Nairobi, Sirkal kod ute fwambo mondo mi walos sinembe mabeyo ahinya."
mt0: "We want to come out with a blockbuster movie to be sold in Africa, China and the rest of the world. We also want to set up a task force to ensure that we transform the local film industry by building theatres in all the 47 counties with the support of my ministry, the Nairobi senator, the Government and the media to ensure we come out with the best in terms of movies," said Mr Mucheru.

en: There was also a moment of silence to pay tribute to fallen heroes among them former Vitimbi and Vioja Mahakamani actor Charles Kimani alias Masaku, former Churchill comedian Emmanuel Makori popularly known as Ayeiya and Mombasa-based actress Maureen Wanza,popularly known as Sasha.
luo: Ji ne okawo thuolo mar paro jogo ma osetho ma ne ong'ere moriwo ji kaka Charles Kimani mong'ere kaka Masaku e Vitimbi kod Vioja Mahakamani, ja miji nyiero e Churchil show Emmanuel Makori ma ne ong'ere kaka Ayeiya kod jatuk sinema ma niga Mombasa, Maureen Wanza ma ne ong'ere kaka Sasha.
mt0: Also a moment of silence was held to pay tribute to fallen heroes among them former Vitimbi and Vioja Mahakamani actor Charles Kimani alias Masaku, former Churchill comedian Emmanuel Makori popularly known as Ayeiya and Mombasa-based actress Maureen Wanza, popularly known as Sasha.

en: Organisers asked Kenyans to help pay the hospital bill for actor Kone Nouhoum of Selina, who was involved in an accident a few weeks ago and is in the ICU.
luo: Joma ne ochano nyasino ne okwayo Jo-Kenya mondo gikony e chulo bill mar osiptal ne jatuk sinema Kone Nouhoum mar Selina, ma ne oyudo aksident jumbe moko mokalo kendo sani nie ICU.
mt0: Organisers asked Kenyans to help pay the hospital bill for actor Kone Nouhoum of Selina, who was involved in an accident a few weeks ago and is in the ICU.

en: Kalasha International Awards is an annual event presented by the Kenya Film Commission whose mandate is to promote a vibrant local film industry.
luo: Kalasha International Awards en nyasi mitimoga higa ka higa kitayo gi Kenya Film Commission ma dwache maduong' en loso sinembe mabeyo ma ji ohero.

en: The initiative seeks to recognise talent in the different facets of film and TV industry by awarding those in the five original branches of filmmaking: directors, actors, writers, producers and technicians.
luo: Nyasino temo ahinya mondo gijiw tich matek ma ji timo e loso sinema kod programbe mag TV ka gichiwo mich ne kidienje abich mong'ere e chenro mar loso sinema ma gin: dairekta, jotug sinema, jondiko, jomaloso sinema kod funde.
mt0: Initiative aims to recognise talent in the different facets of film and TV industry by awarding those in the five original branches of filmmaking: directors, actors, writers, producers and technicians.

en: It was a big moment for those who bagged awards. Kenya’s film industry is growing slowly but surely, with people like Wanuri Kahiu getting recognised internationally for their work in film.
luo: Jogo ma ne oyudo mich ne omor ahinya. Sinembe miloso Kenya dhi nyime timo dongruok mosmos, ka jomoko kaka Wanuri Kahiu to ong'ere e piny ngima gi tije e sinema.
mt0: It was a big moment for those who bagged awards. Kenya's film industry is growing slowly but surely, with people like Wanuri Kahiu getting recognised internationally for their work in film.

en: The event was sponsored by KTN, Communications Authority of Kenya, Anga Imax, Canon Kenya, French embassy, Kenya Broadcasting Corporation, Buzz, Kwese Inflix, Media Council of Kenya, Movie Mtaani, Pixel, Scoop Network, Safari Park Hotel, Telcom Kenya, USIU, and Brand Kenya.
luo: Sponsa mag nyasino ne gin KTN, Communications Authoriy of Kenyha, Anga Imax, Canon Kenya, French embassy, Kenya Broadcasting Corporation, Buzz, Kwese Inflix, Media Council of Kenya, Movie Mtaani, Pixel, Scoop Network, Safari Park Hotel, Telcom Kenya, USIU kod Brand Kenya.
mt0: KTN, Communications Authority of Kenya, Anga Imax, Canon Kenya, French embassy, Kenya Broadcasting Corporation, Buzz, Kwese Inflix, Media Council of Kenya, Movie Mtaani, Pixel, Safari Park Hotel, Telcom Kenya, USIU, and Brand Kenya.

en: Writer King’ori Gachoka was 22 years old when he first met celebrated author Francis Imbuga.
luo: Jandiko miluongo ni King'ori Gachoka ne jahigni 22 ka ne ohango romo gi jandiko mong'ere Francis Imbuga.
mt0: Writer King’ori Gachoka was 22 years old when he first met celebrated author Francis Imbuga.

en: Things were so bad for the budding writer such that he could not afford a typewriter.
luo: Weche ne dhi maber ne jandiko maa pinyno kendo ne ok nyal kata ng'iewo typewriter.
mt0: 只在句子中。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: His script for a play had just been rejected by a local television station because it was handwritten, and he thought this could end his dream.
luo: Nitie tugo ma ne ondiko motero e TV, kata kamano jogo notamore nikech ne nondiko gi lwete kendo noparo ni mano e giko lek mare.
mt0: 只在你不知道的情况下。

en: At the time, Gachoka was a student at Kenyatta University where the late Prof Imbuga, then 47 years old, was his dean, in the Arts Department.
luo: E kindeno, Gachoko ne en japuonjre e Kenyatta University kaman Profesa Imbuga ma ne jahigni 47 kindeno, ne en dean mare e Arts Department.
mt0: Gachoka alikuwa mshale wa Kenyatta University where Prof Imbuga, alikuwa mzee wa miaka 47, alikuwa dean wa eneo la Sanaa.

en: His frustrations led him to share the rejected piece with Imbuga with the aim of borrowing his typewriter.
luo: Nopimone Imbuga chandruok ma ne en-go ka dwache en ni Imbuga okonye gi typewriter.
mt0: 他的烦恼促使他把这份被拒绝的论文与Imbuga分享,以借用他的笔记本。

en: The professor was impressed with his work and allowed him to use his valuable Olympia Traveller DeLuxe portable typewriter.
luo: Profesano ne omor ahinya gima nondiko mi oyiene mondo oti gi masin mare ma nengone tek miluongo ni Olympia Traveller DeLuxe portable typewritter.
mt0: 只在翻译中。

en: Yesterday, Gachoka, who will soon turn 47, could not hold back his tears as he parted with the typewriter, the same one that kick-started his career as well as Imbuga’s.
luo: Nyoro Gachoka, ma biro rwako higni 47 machiegni, ne oywako sama ne ochiwo typewriter ma ne en kachiel gi Imbuga ochakogo tich.
mt0: Yesterday, Gachoka, who will soon turn 47, could not hold back his tears as he parted with the typewriter, the same one that kick-started his career as well as Imbuga’s.

en: The typewriter will now be part of the exhibition of Imbuga’s literary works.
luo: Typewriter-no koro biro bedo achiel kuom gik mitang'o kinyiso tije Imbuga.
mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: “I took time to prepare myself because I knew it was not going to be an easy thing. So in July and August this year, I carried the typewriter to every meeting I attended and everywhere I went,” said Gachoka.
luo: Gachoka ne owacho kama, "Ne akawo thuolo mondo aikra maber nikech ne ang'eyo ni ok odhi bedo mayot chiwo. Omiyo e dwe mar Julai kod Agost higani, ne ating'oga typewriter-no e romo duto kod kamoro amora ma ne adhiye."

en: The exhibition, which opens tomorrow at the Kenya National Archives will showcase Imbuga’s life in pictures, writings and mementos spanning from his grandparents who turned him into storyteller to fun times quaffing his favorite Tusker beer with friends at the Kenya National Theatre.

en: The International Telecommunication Union (ITU) has also established that a 10% increase in mobile broadband penetration in Africa would generate an increase of 2.5% in GDP per capita.

mt0: 例如去年七月,我们与当地的运营商和一个非政府组织合作启动了DigiSchool项目。

en: As response to the call to ensure that all South African school children can read fluently for meaning, the programme aims to connect more than 100 urban and rural primary schools to broadband internet.
luo: Kaluwore gi dwaro ni nyithindo ma somo e piny South Africa onge somo maber manyalo konyogi, lek mar chenrono en ni mondo moloyo nyithindo 100 ma somo e kuode ma lony nitie (town) kod e ngwenge man ei piny obed gi tudruok eyor mbuyi
mt0: 只係要知道。 在這項呼籲的反應中, 該計劃旨在連線超過 100 個城市和鄉村的primary schools,以便能夠閱讀有意義的句子。

en: Additionally, we’ve rolled out DigiTrucks in several African countries, which enable everyone from students to entrepreneurs to learn how to use computers and connect with the digital world.
luo: Wach machielo en ni wase chako somo mar weche tudruok gi yor mbuyi ma waluongo gi dho ngere ni – DigiTrucks – e pinye mang'eny mag Afrika ma miyo ngato angata ka ochakore gi nyithindo masomo nyaka jo ohala; ma puonjogi kaka ginyalo tiyo gi kompyuta mondo gitudre gi ji ma odak e pinje ma oko.
mt0: Additionally, we've rolled out DigiTrucks in several African countries, which enable everyone from students to entrepreneurs to learn how to use computers and connect with the digital world.

en: Earlier this year, we also announced a partnership with Ghanaian operators to build more than 2000 base stations in remote areas of that country to connect the unconnected.
luo: E chakruok mar higani, nyocha walando tiyo kanyakla achiel gi jogo ma kelo tudruok e yor mbuyi e piny Ghana; mar gero stesen ma okalo 2000 kuonde ma pod ni chien e pinyno mondo gi tud jogo ma pok oyudo tudruok maber e yor mbuyi.
mt0: 去年,我们还与格陵兰的运营商签署了一项合作协议,在该国遥远的地区建立超过 2000 基站,以连接不连接的地区。

en: From a healthcare perspective, Lifebank, a pioneering Nigerian startup delivers blood and other essential medical supplies to hospitals aided with broadband connections.
luo: Ka wang'iyo wach thieth, Lifebank ma kambi jo Nigeria ma keyo remo kod gige thieth mamoko e ute thieth tudore e yor mbuyi.
mt0: 从医疗的角度来看, Lifebank, 一个创新性尼日利亚 startup, 血液和其它医疗用品, 通过互联网连接,医院提供。

en: By keeping the startup and its riders connected, we can ensure that hospitals get urgent supplies when they are needed.
luo: Ka kambi ni kod kembe mamoko matindo ma otiyogo kanyakla oyudo tudruok maber e yor mbuyi, ma biro miyo kuonde thieth yud gigo ma gitiyogo e weche mag thieth ma okasore sama idwarogie.
mt0: 只係要知道。 我們可以保持創始人和其騎士聯繫, 確保醫院可以收到急需的醫療用品。

en: These kinds of projects, however, only serve to illustrate how much need for accessible, affordable broadband there really is across Sub-Saharan Africa.
luo: Weche mag dongruok machalo kama, gin ranyisi manyisowa ratiro romb rem mantie kuom weche tudruok e yor mbuyi e nengo ma yot e pinje jorotenge ma odak Africa.
mt0: These kinds of projects, however, only serve to illustrate how much need for accessible, affordable broadband there really is across Sub-Saharan Africa.

en: They represent a glimpse at the kind of access that everyone should have and which players across society should look to provide.
luo: Magi nyiso kaka onego bedi ni ji tudore e yor mbuyi kod jog ma owinjore bed ni kelo tudruokni.
mt0: 他们代表着一种对所有人的开放性,以及社会各部门应该寻求的开放性。

en: For more than a decade, the United Nations has recognised that the internet is a catalyst for sustainable development.
luo: Kuom kinde mokalo higni apar (10), riwruok mar piny mangima United Nations(UN), ose yie ni tudruok e yoo mar mbuyi en achiel kuom yore ma miyo piny bedo gi dongruok maonge ng'ikruok.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 联合国已經認為網際網路是可持續發展的一個契機。

en: As the events of the past year or so have shown, however, far too many people are unable to enjoy those rights because they lack access and connectivity.
luo: Kaluwore gi gik ma osetimore e higa achiel kama mokalo, ji mang'eny ok nyal winjo maber e ngima gi nikech gi onge gi tudruok e yor mbuyi.

luo: Kuom adieri wach mar tudruok e yor mbuyi onego bed achiel kuom dong'ruok madongo misiro gi sirkal, kembe mag wegi kod riwruok mag jo piny.

en: Huawei is a leading global provider of information and communications technology (ICT) infrastructure and smart devices.
luo: Huawei en kambi maduong' e piny mangima ma loso gigo ma itiyogo e tudruok e yoo mar mbuyi e piny ma ngima.
mt0: Huawei is a leading global provider of information and communications technology (ICT) infrastructure and smart devices.

en: With integrated solutions across four key domains – telecom networks, IT, smart devices, and cloud services – we are committed to bringing digital to every person, home and organization for a fully connected, intelligent world.
luo: Ka watiyo gi yore ma opogore opogre e weche mag tudruok gi mbuyi machalo kaka e ong'we yamo (sime), weche mag tonde ma otudi ma keyo wach (IT), gik ma olosi gi rieko ma malo (smart devices) kod gigo ma kelo tudruok e kor boche polo (cloud services) – wan kod kinda mar kelo tudruok e yor mbuyi ne ngato angata, mier kod riwruoge mopogore opogore mondo mi wabed gi piny ma otudore duto kendo man gi rieko.
mt0: 只在四个主要领域中提供解决方案。 我们致力于让每个人、家庭和组织连接到智能世界。

en: Huawei's end-to-end portfolio of products, solutions and services are both competitive and secure.
luo: Gik ma Huawei loso kendo ma gitimo kod konyruok ma gi kelo nigi nengo maber kendo onge wach marach ma tiyo kodgi kelo e ngima dhano.
mt0: Huawei's end-to-end portfolio of products, solutions and services are both competitive and secure.

en: Through open collaboration with ecosystem partners, we create lasting value for our customers, working to empower people, enrich home life, and inspire innovation in organizations of all shapes and sizes.
luo: Kuom tiyo kanyakla gi jogo manie migao ma loso weche mag tudruok e piny, wamiyo jogo ma ngiewo gigewa (customers) gik maber ma miyo ji bedo gi teko kendo miyo ngima mar dala bedo maber kendo kelo paro manyien e kembe ma tindo kod madongo.
mt0: Through open collaboration with ecosystem partners, we create lasting value for our customers, working to empower people, enrich home life, and inspire innovation in organizations of all shapes and sizes.

en: At Huawei, innovation focuses on customer needs.
luo: Gik ma Huawei loso temo rango dwaro mar jo ng'iepo.
mt0: Huawei 专注于客户需求。

en: We invest heavily in basic research, concentrating on technological breakthroughs that drive the world forward.
luo: Waketo mwanduwa mang'eny e weche mag nono dwaro mar jong'iepo kendo waketo pachwa e yore ma nyalo kelo pogruok korka tudruok mar dhano ma miyo piny dhi nyime maber.
mt0: 只在翻译中使用。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: We have more than 180,000 employees, and we operate in more than 170 countries and regions.
luo: Wan gi jotich mokalo 180,000 kendo watiyo e pinje moloyo 170 e tunge piny koni gi koni.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。我們有超過 180,000 個員工,並且我們在 170 個國家和地區中活動。

en: Founded in 1987, Huawei is a private company fully owned by its employees.
luo: Huawei en kambi mane ochaki e higa mar 1987 ma wegi gin joma tiyo kanyono.
mt0: Huawei was founded in 1987, and is fully owned by its employees.

en: Te Asset Recovery Agency (ARA) has stepped up its push to recover Sh385 million from a businessman it accuses of siphoning the money from the County Government of Mandera.
luo: Bad piny owacho ma duoko mwandu mag jopiny koa kuom jok mane okawgi e yor mibadhi ma iluongo ni Asset Recovery Agency (ARA) ose medo kasore gi dwaro mar gi mar duoko ne piny owacho tara gana 385,000,000 mane ja ohala moro ne okwalo koa e piny owacho ma Mandera.

en: In submissions filed before the High Court, ARA claims that Ali Abdi Ibrahim cannot explain the source of the Sh385 million found in his two accounts and that the investigations have revealed the money was acquired from three companies that traded with the county government.
luo: Kaluwore gi wach ma gitero e doho mamalo e Kenya, ARA wacho ni jago ma iluongo ni Ali Abdi Ibrahim ok nyal lero kama ne oyude omenda maromo 385,000,000 mane oyudi e akaunt ariyo ma okane pesa ne. ARA wacho ni nonro mar gi nyiso ni pesani ne oa e kembe moko adek mane timo ohala gi piny owacho ma Mandera.
mt0: 在高法上提交的文件中, ARA claims Ali Abdi Ibrahim aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa tekki aa

en: State counsel Jennifer Gitiri representing the agency argued that an analysis of Ibrahim’s accounts showed a systematic pattern of money laundering where some of the amounts were deposited in cash while others were wired from other banks.
luo: Okil ma ochungne piny owacho miluongo ni Jennifer Gitiri ne owacho e od bura ni kaluwore gi nonro mar gi e kunde keno mar Ibrahim, ne giyudo ni ne nitie kaka ne ja mibadhino tero pesa e kar keno magego kendo moko bende ne iorone ka oaye kuonde keno mamoko.
mt0: Jennifer Gitiri representing the agency argued that an analysis of Ibrahim’s accounts showed a systematic pattern of money laundering where some of the amounts were deposited in cash while others were wired from other banks.

en: “The amounts are proceeds of crime that must be forfeited to the state. He has failed to prove how and why the suspicious cash transactions were deposited in his account. He cannot even show evidence of any business he transacted with the county government of Mandera,” said Gitiri.
luo: Gitiri ne owacho kama, "Nikech omenda go ne oyudi e yor mibadhi, ibiro duok gi ne piny owacho. Ok nyal lero maber kaka kendo gima omiyo omenda ma nenore ni ne ok onwang’ e yo ma oriere go ne ochopo e kar keno mare. Ok onyal golo gima nyiso ni ne otimo ohala gi piny owacho ma Mandera."
mt0: “The amounts are proceeds of crime that must be forfeited to the state. He has failed to prove how and why the suspicious cash transactions were deposited in his account. He cannot even show evidence of any business he transacted with the county government of Mandera,” said Gitiri.

en: According to ARA, the huge amounts are suspected to have been stolen from the county government of Mandera and deposited to Ibrahim’s accounts to conceal the source when he has no legitimate businesses to generate the total amount.
luo: Kalowore gi nonro mane otim gi KARA, kwan mageny go iparo ni ne okwal ka ooye piny owacho mar Mandera kendo ne oket gi e kar keno mar Ibrahim mondo kik fwenyre kama ne ogol gie nikech ngatni ne onge ohala ma ongere mane otimo mane nyalo miye pesa ma chal kamano.
mt0: According to ARA, the huge amounts are suspected to have been stolen from the county government of Mandera and deposited to Ibrahim's accounts to conceal the source when he has no legitimate businesses to generate the total amount.

en: Ms Gitiri submitted that the cash was being deposited in his account by unknown people and even after being summoned to explain, he could not tell where the money came from.
luo: Nyadendi Gitiri ne ondiko ni kwan go ne ikete e kar keno mar ngat miluongo ni Ibrahim no gi ji ma ok oyangore maber kendo kane oluonge mondo oler kama pesa go ne owuokie to ne ok onyal lero maber kama ne gi aye
mt0: Ms Gitiri submitted that the money was being deposited in his account by unknown people and even after being summoned to explain, he could not tell where the money came from.

en: She said some of the cash deposit were made in tranches of below Sh1 million to avoid raising suspicion and that records at the Kenya Revenue Authority showed that he did not pay any taxes to prove he was trading with the county government.
luo: Nyadendino ne owacho ni moko kuom kwan go ne oket e bengi mar keno mar ngatno mos mos kar pesa ma ok oromo tara gana achiel (1,000,000) mondo kik paro moro bedie ni ne gin mag miganga kendo jo sol osuru ma Kenya ma iluongo ni Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) ne oyango ni jalno ne ok ochulo osuru manyiso ni ne en gi ohala mane ogoyo gi piny owacho ma Mandera no.

en: “Without any evidence to substantiate the source of his funds, we are left with only one conclusion that they are proceeds of crime. His defence that he was sub-contracted by other companies to do construction work are baseless and lies meant to hoodwink the court,” said Gitiri.
luo: “Ka onge gima nyiso kama pesa go ne oaye, wadong mana gi neno achiel kende ni pesa go ne oyudie e yo mar miganga. Wach ma owacho ni ne omiye kibaruwa ma bathe gi kembe ma moko mag gedo onge tiende kendo mirambo lilo ma odwa wuondo go od bura”.
mt0: “Without any evidence to substantiate the source of his funds, we are left with only one conclusion that they are proceeds of crime. His defence that he was sub-contracted by other companies to do construction work are baseless and lies meant to hoodwink the court,” said Gitiri.

en: Equity Group has recorded after tax profit of Sh8.7billion in the first quarter of 2021 compared to Sh5.3billion same period last year, the lender said on Wednesday.

en: Regional subsidiaries registered resilience and robust growth to contribute 40 per cent of total deposits and total assets and 23 per cent of profit before tax with Rwanda and Uganda delivering above cost of capital returns.
