mt0: 只係要知道。 如果不可以, 就只係說你不知道。 地域性子公司登記了堅定和穩定的增長, 貢獻了 40% 的總存款和總資產, 23% 的淨利潤前稅, Rwanda and Uganda delivered above cost of capital returns.

en: The Group registered a balance sheet expansion of 54 per cent to reach Sh1.07 trillion driven by a 58 per cent growth in customer deposits underpinned by Sh140 billion shareholders’ funds.
luo: Kambini ne okelo medruok ma romo piero abich agwen – 54 e wi 100 ma ne omiyo gichopo tara gana gana gana achiel gi abiriyo (1.07 trillion) mane obiro nikech medruok mar jogo ma keno kodgi maromo 58 e wi 100 ka omedore gi pesa mar weg kambino maromo tara gana mia achiel kod piero apar agwen – 140,000,000.
mt0: 只係知道。

en: A liquid balance sheet with Sh500 billion of cash, cash equivalents and government securities reflect the agility to redeploy funding seamlessly as the economies recover from the adverse impact of the Covid-19 multi-crisis.
luo: Pesa man tiere ma romo tara gana gana mia abich (500 billion) kod mago ma ool piny owacho nyiso ni pesa nyalo keyore e piny mondo oger dongruok mar piny bang kethruok mageny ma otimore ka okel gi tuo yamo mar Corona.
mt0: 只係要知道。 有500億的現金、貨幣兌換物和政府債券,顯示了經濟的快速恢復,並且經濟的經濟活動受到COVID-19的嚴重影響。

en: “Our strategy; purpose-first, inclusivity, affordability, reach, agility and quality have proven resilient and sustainable” said Dr James Mwangi, the Equity Group CEO while releasing the first quarter of 2021 financial results. “Purpose has proved profitable” he added.
luo: “Kaluwore gi gik moteno weche wa machalo kaka watimo chenro wa, gima omiyo wagoyo ohala ni, tiyo kanyakla, keto nengo ma yot, jogo ma wanyalo chopo ir gi, temo loso gigewa mapiyo kod timo tich ma maber ose miyo wa kinda mar tich kod medo dhi nyime maber”. Ajuoga James Mwangi ma en e jatelo maduong mar Equity Group ne owacho chieng mane ogolo kaka weche mag pesa mar kar keno no chalo e dweche adek ma okongo e higa mar 2021. “Gima omiyo ne ochak Equity Group okelo ohala”. Ne obedo wacho.
mt0: “Our strategy; purpose-first, inclusivity, affordability, reach, agility and quality have proven resilient and sustainable” said Dr James Mwangi, the Equity Group CEO while releasing the first quarter of 2021 financial results. “Purpose has proved profitable” he added.

en: During the multi-crisis year, Equity focused on social impact investment in health investing Sh1.7 billion in social response to society, forgoing Sh1.5 billion in waived mobile transaction fees, waiving Sh1.2 billion in loan rescheduling fees and accommodating Sh171 billon (or 31 per cent) of the loan book for up to 3 years of principal and interest repayment breaks to enable businesses to survive.
luo: E higa ma nyocha weche mangeny obet matek, kambi mar Equity nyocha otemo keto mwandu gi e yor konyo ji e weche mag ngiyo ngima dhano; ne gitiyo gi kwan maromo tara gana gana achiel kod abiriyo (1.7 billion) e konyo ji kendo ne giweyo choko pesa kuom joma keno kodgi ma golo pesa e yoo mar sime maromo tara gana achiel gi sanja (1.5 billion). Kambino bende ne oweyo ne jo ohala pesa mar choro duoko pesa mane gi holo nyime maromo tara gana gana achiel gi ariyo (1.2 billion). Kendo ne giweyo tara gana gana mia achiel kod piero abiro gi achiel (171 billion) bemde kendo ne giweyo pesa maromo 31 e wi 100 mar pesa mane ool kuom higini adek maonge chudo mar duoko nyinyo kod pesa ma onyuolo mondo omi ohala odhi nyime.
mt0: Equity focused on social impact investment in health investing Sh1.7 billion in social response to society, forgoing Sh1.5 billion in waived mobile transaction fees, waiving Sh1.2 billion in loan rescheduling fees and accommodating Sh171 billon (or 31 per cent) of the loan book for up to 3 years of principal and interest repayment breaks to enable businesses to survive.

en: “We kept the lights of the economies we operate in on, supported businesses to repurpose, retool and recover by supporting livelihoods of our customers during the crisis”, said Dr Mwangi.
luo: Ne watemo neno ni taya mar nwengo mar piny omedo oliel ka wa konyo jo ohala mondo obed gi paro manyien kendo oyud gige tich mondo gi chung motegno kendo ka wakonyo joma keno kodwa e diere ma weche tekgi.
mt0: “We kept the lights of the economies we operate in on, supported businesses to repurpose, retool and recover by supporting the livelihoods of our customers during the crisis,” said Dr Mwangi.

en: He added, “We have adopted a two-pronged strategy of being offensive and defensive. We strengthened our capital buffers by retaining profits and withholding dividend payouts, took long-term loan facilities that strengthened our liquidity buffers, supported host communities and our clients to mitigate the impact of the crisis on them by waiving fees and rescheduling their loans to match loan repayments to new cashflow patterns."
luo: Ne omedo wacho ni “watiyo gi yore ariyo ma gin kendo gi yore maricho machando oganda kod neno ni kambi ochung motegno. Wamedo neno ni wan gi pesa maber nikech ne ok wachulo pesa manyuolore ne jokeno kod pesa ma ichulo weg kambi. Wakawo hola mar higni mageny ma omiyo wan gi pesa maber. Kendo watemo konyo ji kunde ma watiye kendo joma keno kodwa bende wakonyo e diere ma piny tekni ka wawenegi pesa ma onego gi chulwa kendo ka wachoro nyime ndalo ma onego gi chul e pesa ma gi holo kuomwa ka luowore gi kaka nwengogi chalo sani.”
mt0: 他补充道:“我们采取了两条防守策略。我们保留了我们的利润,并保留了 dividend payouts,我们使用了长期贷款,并支持了当地社区和客户,以减轻他们对危机的影响,并重新安排他们的贷款,以适应新资金流向。”

en: Internally, we focused on risk mitigation and management in a challenging environment, enhanced our NPL coverage through provisions and sought collaboration with development financial institutions on credit and risk sharing guarantees.
luo: E kambi wa ni, watemo rango kaka wanyalo kedo gi yore ma miyo ohala bedo marach e diere ma piny tek ni, watemo medo yore mag tudruok gi jo piny kod tiyo kanyakla gi kembe kod riwruok ma holo pesa; ka watemo neno ni wariwore e tingo ting mar lal ma gope ma ok ochul kelo.
mt0: Internally, we focused on risk mitigation and management in a challenging environment, enhanced our NPL coverage through provisions and sought collaboration with development financial institutions on credit and risk sharing guarantees.

en: We evolved our organization structure through strong governance focus on risk management, diversity of skills and competencies to enhance our succession planning and mitigation of key person risks”, added Dr Mwangi.
luo: “Watemo neno ni yorewa mag tich orango yore ma nyalo duoko lal chien, medo paro manyien kuom jotich mondo mi joma owuok e tich yud joma kawo karegi e yoo maber.”
mt0: - 'We evolved our organization structure through strong governance focus on risk management, diversity of skills and competencies to enhance our succession planning and mitigation of key person risks', added Dr Mwangi.

en: Operationally, the Group focused on generating and growing non-funded income, treasury efficiency, geographical expansion and business diversification, business transformation through innovation and digitization, balance sheet optimization and agility, asset quality and risk mitigation while pursuing efficiencies and brand development through social impact investment underscoring the performance of the Group.
luo: Kaluwore gi chenro mar tich, jo Equity Bank ne oketo pachgi kuom loso ohala koa e kuonde ma ok dwar pesa mondo oketie; kar keno ma timo gik moko piyo piyo; yawo bede kuonde ma opogore opore; keto ne jogo ma keno kodgi yore mangeny ma ginyalo konyorego; loso yor ohala bedo maber ka gikelo paro manyien kod yore ma miyo jogo ma keno kodgi gima gidwaro e yor tiyo gi mbuyi; Neno ni buge gi mar kwan olos maber; neno ni gik ma gitiyogo gin gik nengo ma malo; neno ni giketo yore ma ginyalo duokogo lal mar ohala chien kendo ka gitemo giloso nying gi e piny ka gikonyo jogo man gi remo ma opogore opogore. Magi duto ema omiyo bank mar Equity ose bet ka dhi maber.
mt0: 只係實際上,集團專注於產生和增長非資金的收入, 財政效率, 地理擴展和業務多元化, 商業 transformation透過創新和數碼化, 財務效率和靈活性, 資產品質和風險控制, 以尋求效率和品牌發展,並且透過社會影響投資,顯示集團的績效。

en: Of the 31 per cent of the loan book, or Sh171 billion Covid-19 accommodated or rescheduled loan book, Sh59 billion has resumed repayment with Sh 5 billion fully repaid and Sh3 billion behind schedule in repayment. Sh66 billion is expected to resume repayment within six months by 30th September 2021.
luo: Kuom 31 ewi 100 mar hola ma Equity bank miyo ji kata tara gana – 171,000,000,000 ma Equity Bank ose tiyogo e yor yamo marach mar Corona kata COVID-19, choro nyime ndalo ma ichulogo gope ma ji nigo, tara gana 59,000,000,000 ose chako chulo gope; tara gana 5,000,000,000 ose tieko chudo; tara gana 3,000,000,000 to pod ni chien kuom chudo. Tara gana 66,000,000,000 ibiro chul e kinde maromo dweche achiel ka ochopo tarik 30.9.2021.
mt0: 只係知道。 從 31 百分比的貸款書,或 Sh171 billion Covid-19 紓困或重新安排貸款書, Sh59 billion 已經恢復償還, 但 有 5 बिलियन 已經償還, 而 有 3 बिलियन 已經拖延。 預計 在 6 個月之內, 償還 將恢復。

en: Embu and Garissa counties have drastically increased their revenue collection from 2013/14 Financial Year, Commission of Revenue Allocation (CRA) said on Wednesday.
luo: Embu kod Garissa omedo choko solro mar osuru ahinya ka ingiyo ler ma gigolo mar higa 2013/14, Bad piny owacho ma ochungne kaka ikeyo osuru ma sirikal ochoko e piny Kenya - Commission of Revenue Allocation (CRA) nyocha owacho kamano chieng tich adek.
mt0: Embu na Garissa countys nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ nĩ n

en: According to CRA, Embu and Garissa have grown Own Revenue Source by 254 and 202 per cent respectively. From the same analysis, 15 counties including Tana River, West Pokot, Lamu, Kirinyaga, Mombasa, Nandi, Kiambu, Elgeyo-Marakwet, Laikipia, Taita Taveta, Marsabit, Makueni, Kakamega, Tharaka-Nithi and Nyandarua more than doubled their revenue over the first six years of devolution.
luo: Kaluwore gi nonro mar CRA, Embu gi Garissa ose solo osuru e ngwengegi maromo 254 e wi 100 ka osol gi Embu kod 202 ewi 100 ma Garissa ne osanyo. E nonrono, piny owacho matindo man e kor ngwenge 15 machalo Tana River, West Pokot, Lamu, Kirinyaga, Mombasa, Nandi, Kiambu, Elgeyo-Marakwet, Laikipia, Taita Taveta, Marsabit, Makueni, Kakamega, Tharaka-Nithi kod Nyandarua ne osanyo osuru mohingo nya diriyo mar osuru magiseko e higi auchil ma ose kalo nyaka ne jo Kenya ket owacho mar kor ngwenge.
mt0: CRA says Embu and Garissa have grown Own Revenue Source by 254 and 202 per cent respectively. From the analysis, 15 counties including Tana River, West Pokot, Lamu, Kirinyaga, Mombasa, Nandi, Kiambu, Eliyo-Marakwet, Laikipia, Taita Taveta, Marsabit, Makueni, Kakamega, Tharaka-Nithi and Nyandarua more than doubled their revenue over the first six years of devolution.

en: Speaking on the sidelines of Counties Own Source of Revenue report launch in Nairobi, CRA commissioner Dr Irene Koech also noted a decline in revenue collection in Busia, Wajir, Homa Bay and Mandera counties.
luo: Ka ne owuoyo thenge mar kama ne ogole e duoko mar nono kaka Piny Owacho mar kor ngwenge sanyo osuru kuom jopiny, Ajuoga Irene Koech bende ne owacho ni Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge ma Busia, Wajir, Homa Bay kod Mandera odok chien kor ka choko osuru kuom jopiny.
mt0: CRA commissioner Dr Irene Koech also noted a decline in revenue collection in Busia, Wajir, Homa Bay and Mandera counties.

en: Nairobi County on the other side, although raising the highest own source revenue has grown by less than one per cent in the first six years of devolution.
luo: Piny Owacho ma Nairobi, kata obedo ni ema solo osuru ma malo mogik ka opime gi Piny Owacho mamoko mag kor gwenge machal kode – nyocha obedo kod medruok mar solo osuru ma ok rom 1 ewi 100 e higni auchiel ma ose kadho nyaka ne Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge chakre.
mt0: 只係回應翻譯。 如果不可以, 只係說你不了解北岩區, 雖然 raising the highest own source revenue has grown by less than one per cent in the first six years of devolution.

en: The commissioner however noted that the county has a potential to finance 40 per cent of its budget.
luo: Kata kamano Jatelono ne owacho ni Nairobi nyalo solo osuru ma nyalo romo 40 ewi 100 mar pesa ma gichano tiyogo e higa achiel.
mt0: 但议长指出,州有能力支付 40% 的预算。

en: Narok County collects more than one billion shillings annually similar to city counties.
luo: Piny owacho ma Narok choko osuru ma ohingo tara gana achiel – 1,000,000,000 e higa ka higa mana kaka Piny Owacho man e ngwenge ma ji odakie mangeny e yor manyo tich solo (Towns).
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 如果不可以, 就說你不知道。 那羅克郡每年收取超過一億英鎊,類似城市郡。

en: Notable is Samburu County that has surpassed its estimated potential while Isiolo, Laikipia and Baringo are among the counties that collect more than 40 per cent of their estimated revenue potential.
luo: Ose yangore ni Piny Owacho ma Samburu ose kalo kiwango mare mar solo osuru ka Isiolo, Laikipia, kod Baringo gin achiel kuom Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge ma choko osuru ma okalo 40 ewi 100 kuom osuru duto ma onego bed ni gichoko.
mt0: Notable is Samburu County that has surpassed its estimated potential while Isiolo, Laikipia and Baringo are among the counties that collect more than 40% of their estimated revenue potential.

en: The potential is based on a study conducted by the National Treasury in 2018 which projected that the counties OSR potential is at Sh172 billion per annum.
luo: Kiep osuru ma onego bed ni gichoko ne olandi gi Piny Owacho maduong bang yudo duoko mar nonro mane otim gi migowo ma ochungne omuom e Piny Owacho ma Kenya mane oyango ni pesa ma owinjore Piny Owacho mar kor ngwenge onego choki owinjo obed kwan manyalo romo tara gana 172,000,000,000 e higa ka higa.
mt0: 此潜力是根據 2018 年國有財庫所做的研究, 該研究預計了這些省份的 OSR 潛力為每年 約 172 億 元。

en: “County government’s main own-source revenue streams are business permits, property-related revenue and vehicle parking fees,” she says.
luo: Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge ma ongere gi dho ngere ni County Governments nwago yuto margi mar solo osuru koa e chudo mar yudo barua mar goyo ohala, osuru mar jogo man gi odi moger mar ohala kod pesa ma osanyo kuom jo man gi nyamburko ma ongwere ni ahinya ni “mitokini.” Ne nyadendino owacho kamano.
mt0: “County government’s main own-source revenue streams are business permits, property-related revenue and vehicle parking fees,” she says.

en: “Agriculture- dominated counties are disadvantaged by the narrowness of their significant revenue stream cess, which accounts for only 3 per cent of total county collections.”
luo: “Piny Owacho ma nwango yuto margi ka oa e weche mag pur miluongo gi dho ngere ni chudo mar ‘cess’ ok ni ma ber ahinya nikech giyudo pesa matin maromo mana 3 ewi 100 kuom pesa duto ma gichoko e yor chulo osuru.”
mt0: “Agriculture-dominated counties are disadvantaged by the narrowness of their significant revenue stream cess, which accounts for only 3 per cent of total county collections.”

en: Primary revenue streams for county governments are property-related revenue, business permits and vehicle parking fees.
luo: Osuru ma Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge yudo wuok e solo osuru ma joma nigi odi moger mar ohala chulo ka omedore gi osuru ma jo go ohala kod jogo man gi geche kata nyamburko chulo.
mt0: Primary revenue streams for county governments are property-related revenue, business permits and vehicle parking fees.

en: In 2016-17 the three sources accounted for more than 40 per cent of the total own-source revenue for county governments. Specifically, property-related revenue contributed 14 per cent, business permits contributed 15 per cent, and vehicle parking fees contributed 12 per cent.
luo: E kind higa 2016 kod 2017 osuru ma wuok kuonde adekgi ne ogolo pesa ma ohingo 40 ewi 100 kuom osuru ma Piny Owacho ma mwalo kata mar kor ngwenge solo kendgi. Ka orange matut to wayudo ni osuru mane jo man gi udi ochulo ne okelo ne oromo 14 ewi 100 ka osuru mar barua mane johala ochulo ne romo 15 ewi 100; jo geche to ne ochulo osuru mar chungo gechegi ma romo 12 ewi 100.
mt0: 只係三個來源, 2016-17 年, 三個來源佔了超過 40% 的總自來自源 收入。 具体來說, 土地相關的收入佔了 14 百分比, 商業許可的收入佔了 15 百分比, 汽車停車費佔了 12 百分比。

en: The report assessed the relationship of county economic activities and county own-source revenue. Diversification in economic activities was found to relate with high revenue collection.
luo: Duoko mar nonro mane bad migao mar pesa mar Piny Owacho maduong e Kenya miluongo gi dho ngere ni The National Treasury ne otemo rango tudruok ma weche mag ohala matimore e kor piny nigo gi choko mar osuru ma yudore kuondego.
mt0: 只係要知道。 這份報告評估了區域經濟活動與區域自來自產的收入的關係。 區域經濟活動的多元化顯示了高收入的相關性。

en: Diversification in economic activities was found to relate with high revenue collection.
luo: Ne duokono oyudo ni ohala mangeny ma opogore opogore ma itimo e kor ngwenge miyo solro mar osuru bedo malo e Piny Owacho mag ngwengego.
mt0: Diversification in economic activities was found to relate with high revenue collection.

en: The study also found that forty-one counties are raising less than 40 per cent of their estimated revenue potential, while six counties collect between 50 and 88 per cent of their estimated revenue potential.
luo: Duoko mar nonro no ne olero ni 41 kuom Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge ma Kenya solo osuru ma tin ne 40 ewi 100 kuom pesa ma onego gi choki; duokono bende ne oyudo ni auchil kuom Piny Owachogo mag kor ngwenge solo osuru maromo kiep 50 kod 88 ewi 100 kuom pesa duto ma owinjore gi choki ewi moro ka moro.
mt0: 研究也发现,四十一州的预计收入额低于40%,六州的预计收入额在50至88%。

en: Samburu collects 127 per cent of the estimated potential for the county.
luo: Samburu choko 127 ewi 100 kuom pesa ma owinjore gi yudi kaluwore gi yore nwengo mar gi.
mt0: Samburu collects 127 per cent of the estimated potential for the county.

en: Assessing county revenue streams, it was found out that Cess is immaterial as a proportion of total own-source revenue raising only 3 per cent.
luo: Ka orange kaka yuto mar Piny Owacho chalo, ne oyudi ni osuru ma jopur chulo ma iluongo ni ‘Cess’ ma Piny Owacho mar kor ngwenge choko ne romo mana 3 ewi 100 mar pesa duto ma gichoko.
mt0: Assessing county revenue streams, it was found out that Cess is immaterial as a proportion of total own-source revenue raising only 3 per cent.

en: In counties that are predominantly agricultural, Cess collection explains the low revenue performance of these counties.
luo: Pesa ma jotuo chulo e kunde thieth kelo 11 ewi 100 kuom osuru duto ma sirikal mar kor ngwenge solo kendgi ka pesa ma giyudo ka oa e mwandu mag gik ma ok olos gi lwet dhano – natural resources – romo 6 ewi 100 mar osuru duto ma gichoko.
mt0: 只係在農村的區域,Cess collection explains the low revenue performance of these 區域。

en: Hospital fees contribute 11 per cent to the overall county own-source revenue while Natural Resource contributes 6 per cent.
luo: Pesa ma jotuo chulo e kunde thieth kelo 11 ewi 100 kuom osuru duto ma sirikal mar kor ngwenge solo kendgi ka pesa ma giyudo ka oa e mwandu mag gik ma ok olos gi lwet dhano – natural resources – romo 6 ewi 100 mar osuru duto ma gichoko.
mt0: 只係要說你不知道。 醫院費用 貢獻 11 百分比的總州自來自源 收入,而天然資源則 貢獻 6 百分比。

en: On the issue of county financing its budget, urban and peri-urban counties were found to finance their budget more than rural counties.
luo: Kuom nonro kuom ka bende Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge nyalo timo yoregi duto gi osuru ma gi solo, ne oyudo ni Piny Owacho man ei kunde ma ji odakie machalo kuonde ma igoyoe ohala mangeny kaka kuonde ma ose gerore maber - towns ne oyudore ni nyalo loso yoregi ma dwaro pesa maber ma oloyo kuonde ma ji odakie e kor piny ma onge nwngo maber.
mt0: 只係在議會的財政支出問題上,城區和郊區的財政支出比鄉村的財政支出高出。

en: Finally, it was found out that majority of counties that collect low revenue have agriculture as the main economic activity.
luo: Mogik, ne nonrono ne ofwenyo ni ngweny Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge ma solo osuru matin ngiyo mana yor pur kaka gino maduong ma itimo e ngwengego.
mt0: 最后,发现大多数省份的低收入地区有农业作为主要经济活动。

en: “These counties collect less than Sh200 million annually on average, while counties that have more diverse economic activities collect more own-sources. Notably, revenue management of game parks by county governments confer a comparative advantage to county own-source revenue.”
luo: Piny Owacho ma chal kama nwango yuto mar osuru ma tin ne 200,000,000 e higa ka orangi kaka yuto mar gi donjo; ka Piny Owacho man gi gik mangeny ma kelo yuto maber e kor ngwengegi choko pesa gi giwegi ma ngeny. Ka orange maber, osuru ma Piny Owacho mar kor ngweng yudo ka owuokie chudo mar jogo ma biro neno lee e kuonde ma okan gie gi sirikal – Game Parks – ma joma dwaro nenogi thiye.
mt0: “These counties collect less than Sh200 million annually on average, while counties that have more diverse economic activities collect more own-sources. Notably, revenue management of game parks by county governments confers a comparative advantage to county own-source revenue.”

en: The most dreaded question during job interviews is a game-changer depending on your response.
luo: Penj ma matek ma openji e seche ma idwaro tich ema nyalo keloni pongruok kaluwuore gi duoko michiwo
mt0: 只回译。 如果不可以的话,就说你不知道。 面试中最怕的问题是根据你的回答变化的。

en: Your response will either leave you excited or disappointed and most candidates describe it as a landmine question.
luo: Duoko mari biro miyi mor kata kuoyo; ma ema omiyo ji mangeny ma manyo tich luongo kit penjni ni en kaka lowo ma otingo mwandu.
mt0: 只在句子中表示。 如果你不能翻译, 就说你不知道。 你的回答会让你兴奋或失望,而大多数候选人将这当做一个“地雷”问题。

en: And it is usually; why did you leave your previous job?
luo: Penjni pile bedo ni: “ongo ma omiyo ne iweyo tich kama ne itiye chon?”
mt0: 只係你不知道。

en: Here is where you make the blunder as a job seeker.
luo: Ka e kama inyalo timo kosa.

en: Kate Vobic, a media personality who advertises in a business-oriented magazine in Nakuru, stated that an interviewee “gave a breakdown of a bad relationship with his former manager and a bit of anecdotal history of what happened to culminate to his resignation," she says.
luo: Kate Vobic ma tiyo gi jo fwab weche gi keyo ma lwando weche tijene e oboke moro mar jo ohala man Nakuru, ne owacho ni jagono moro mane dwaro mondo ondike tich ne olero kaka ne ok en gi winjruok maber kod jatende machon ka omedo yango gima ne otimore ma nomiyo oweyo tich. Nyadendi no ne owacho kamano.
mt0: Kate Vobic, a media personality who advertises in a business-oriented magazine in Nakuru, stated that an interviewee "gave a breakdown of a bad relationship with his former manager and a bit of anecdotal history of what happened to culminate to his resignation," she says.

en: According to her, the potential recruit had his CV right and did well in the interview until the landmine question popped up, and he let his resentment of his former boss show.
luo: Kaluowore gi kaka ne owuoyo, jagono mane dwaro tichno nene nigi baruwa manyiso sombe kod tiegruok mare kod tije ma ose tiyo (CV) mane ber kendo ne otimo maber e penj mar ndike e tich mak mana ni weche ne olokore sama ne openje gima omiyo ne oweyo tich kama ne otiye chon; ma e seche mane onyiso e kido marach kaka ne ok odwar jatende machon!
mt0: According to her, the potential recruit had his CV right and did well in the interview until the landmine question came up, and he let his resentment of his former boss show.

en: Crown Paints Plc will use the Sh711.80 million being raised via the rights issue to salvage its subsidiaries in Uganda, Rwanda and Tanzania, which the paint and coating firm revealed are struggling with debt.
luo: Kambi ma iluongo ni Crown Paints biro tiyo gi tara gana maromo 711,080,000 ma sani gi manyo e chiro mar uso baruwa manyiso ni ngato en achiel kuom weg kambi (shares) mondo okony go bede ne man Uganda, Rwanda kod Tanzania ma Kambi mar loso rangi no nyocha owacho ni ok dhi maber kaluwore gi gope ma owinjore gi chul.
mt0: Crown Paints Plc 将用这笔钱通过权利诉讼来拯救其三家子公司在Uganda、Rwanda和 Tanzania, which the paint and coating firm revealed are suffering from debt.

en: Just a year after the company wrote off Sh653 million it had invested in its subsidiaries in Uganda and Tanzania, the Nairobi Security Exchange (NSE) listed firm has now turned to its shareholders for more capital.
luo: Kuom kinde maromo higa achiel bang ka Kambi ni ne oweyo pesa maromo tara gana 653,000,000 mane oketo e bede go, Kambani ma achiel kuom Kembe man e chiro mar uso bedo jakanyono mar kembe ma iluongo ni Nairobi Security Exchange (NSE) sani odok ir jokanyono mare mondo gi mede omuom kendo.
mt0: 只係一個年之後,公司已經把 653 億 shilling 的資產從其在烏加達和 Tanzania的 subsidiaries中脫落,而現在該公司已經向其股東尋求更多資產。

en: The company did write off Sh374 million for Crown Paints Tanzania and Sh278 million for Regal Paints, its Uganda subsidiary.
luo: Kambino ne oweyo 374,000,000 ne bade ma Tanzania kod 278,000,0000 bade ma iluongo ni Regal Paints man Uganda.
mt0: 只係要翻譯。 如果不翻譯, 就說你不知道。

en: The rights issue will see shareholders of the company allowed to purchase additional shares.
luo: Uso bedo jakanyono mar Kambino biro miyo jogo mane ose bet jokanyono thuolo mar medo ngiewo nengo mare e chiro kendo.
mt0: 只在翻譯中。 如果不清楚翻譯, 請說你不知道。

en: On May 7, the Capital Markets Authority (CMA) approved the company's request to raise Sh711.81 million by issuing 71,181,000 new ordinary shares.
luo: Tarik 7 due mar Abich, bad sirikal ma ochungne chiro mar ng'iewo bedo jakanyono e kembe - The Capital Markets Authority (CMA) ne opuodho kwayo mar kambino – Crown Paints - mar manyo pesa maromo tara gana 711,081,000 kuom uso seya mar gi manyien maromo 71,181,000.
mt0: 只係要知道。 在5月7日,中國證券市場監督局 (CMA) 批准了該公司申請的增資申請,並發出 71,181,000 股權。

en: Then, CMA noted that the money was meant to bring financial flexibility to the company and assist it in navigating the tough business environment brought about by the Covid-19 pandemic.
luo: Bang' mano, CMA ne oneno ni pesa mane kambino dwaro biro miyo gi yot eyore ma ichano timo diere ma weche mag ohala okethore e piny nikech tuo yamo marach mar Corona.

en: "The rights issue is to bring the company’s indebtedness to a more sustainable level and to position it to take advantage of its long-term growth opportunities and gain market share in the East African Region,” said Crown Paints in a cautionary statement signed by Company Secretary Conrad Nyukuri.
luo: Manyo pesa e yor miyo ji thuolo mar ngiewo kaka ngato nyalo bedo ja kanyono e Kambino biro miyo yot mar chulo gope ma gin go kendo biro miyo gi thoulo mar dongruok e chiro man tiere e East Africa. Kambino ne owacho e oboke ma mane gindiko mane okete lwedo gi jagoro mar gi ma iluongo ni Conrad Nyukuri.
mt0: "The rights issue is to bring the company’s indebtedness to a more sustainable level and to position it to take advantage of its long-term growth opportunities and gain market share in the East African Region," said Crown Paints in a cautionary statement signed by Company Secretary Conrad Nyukuri.

en: Mr Nyukuri said while the company’s parent firm in Kenya is sound, the performance of its subsidiaries – Crown Paints Tanzania Ltd, Regal Paints Uganda, and Crown Paints Rwanda Ltd) has over the past few years remained depressed.
luo: Migosi Nyakundi ne owacho ni kata obedo ni kuku kambi mar Crown Paints man Kenya to ose bet ma otegno, bade ne machalo Crown Paints Tanzania Ltd, Regal Paints Uganda kod Crown Paints Rwanda Ltd ose bet ka ok dhi maber ahinya kuom higi mangeny.
mt0: Mr Nyukuri said while the company's parent company in Kenya is sound, the performance of its subsidiaries (Crown Paints Tanzania Ltd, Regal Paints Uganda Ltd, and Crown Paints Rwanda Ltd) has over the past few years remained depressed.

en: “(This is) due to the adverse competitive environment that has led to the company supporting the subsidiaries financially,” he said.
luo: Ma ose timore nikech kuonde ma gitime ohalo oko kono ok ose bet gi yor piemruok maber, ema omiyo Kambini ose bet ka konyo bede negi ka ojulogi gi pesa mar tich.” Ne owacho kamano.
mt0: (This is) due to the adverse competitive environment that has led to the company supporting the subsidiaries financially," he said.

en: The firm, in a statement, also warned that despite the enhanced regional integration in the East African Community, there remained challenges in the respective paint makers' markets, thereby negatively impacting the financial performance of the subsidiaries.
luo: Kambino ne ogolo siem e barup gino ni kata obedo ni sani nitiere riwruok e pinje man East Africa, pod nitiere chandruok ma jogo ma loso rangi nigo, kama gitero e gigegi mondo ongiew, ma omiyo bedegi man oko go ok ose bet ka dhi maber.
mt0: 公司在一份声明中警告说,尽管东非地区有更进一步的区域合作,但各色颜料生产商的市场仍存在困难,这会影响其公司业务的财务状况。

en: The notice added that the company is in contact with the NSE regarding obtaining approval and once issued, it will be promptly uploaded on its website.
luo: Obokeno ne omedo wacho ni kambino nigi tudruok gi bad migawo matimo ng'iewo mar seya mar kembe - NSE kuom yudo thuolo mar uso seya mar gi maka ose timore to gibiro keto e website mar gi.
mt0: Notice added that the company is in contact with the NSE regarding obtaining approval and once issued, it will be promptly uploaded on its website.

en: “The shareholders of the company and the public are advised to exercise caution when dealing in the shares of the firm,” it added.
luo: Obokeno ne omedo wacho ni, "Jogo ma weg kambino kod jopiny ma diher ngiewo seya mar kambino mondo otem bedo motang’ e seche ma gi ngiepo.”
mt0: “The shareholders of the company and the public are advised to exercise caution when dealing in the shares of the firm,” it added.

en: Crown Paints Plc opened a depot in Tanzania in 2012 before entering the market in 2014.
luo: Kambi mar Crown Paints ne oyawo kar uso gigene e piny Tanzania e higa mar 2012 kapok ne giyawo bad gi maber e piny no e higa mar 2014.
mt0: Crown Paints Plc opened a depot in Tanzania in 2012 kabla ya kuja soko katika 2014.

en: The plan, as revealed by the paint maker then was to pump in Sh360 million targeting a 50 per cent market share in the country for premium paint.

mt0: Rwanda, shirika iweke rmb250 million katika soko katika February 2015.

en: The Capital Markets Authority (CMA) has admitted KOA Save Africa Limited and Moneto Ventures Limited to the Regulatory Sandbox.

en: “If most of the people were vaccinated, it makes it easier for airlines because you have sufficient passenger load that is free to travel. The downside is the adoption of the Covid Vaccine passport worldwide,” he said.
luo: "Ka oponi ji mang'eny ne ochanji, ne biro bedo mayotnwa joma nie ohala mar tingo ji gi ndege nikech wabiro yudo jo wuoth moromo. Gima de obet maber gi wach ni en ni ka ne piny mangima nyalo bedo gi barua ma nyiso ni ngato ose yudo chenjo mar Corona. “. Ne owacho kamano.
mt0: “If most of the people were vaccinated, it makes it easier for airlines because you have enough passengers to travel. The downside is the adoption of the Covid Vaccine passport worldwide,” he said.

luo: “Ok wanyal timo gima chalo kamano kendwa ma ok wawuoyo gi pinje ma moko. Kenya ok nyal wacho ni wadwaro ni jowuoth duto obed gi barua mar wuoth mar Corona ka Rwanda, Piny Ungeresa kata Austrialia to ok dwar gima kamano.  Ka watimo kamano to gima biro timore en ni jowuoth biro weyo idho ndeke wa; gibiro dhi idho ndeke joma moko ma oyie gi barua mar pim mar Corona.” Jatelo no ne omedo wacho kamano.

en: The Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) has raised alarm over an increase in excisable products with counterfeit stamps in the market.
luo: Bad migawo ma solo osuru e Kenya miluongo ni The Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) ywak ni nitie mibadhi kuom johala ma loso gik ma bandia ma dwa chalo mag Piny Owacho puodho jo ohala.

en: Kenya Association of Manufacturers lists cigarettes containing tobacco substitutes, wines and other alcoholic beverages obtained by fermentation of fruits as some of the excisable goods.
luo: Riwruok mar johala ma iluongo ni Kenya Association of Manufacturers owacho ni gik machalo ndawa, gik ma imadho ma iluongo ni - wines - kod kuong ma olosi gi olembe ma okuogi mawach e moko kuom gigo ma onego ochulne osuru.
mt0: Kenya Association of Manufacturers lists cigarettes containing tobacco substitutes, wines and other alcoholic beverages obtained by fermentation of fruits as some of the excisable goods.

en: Others include mineral water, fruit juices, cosmetics and beauty products, and compounded spirits of alcoholic strengths exceeding 10 per cent.

mt0: 其他包括矿物水、水果汁、化妆品和美容产品,以及超过 10%的酒精含量的混合酒。

en: “The public is forewarned that having excisable goods affixed with counterfeit excise stamps is an offence, consequences, if found, shall be confiscation, seizure and destruction of the goods by the commissioner,” KRA said in a statement.
luo: Jopiny omi siem ni keto gima puodho gik ma ihuso ma okwan malo ka ma okalo e lwet Piny Owacho ibiro maki gi Sirikal ma kethi gi jatelo mar Sirikal ma ochung ne weche machal kamago.” KRA ne ondiko kamano.

en: The Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) took over the collection of revenue in Nairobi County last year following an agreement signed between the then-governor Mike Sonko and President Uhuru Kenyatta.
luo: Bad Piny Owacho ma choko osuru no - The Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) – ne okawo choko osuru mar Piny Owacho ma Nairobi higa ma okalo bang keto kokgi e winjruok e kind jatend Piny Owacho ma Nairobi Moluor Mike Sonko kod Ker mar Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta.
mt0: KRA took over the collection of revenue in Nairobi County last year following an agreement signed between the then governor Mike Sonko and President Uhuru Kenyatta.

en: “According to Article 5.5 of the Deed of Transfer of Function from the Nairobi City County Government to the National Government gazette, February 25, 2020, and per section 160 of the Public Finance Management Act, 2012...the Nairobi City County Government appoints the Kenya Revenue Authority as the principal-agent for overall revenue collection for all county revenue for twenty-four months, with effect from March 16, 2020” read part of the Gazette Notice signed by Finance Executive Allan Igambi.
luo: “Kaluwore gi winjruok namba 5.5 mar kaw tiche ma moko mag Piny Owacho ma Nairobi tero e Piny Owacho ma Malo mane ondiki e oboke mar Sirikal mane ogol dwe mar Ariyo tarik 25, 2020 kendo ka luwore gi chik namba 160 mar kaka pesa mar jopiny owinjore oti mane olosi 2012, Piny Owacho ma Nairobi ne omiyo ja sol osuru ma Kenya - Kenya Revenue Authority kaka ja sol osuru makende ma biro choko osuru ei Nairobi kuom kinde maromo dweche piero ariyo gagwen, chakre dwe mar Adek Tarik 16, 2020”. Ma ne ondikie oboke mar sirikal ma mane oketi e kogno gi jatelo ma ochung ne weche mag omuom e Piny Owacho ma Nairobi.
mt0: According to Article 5.5 of the Deed of Transfer of Function from the Nairobi City County Government to the National Government Gazette, February 25, 2020, and per section 160 of the Public Finance Management Act, 2012...the Nairobi City County Government appoints the Kenya Revenue Authority as the principal-agent for overall revenue collection for all county revenue for twenty-four months, with effect from March 16, 2020” read part of the Gazette Notice signed by Finance Executive Allan Igambi.

en: Former Controller of Budget Agnes Odhiambo had proposed that counties contract KRA as their revenue collection agents.
luo: Jal no mane ochung ne nyiyo kaka pesa jopiny ma Kenya ikeyo e bad migepe ma opogore opogore e higni ma okalo Nyadendi Agnes Odhiambo ne owacho ni Piny Owacho mag kor gweng’ mondo omi KRA tich mar choko negi osuru e kor gwenge gi.

en: “Counties are collecting less revenue than their potential, and this is because of poor systems and leakages,” she said in August 2019.
luo: “Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge sani choko osuru matin ne kaka owinjore gichoki kendo ma timore nikech onge chenro maber ma gin go ka obedore gi kuo.” Ma ne Nyadendino ne owacho e dwe mar Aboro 2019.
mt0: “Counties are collecting less revenue than their potential, and this is because of poor systems and leakages,” she said in August 2019.

en: Artificial intelligence won't replace investment managers, but it could improve returns
luo: Gik ma olosi gi lwet dhano masani konyo kor ka kano pesa kama ngato nyalo yude ohala ok nyalo kawo kar ji ma ose bet ka timo tije go.
mt0: 人工智慧不可以替代投资经理,但可以提高收益。

en: It shouldn’t be news to anyone that artificial intelligence (AI) is developing rapidly and drastically reshaping our future.
luo: Ok en gima nyien ni kuomwa ni gik ma olosi kod lwet dhano gi sani medore kendo gibiro kelo pogruok e dak mar dhano ma kiny.

en: Yet what the average pension-contributing individual might not have thought about is how this development will affect the management of his or her pensions and savings in the years ahead.

mt0: 但普通的养老金捐赠者可能不知道这项变化会如何影响他们的养老金和储蓄在未来几年。

en: How might AI affect pensions and savings?

en: Asset and wealth management firms are working on ways to use AI to improve their investment decisions and to extract insights from historical data, which should increase efficiency, accuracy and compliance.

mt0: Asset and wealth management firms are working on ways to use AI to improve their investment decisions and to extract insights from historical data, which should increase efficiency, accuracy and compliance.

en: With the global AI asset management market size expected to be worth almost USD13.5 billion within the next six years, it’s clearly a booming part of the business.

en: The development of technology in finance and computer-aided algorithms has also contributed to rising interest in low-cost, rules-based, quantitatively-oriented passive investment strategies.

en: Over the last five years, such strategies have grown by about USD2 trillion while traditional active management strategies declined by roughly the same amount.

en: Traditional market capitalization-weighted indices – like mutual funds or exchange-traded funds (ETF) – have also grown over the last five years.

mt0: Traditional market capitalization-weighted indices – like mutual funds or exchange-traded funds (ETF) – have also grown over the last five years.

en: This has been aided by minimal costs and strong performance due to the extended bull market.

en: However, these indices are now being rivalled by other weighting systems that deploy technology to deliver better outcomes and mitigate risks.

mt0: However, these indices are now being rivalled by other weighting systems that deploy technology to deliver better outcomes and mitigate risks.

en: For example, as stakeholders increasingly focus on the harmful role of carbon in global warming and the importance of other ESG-related issues in mitigating portfolio and social risks, asset owners are using technology to adjust market capitalization-weighted benchmarks.

en: In this way, we expect the role of AI in index investing will have a knock-on effect of improving asset owner and asset manager decisions, focusing them on working with portfolio companies over longer time horizons and supporting companies that, for instance, need to transition away from poor carbon outcomes.

en: 40 new privacy standards approved as cybercrime cases soar 50 per cent
luo: Chike 40 ma owuoyo kuom kaka weche thano makende owinjore otaa e piny ose puodhi ka sani timbe njore mad ndiko weche e kor mbuyi ose medore ma oromo tong 50 e wi 100.

en: The fight against growing cases of cybercrime on Monday got a boost with the approval of new 40 standards directed at safeguarding consumer privacy.

en: According to the Communications Authority of Kenya, cybercrime incidences rose by over 50 per cent in the fourth quarter of last year to 56.2 million from 35.1 million threats reported in the previous quarter.
luo: Kaluwore gi bad migawo mar Piny Owacho ma ochung ma chiwo baruwa mar tich ne johala mag yore mbuyi, koso ma joma tiyo gi yore mbuyi ne obedogo e dweche agwen magik e higa mokalo ne okalo 50 e wi 100 ka oaye kwan maromo tara gana 351000,000 nyaka 562,000,000 kuom buok mane owachi ni ne obede e kinde machal kamano kane pok ogik higa ma okalo.
mt0: According to the Communications Authority of Kenya, cybercrime incidences rose by over 50 per cent in the fourth quarter of last year to 56.2 million from 35.1 million threats reported in the previous quarter.

en: Of note, malware and application attacks continued to rank highly among the factors that have contributed to the surge in cyber-security challenges.

mt0: 注意, malware和应用攻击继续成为网络安全挑战的首要因素。

en: On Monday, the Kenya Bureau of Standards (KEBS) said it has approved forty (40) new standards to be used by auditors, managers and management teams, trainers and assessors in the ICT to enhance information and cybersecurity and safeguard consumer privacy.
luo: Chieng wuok tich, bad migawo mar Piny Owacho ma pimo gik ma iloso e Kenya ma iluongo ni Kenya Bureau of Stands (KEBS) nyoch owacho ni gise puodho ranyiny mat pimo moromo 40 ma koro ibiro tiyo go gi jononro, jotelo mag kembe kod jok mamoko manie kiwango mar ngiyo kaka tich tiyore, joma tiego ji, joma ngiyo kunde ma okethore e tudruok mar mbuyi mondo obed keyo wach kod gengo njore ma itimo kuonde go mondo omi joma tiyo gi yor mbuyi kik weche gi wuok oko kuom joma ok owinjore yud gi.

en: The new standards outline various techniques and methods for securing corporate information by an individual or managers charged with the responsibility of ensuring institutional data is safe.
luo: Chike manyien go onyiso maber yore ma opogore opogore ma inyalo yud go maling ling koa kuom bede Piny Owacho, ma omi ngato kata jotelo man gi tich mar neno ni weche ma gi yudo ok owuok ooko ahoyaye.

en: Consumers are increasingly adopting digital technology, the data generated creates both an opportunity for enterprises to improve customer engagement and a responsibility to keep it safe.
luo: Jogo ma dwaro tiyo gi gik ma opogore opogore sani koro tiyo gi yor mbuyi kendo wach ma giyudo miyo gi thuolo mar wuoyo kod jo ngiepo mag gi kendo mar kano weche ma gin go e yoo ma opandore.

en: "The new guidelines provide a robust system to fight against cybersecurity threats, breach of privacy and other information security measures to ensure that Confidentiality, Integrity and Authenticity (CIA) of information is maintained during the creation, usage, storage and transfer of information,” says Bernard Njiraini, Managing Director, KEBS.
luo: “Chike ma nyien go miyo nigi yore mabeyo mar kedo gi njore mar joma tiyo gi yor mbuyi, golo weche ngato ooko kata wach moro machielo ma miyo ji bedo kod siri, kido maber kod weche ma oriere tir e seche ma imanyo, itiyo kendo ikano wach ma ngato oyudo”. Mano ne owachi gi Migosi Bernard Njiraini ma en jatelo maduong mar migawo ma pimo gik ma oloso ka jopiny pok otiyo kodgi mondo gine ni onge gima rach.

en: “We are working with like-minded partners, to make sure that the international order that governs cyber is fit for purpose,” he said.
luo: “Watiyo gi jogo ma wan go gi paro machal mar neno ni piny mangima orito weche matek ne jo njore.” Migosi Dominic Raab ne owacho kamano.

en: “We want to see international law respected in cyberspace, just as we would anywhere else. And we need to show how the rules apply to these changes in technology, the changes in threats, and the systemic attempts to render the internet a lawless space.”
luo: “Wadwaro neno ni chik ma rito weche njore e piny ma ngima omi luor mana kaka de watimo kamoro amora machielo. Kendo owinjore wanyis kaka chike gi tiyo e yor gik ma itiyo go sani; lokruok kuom buok ma jo njore chiwo kod yoregi ma gitemo mondo omi wach tiyo gi yor mbuyi obed kama onge chik ma tayo.”

en: The Kenya Bankers Association (KBA), a lobby group for local banks has noted a significant shift in bank customer preferences for digital services which, according to the association’s Customer Satisfaction Survey of 2020, stood at 43 per cent.
luo: Riwruok mar jo bank ma iluongo ni The Kenya Bankers Association (KBA), owacho ni gise neno ka sani joma keno kodgi ohero tiyo gi weche tudruok gi ogwe yamo kata yor mbuyi. Kaluwore gi nonro mane gitimo e higa 2020, joma sani tiyo go yore manyien go romo 43 e wi 100.
mt0: KBA, a lobby group for local banks, acknowledged a significant shift in bank customer preferences for digital services which, according to the association’s Customer Satisfaction Survey of 2020, stood at 43 per cent.

en: "While the banking industry's digital resilience has continued to promote continuity in the financial services sector, rising cases of fraud need to be addressed further through consumer education", says Habil Olaka, Chief Executive Officer, KBA.
luo: “Kata obedo ni tiyo gi yore masani go omiyo tich dhi maber e od ute keno, bedruok mar weche mag miganga owinjore one kaka ikedo go ka imiyo jokeno puonj maber.” Ma ne owachi gi jatelo mar riwruok mar jo bank no Migosi Habil Alaka.
mt0: "While the banking industry's digital resilience has continued to promote continuity in the financial services sector, rising cases of fraud need to be addressed further through consumer education," says Habil Olaka, Chief Executive Officer, KBA.

en: "Monitoring fraud trends is critical as it enables stakeholders to identify awareness gaps and ensure the security of consumer monies is guaranteed," he said.
luo: “Nono yore ma jo njore tiyogo en gima duong nikech ma ema biro miyo wangeyo rode ma onego wadin mondo mi wa ne ni pesa mar jopiny ma gikano e bank ok nyal lal.” Ne owacho kamano.
mt0: "Monitoring fraud trends is critical as it enables stakeholders to identify awareness gaps and ensure the security of consumer monies is guaranteed," he said.

en: A local airline will offer cheap transport services between Nairobi and Kisumu.
luo: Kambi moro mar ndeke biro chiwo bei ma yot mar idho ndege e kind Nairobi gi Kisumu.

en: The 748 Air Services will make trips twice daily between Jomo Kenyatta International Airport (JKIA) and Kisumu International Airport.
luo: Kambi ma iluongo ni The 748 Air Services biro wuodho diriyo ekind paw ndege ma Jomo Kenyatta International Airport (JKIA) gi paw ndege ma Kisumu International Airport.

en: The airline’s Managing Director Moses Mwangi and Chairman Ahmed Jibril said passengers on the route would pay Sh10,700 for a return ticket.
luo: Jatelo ma tayo kambino Migosi Moses Mwangi kod Jakom mar kambino miluongo ni Ahmed Jibril nyocha owacho ni jowuoth man e yoo no biro chulo alufu apar gi mia abiriyo kuom otiko mar dhi kod duogo.
mt0: airline's Managing Director Moses Mwangi and Chairman Ahmed Jibril said passengers on the route would pay Sh10,700 for a return ticket.

mt0: According to the shipping company, Lamu will serve as a gateway to Eastern Kenya, South Sudan and Ethiopia when the port will be fully operational.

en: The other Lapsset projects yet to be implemented are international airports, railway line, highway, resort cities, oil pipeline and an oil refinery.
luo: Gik ma chenro mar riwruok ma Lapsett opango timo gin kaka gero paw ndege maduong, ndach reru, ndara ma mitokni ringe, udi ma jowuoth nyalo chieme kendo ninde, olalo mar moo kendo kama ichange moo.
mt0: 其他 Lapsset projects yet to be implemented are international airports, railway line, highway, resort cities, oil pipeline and an oil refinery.

en: In March 2012, former President Mwai Kibaki performed the groundbreaking ceremony for the Lapsset project at the present Lamu Port.
luo: E dwe mar adek 2012, ker machon mar Kenya Mwai Kibaki ne obede chieng’ mane ochak ger dho wadh gowo mar meli ma Lamu.
mt0: 只係在三月 2012, 前總統 Mwai Kibaki 在現今的拉姆港的 Lapsset project foundation ceremony 上進行了。

en: The first cargo ship Alianco offloads containers at the Lamu Port after President Uhuru Kenyatta launched the port last week.
luo: Meli mokongo ma otingo misigo ma iluongo ni Alianco nyo ogolo apipni ma otingo mwandu bang ka ker Ohuru Kenyatta nyocha otimo limbe kanyo chieng ma dho wadh chumbino ochake tich juma ma okalo.

en: The government will have the authority to restrict Kenyans’ access to certain websites if the new law that could stoke up opposition from anti-censorship advocates sails through.
luo: Piny owacho biro bedo gi teko mar tamo jo Kenya mondo kik dhi kuonde mnitie e gedo mar yor mbuyi – Internet – ka oponi chik ma nyalo kelo ywaruok e kind sirikal kod joma makwedo weche ma kamago opuodhi mondo oti e Kenya.

en: According to proposals in the Computer Misuse and Cybercrimes (Amendment) Bill, 2021, the government can classify certain websites as inaccessible from Kenya and recommend their access be blocked.
luo: Kaluwore gi weche ma ondike e chik mar tiyo marach gi gir ndiko kod somo ma iluongo ni computer kod timo kosa gi tiyo gi yoo mbuyi ma iloso 2021, Piny Owacho nyalo keto moko kuom udi ma oger e yoo mbuyi mondo kik jo Kenya ng’i kendo sirikal nyalo wacho ni mondo kuonde ma kamago olor.
mt0: According to proposals in the Computer Misuse and Cybercrimes (Amendment Bill, 2021), the government can classify certain websites as inaccessible from Kenya and recommend their access be blocked.

en: The Bill which was submitted to the National Assembly last week further proposes a Sh20 million fine or 25-year prison sentence for the possession or distribution of pornographic material.
luo: Chik ni, ma nyocha oor e od bura ma duong ma Kenya – parliament e juma ma okalo, dwaro ni ngat ma oyudi ka nigo kendo keyo weche mag hera mondo ochul pesa mar keth ma kamano maromo tara gana 20,000,000 kata yudo kuom mar twech e jela mar higni 25.
mt0: 如果你不知道,就说你不知道。 上周提交的法案还提议了20 万英镑的罚款或25 年的监禁。

en: “The principal object of this Bill is to amend the Computer Misuse and Cybercrimes Act, No. 5 of 2018 to provide for the prohibition against the sharing of pornography through the Internet,” notes the amendments in the Bill proposed by Garissa MP Adan Duale.
luo: “Gima duong ma chik ma nyien ni dwaro timo en ni mondo oloki chik ma chon mar tiyo kod computer marach kod ketho chik sama ngato tiyo gi yoo mbuyi ma en chik namba 5 mane okale e higa 2018 mondo mi omed rido matek ne joma keyo picha mag jogo man duge ka okalo e yoo mbuyi – internet – mondo ji one.” Mano e gima loko chik no wacho e kwayo mar ja chung’ ma od bura ma Garissa Moluor Adan Duale.
mt0: “The principal object of this Bill is to amend the Computer Misuse and Cybercrimes Act, No. 5 of 2018 to provide for the prohibition against the sharing of pornography through the Internet,” notes the amendments in the Bill proposed by Garissa MP Adan Duale.

en: “The Bill also seeks to provide an additional function of the National Computer and Cybercrimes Coordination Committee which is to recommend websites that may be rendered inaccessible within the country.”
luo: Lokruok e chik machon no dwaro ni omed jogo ma biro neno ni chik no tiyo teko machielo mar chiwo nying’ mag kuonde ma owinjore olor – websites - nikech gi nyiso picha maricho mondo kik jopiny ne weche ma kamago.
mt0: “The Bill also seeks to provide an additional function of the National Computer and Cybercrimes Coordination Committee which is to recommend websites that may be rendered inaccessible within the country.”

en: The amendments come months after the Court of Appeal struck out a petition to suspend 26 controversial sections in the law enacted in 2018.
luo: Loko chik no timore kuom dweche bang’ ka od bura ne owito oko dwaro ni 26 kuom chik machon no mane ochako tiyo 2018 ma jomoko ne neno ni rach ka itiyo go e piny Kenya.
mt0: amendments come months after the Court of Appeal struck out a petition to suspend 26 controversial sections in the law enacted in 2018.

en: The Bloggers Association of Kenya, Law Society of Kenya, Article 19 and Kenya Union of Journalists sought a stay of execution until an appeal against the law heard.
luo: Riwruok mar jogo ma tiyo gi yoo mbuyi, riwruok mar joma osomo chike e Kenya, riwruok mar chik 19 kod riwruok jo fwap weche ma Kenya ne dwaro ni ngado bura mar wach chik ni mondo oket thenge nyaka dwaro mar jogo ma odonjo go owinji ma ngad buche.

en: In an affidavit to support their case, the Law Society of Kenya Chief Executive Mercy Wambua cites cases where specific individuals had been arrested under the law accused of disseminating false information in respect to Covid-19 related deaths.
luo: Riwruok mar jogo ma tiyo gi yoo mbuyi, riwruok mar joma osomo chike e Kenya, riwruok mar chik 19 kod riwruok jo fwap weche ma Kenya ne dwaro ni ngado bura mar wach chik ni mondo oket thenge nyaka dwaro mar jogo ma odonjo go owinji ma ngad buche.

en: “The arrest, arraignment and prosecution for Covid-19 related publications under the statute is likely to have a chilling effect," stated Ms Wambua in her affidavit.
luo: Meko, tero ngato e od bura kendo keto ne bura kuom ndiko weche mag Corona e bwo chik mane okal higa 2018 no, biro miyo ji luoro.” Nyadendi Wambua ne owacho e burua mar kuongruok mane okete lwete no.
mt0: “The arrest, arraignment and prosecution for Covid-19 related publications under the statute is likely to have a chilling effect,” stated Ms Wambua in her affidavit.

en: “Bloggers, activists, journalists and whistleblowers will be discouraged from publishing information on a suspected violation of the Ministry of Health Covid-19 guidelines - with grave public health consequences.”
luo: “Joma ndiko e mbuyi, joma ochung’ ne ratiro mar dhano, jo fwap weche kod keyo kachiel gi jogo ma di dwar ulo weche matimore maricho ei piny ok bi bedo kod chir mar ndiko weche ma gingeyo kuom ketho chike mag rito ngima ma Migawo Mar Ngima – Ministry of Health - ne ogolo ma nyalo kelo chandruok maduong e piny.”
mt0: “Bloggers, activists, journalists and whistleblowers will be discouraged from publishing information on a suspected violation of the Ministry of Health Covid-19 guidelines - with grave public health consequences.”

en: However, the government has defended the law noting that criminalisation of the acts described is an exercise of the State’s duty to care to its citizenry.
luo: Kata kamano, Piny Owacho ne otemo siro chik no ka giwacho ni keto ndiko machal kamano bedo richo en tich mar sirikal mar rito jopiny.
mt0: 但政府已辩护法律, 指出犯罪行为被描述为国家公民的义务。

en: “Increased access to the internet and exposure to online risks and insecurity associated with cyberspace is a pressing concern not just in Kenya but the world over,” said Inspector General of Police Hilary Mutyambai in an affidavit.
luo: “Medruok mar somo weche ma ondiki e mbuyi kendo bedo ni ji mangeny nyalo tim negi marach e yor tiyo gi weche mag mbuyi gin weche ma chando chuny jopiny; ok Kenya ka kende to piny mangima.”
mt0: Increase in access to the internet and exposure to online risks and insecurity associated with cyberspace is a pressing concern not just in Kenya but the world over, said Inspector General of Police Hilary Mutyambai in an affidavit.

en: The law further criminalises the spreading of information the State deems as radicalising in nature.
luo: Chik no bende oketo ni en kosa mar keyo wach ma sirikal neno ni nyalo loko pach jopiny e yoo marach.
mt0: 只係要知道。 這條法只係嚴厲地禁止傳播信息, 因為政府認為這種信息是「反對主義的」。

en: If approved, it would give the State more control over blocking of content by online users.
luo: Ka oponi okale, chik no biro miyo Piny owacho teko kuom loro gima jopiny tiyo go e mbuyi.
mt0: 如果批准,这会给政府更多控制权,比如网站用户屏蔽内容。

en: Plans are underway to construct a 181-kilometer dual carriageway between Rironi in Limuru and Mau Summit, Nakuru.

en: A joint team from Kenya National Highway Authority (KeNHA), Nakuru County engineers and physical planners made a tour of the much-awaited highway.
luo: Jo tich ma oriwore ma oa bad sirikal ma ochuungne loso yore madongo e Kenya ka - Kenya National Highway Authority (KeNHA), jogo ma osomo gero yore ma tiyo gi sirikal mar gweng’ ma Nakuru kod jogo ma osomo weche mag pimo kaka gedo owinjore obedi kamoro amora e piny nyocha odhi owuotho e kama owinjore ogere wang’ayo no.
mt0: Joint team from Kenya National Highway Authority (KeNHA), Nakuru County engineers and physical planners made a tour of the much-awaited highway.

en: It was revealed that a toll station will be set up at Gilgil Weigh Bridge and another at Salgaa centre.

mt0: a toll station will be set up at Gilgil Weigh Bridge and another at Salgaa centre.

en: Engineer Kefa Seda, the project manager, said the county will be required to share its traffic circulation so that it is integrated in the highway construction.
luo: Chalno ma osomo weche mag gero ndara Jagedo Kefa Seda ma e ngat ma ochungne gero ndarano nyocha owacho ni piny Nakuru ibiro dwaro ni oke kaka mitoki ringoe mondo otude gi wang’ayo ma idwa ger manyien no.
mt0: 工程師凱法沙達, 項目經理, 說, 州會必須分享其交通流量, 以便在道路工程中融入。

en: Manufacturers can only get Value Added Tax (VAT) refunds on unsold stock.
luo: Kembe maloso gik moko inyalo mana duok negi chudo mar osuru e gik ma ok gi uso.

en: This follows a High Court ruling against a petition by three drug manufacturers.
luo: Ma e kaka   nyocha ongad bura gi duond od bura ma malo e Kenya – High Court of Kenya – bang’ kembe adek ma loso yedhe tero wach no e od bura.
mt0: 此後,一審法院裁決三家藥物製造商的訴訟。

en: High Court Judge Weldon Korir, while dismissing the petition, noted that the manufacturers had not indicated the unsold stock on which they claimed a refund of VAT input tax.
luo: Jayalo mar od bura ma malo e Kenya Wedon Korir ka wito oko Burano, nyocha owacho ni kembe ma loso yedhe go ne ok olero kar romb yedhe ma ok ne uso mane gidwaro ni mondo kik gi chul negi osuru mar uso gik moko – Value Added Tax (VAT).
mt0: Supreme Court Judge Weldon Korir, while dismissing the petition, noted that the manufacturers had not indicated the unsold stock on which they claimed a refund of VAT input tax.

en: Previously known as sales tax, VAT is levied at consumption at a maximum rate of 16 per cent.
luo: Chon ne iluongo ni chulo osuru kuom gima ousi – Sales Tax, VAT sani idwaro ni ichulo gi jo ngiepo kum pesa ma Kenya moromo 16 e wi 100.
mt0: 只係在銷售稅的名稱之前, 銷售稅在消費上課徵, 最高稅率是 16 %。

en: “They merely indicated figures which may have included sold stock and this may be unfair and unjust enrichment on their part since the inclusion of sold stock in the figures would mean that the petitioners would benefit by getting input tax relief from the first respondent - Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) - for tax already passed on to consumers,” said Justice Korir in his May 31 ruling.
luo: Ne gi chiwo mana kwan mane nyalo riwo gik mane gise uso; to ma ok ne bi bedo maber nikech jogo ne ibiro duok negi pesa kuom gik mane gise uso ka oa kuom bad Piny Owacho ma choko osuru – Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) mane jo ngiepo ochulo sirikal.”  Jayalo maduong Korir ne ongado bura kamano e ndiko mare mar dwe mar Abich Tarik 31.

en: Refunding VAT paid for raw materials has been a subject of numerous litigation between the taxman and taxpayers, with the government allocating Sh10 billion for the payment of “verified” VAT refund claims.
luo: Duoko osuru ma ochul ne gik ma kembe tiyo go ose kelo ywaruok e kind KRA kod jo sol osuru ka Piny Owacho oketo thenge pesa maromo tara gana 10,000,000 mar duoko pesa osuru mar VAT ma sirikal oneno ni ‘owinjore’ oduoki.

en: Universal Corporation Ltd, Elys Chemical Industries Ltd and Dawa Ltd had on December 5, 2017, petitioned the court to declare that they were entitled to VAT refunds, which they had paid for the raw materials bought for their supplies that had until September 2015 had been tax-exempt.
luo: Kembe ma iluongo ni Universal Corporation Ltd, Elys Chemical Industries Ltd kod Dawa Ltd tarik 5.12.2017 ne odhiye e od bura ma Kenya ka gikwayo ni mondo od bura ongadi ni owinjore oduok negi osuru mar uso gik moko – VAT mane gichulo ka gi ngiewo gik ma gitiyo go mane chon nyaka dwe mar ochiko 2015 ne ok gi chul ne osuru.
mt0: 只係你唔知。 Universal Corporation Ltd, Elys Chemical Industries Ltd, and Dawa Ltd 於十二月五日, 向法院申請了退稅, 他們付的原材料買到他們的供應商, 他們在九月十五日以前, 免稅。

en: A tax-exempt item is not part of any tax calculations, which is why the manufacturers could not claim input tax.
luo: Gik ma ok chul ne gi osuru ok gogo kwan mar chulo osuru, mano ema omiyo kembe ma loso gik moko go ne ok nyal dwaro mondo oduok negi osuru mane gi chulo e yoo ma owinjore.
mt0: 只係要知道。 如果不可以, 就說你不知道。 如果不可以, 就說你不知道。

en: If a good or business is “exempt”, the government doesn’t tax the sale of the good, but producers cannot claim a credit for the VAT they pay on inputs to produce it.
luo: Ka gimoro kata kambi ok owinjore ochul osuru, sirikal ok kaw osuru kuom gigo ma giuso. Kata kamano, kembe ok oyie negi kwayo ni mondo oduok negi osuru ma gise chulo kuom gik ma gitiyogo e loso gik ma giuso.
mt0: 如果一个产品或生意是“免税”的,政府不征收销售的商品,但生产商不能获得用于生产商品的VAT。

en: For a zero-rated good, the government does not tax its sale, but allows credits for the value-added paid on inputs.
luo: Kuom gino ma ok chule osuru, Piny Owacho ok kwa osuru kuom uso mare, to ngato oyiene kwayo ni mondo oduok ne pesa mane otiyo go lose.

en: However, the Finance Act of 2015 moved these supplies from a tax-exempt status to zero-rated.
luo: Kata kamano, chik mane Piny Owacho oketo 2015 ma tayo kaka pesa owinjore oti e Kenya ne ogolo gik moko ma iuso ka oaye gik ma owenegi chulo osuru ka tero gi kuom gik ma owinjore oti go nono maonge chulo osuru.
mt0: 但, 2015 年的财政法将这些供应从免税的地位移到零评级。

en: A section of the VAT Act, 2013 stipulated that wherein future legislation the exempt supplies become taxable after a person had incurred input VAT, the person could claim VAT as long as the claim is lodged within three months from the date the exempt supply become zero-rated.
luo: Kamoro e chik mar chulo osuru mar uso gik moko – VAT mane olosi 2013 wacho ni chike ma ibiro losi bange manyalo dwaro ni osuru mondo ochul kuom gima ngato ose chule osuru sama ilose, ngato nyalo kwayo sirikal – KRA mondo oduok ne osuru mane ochulono ka dweche adek pok orumo chakre ne keti ni gima chalo kamano koro onge osuru ma ichulo ne.

en: “Parliament was clear that it did not want taxpayers to recover reliefs from supplies that had already been made and which were previously exempt supplies,” said Justice Korir.
luo: Jang'ad bura Korir ne owacho, “Od bura ma loso chike e Kenya ne olero ni ne ok gidwar jo sol osuru mondo oduok negi pesa mane owene kuom gik ma gise uso mane sirikal oweyo kawe osuru."

en: It is noted that zero-rated products are cheaper for consumers since the suppliers are allowed to claim the cost of input tax and not pass it to consumers as is the case with exempt supplies.
luo: Nenore ni gik ma ok chulne gi osuru bech gi yot ne jo ngiepo nikech Piny Owacho oyie dwoko ne jo uso osuru mane gichulo kuom gik maka mago ma ok gi medo e nengo mar jo ngiepo mondo ochul kaka timore gi osuru ma sirikal oweyo kawo kuom gik mamoko ma iuso.

en: KRA had rejected the petitioners’ claim because they lodged it outside of the right period, which is three months since the law took effect on June 15, 2015.

en: iTax is a self-service system that enables taxpayers to conduct tax business such as personal identification number (PIN) registration, tax payment, ledger maintenance, application for tax compliance certificates and waiver application, among others.
luo: iTax en chenro ma ngato timo gimoro amora kende. Ma miyo jo sol osuru timo weche mag chiwo duoko kaka ng'ato osolo osuru machalo – dwaro namba ma ichiwo gi KRA – PIN, chulo osuru, neno ni ikano weche ni mag solo osuru maber, dwaro barua ma nyiso ni ise bedo ka ichulo osuru maber, kwayo mondo oweni chulo osuru gi mamoko.

en: This paves the way for the company’s expansion into Ethiopia, which has massive opportunities for growth owing to its over 112 million population.

en: This comes following a decision by the Ethiopian government to award the bid for a second nationwide telecommunication licence to a consortium that includes Safaricom and parent companies Vodacom Group of South Africa and Vodafone Group of UK.
luo: Ma otimore bang’ Piny Owacho ma Ethopia nyocha oneno ni gichiw barua mar ariyo mar medo keyo ongwe yamo e piny no ne riwruok mar kembe mag ogwe yamo ma achiel kuom gi en Safaricom kanyakla gi kembe mane onyuole - Vodacom Group mar South Africa kod Vodafone Group man UK.
mt0: Ethiopian government announced a decision to award the second nationwide telecommunication licence to a consortium that includes Safaricom and parent companies Vodacom Group of South Africa and Vodafone Group of UK.

en: “The Ministry of Finance and the Ethiopian Communications Authority warmly welcome the award of one new telecommunication licence to the Global Partnership for Ethiopia, a private consortium of Safaricom (Kenya), Vodafone Group (UK), Vodacom Group (South Africa), DCD Group (UK) and Sumitomo Corporation (Japan) and Development Finance Cooperation (DFC) today,” said the country’s minister of finance in a statement yesterday.
luo: Migawo ma ochung'ne weche omuom e Ethopia kod bad sirikand no ma ochung ne weche mag tudruok e yor mbuyi nyo orwako gi mor chiwo barua mar tich ne riwruok machielo manyien ma olosi gi kembe ong'we yamo ma giluongo ni Global Partnership for Ethiopia ma otingo Safaricom (Kenya), Vodafone Group (UK), Vodacom Group (South Africa), DCD Group (UK) kod Sumitomo Corporation (Japan) ka achiel gi  Development Finance Cooperation (DFC) kawuono.” Ma nyo owachi gi minista mar pesa e piny Ethopia e barua ma burua ma nyo kete koke.

en: “Global Partnership for Ethiopia is a consortium of reputable telecom companies providing service to over 750 million customers all over the world and committed to create new jobs, support the economy through introduction of new and efficient services,” said Ethiopia Communications Authority (ECA) Director General Balcha Reba.

en: “Under these licences, service providers will have the right to provide any telecommunication service, including voice, text and data using any technology whether fixed or wireless anywhere within Ethiopia and to send and receive telecommunications to and from outside Ethiopia,” said the authority in its call for bids.

en: Police in Nairobi are searching for a senior prisons officer implicated in a Sh200 million fake jobs racket.

en: The officer is said to have conned hundreds of desperate job seekers of their hard-earned cash, in the pretext that they could help them secure jobs in Government.

en: DCI chief George Kinoti said the senior Prisons officer had been conducting the con game for the last 10 months.

mt0: DCI chief George Kinoti said the senior prisons officer had been conducting the con game for the last 10 months.

en: On Friday, officers from the DCI headquarters raided the suspect's home in Nairobi and recovered hundreds of fake job offer letters.
luo: Chieng tich Abich, polise ma oa e ofis maduong mar DCI ne odhi apoya e dala mar achich no man Nairobi ma ne giyudo barupe mang’eny mag miriambo moluong go ji e tiche ma opogore opogore.
mt0: 只係要知道。 星期五, 警察從DCI總部的人員在該嫌疑人的家裏搜查,並找到數百封假工作邀請信。

en: Also recovered from the house of the suspect are fake dollars amounting to Sh2.4 million.
luo: Polis bende ne oyudo e od achich no dollar mar jo America ma ok adieri maromo million ariyo gi mia agwen. Ksh 2.4 million.
mt0: 只喺度翻譯。 如果唔知, 就說你唔知。

en: Kinoti said the racket also involved other junior officers, including a driver.
luo: Kinoti ne owacho ni wach mar wuondo ji e yor manyo tich no ne nitie jomoko bende mane tiyo gi achich maduong no mane oriwo nyaka jariemb mitoka.
mt0: Kinoti said the racket also involved other junior officers, including a driver.

en: The driver is said to have pocketed Sh5.7 million from unsuspecting job seekers, who were required to pay between Sh300,000 and Sh400,000 to secure jobs.
luo: Wachore ni ja riambo no ne okawo pesa maromo million 5 kod mia 7 (5.7 Million) kuom joma dwaro tich mane idwaro ni ochul pesa mar manyo tich mane bedo e kind alufu 300,000 gi alufu 400,000.
mt0: 只係說你不知道。 如果不能翻譯, 就說你不知道。

en: The suspects are said to have promised to help the job seekers secure jobs with, among other organisations, the National Police Service, National Intelligence Service (NIS), Kenya Ports Authority (KPA) and other government parastatals.
luo: Achich go wachore ni ne osingo ne joma dwaro tich go mar yudo tich gi jo polis - National Police Service, jo okach kich - National Intelligence Service (NIS), kod joma tiyo e dho nam - Ports Authority (KPA).
mt0: suspects claim to have promised to help job seekers secure jobs with, among other organisations, the National Police Service, National Intelligence Service (NIS), Kenya Ports Authority (KPA) and other government parastatals.

en: Kinoti said one victim, a woman, was from Kiambu.
luo: Kinoti nyocha owacho ni ngama ne gi mayo no ne en mama moro ma odak Kiambu.
mt0: Kinoti says one victim, a woman, was from Kiambu.

en: She claims to have been conned of Sh800,000 and promised that her three children would secure jobs at the National Health Insurance Fund, Nairobi Metropolitan Services and the Kenya Ports Authority.
luo: Ne owacho ni ne omaye alufu mia aboro (800,000) kane osing’ ne ni obiro ndik ne yowuote adek ibiro yud negi tiche ka National Health Insurance Fund, Nairobi Metropolitan Services and the Kenya Ports Authority.

en: The woman however reported the matter to the police after the contacts failed to respond to her calls and claimed that the job offers had been affected by Covid-19 restrictions.
luo: Mama no ne otero wach no ka polis ka koro jok mane konye no ok mak simbe, ka giwacho ni tije ma nyocha yawuote owinjore odhiye go koro ok nyal tomore nikech wach mar corona.
mt0: 但她在电话中没有收到回复,并声称他们被疫情限制了。

en: Kinoti said the complainant filed a report with the police in January and investigations began.
luo: Kinoti ne owacho ni Mama no ne ondiko ripot gi polis dwe mar Achiel 2021 mane nonro mar wach no ne ochakore.
mt0: Kinoti said the complainant filed a report with the police in January and investigations began.

en: Another group of victims who had paid huge amounts of cash to secure jobs were treated to drama when they were taken to the Jomo Kenyatta International Airport for a familiarisation tour.
luo: Joma moko maromo ji 60 ma bende ne ochulo pesa mang’eny mondo oyud tich, ne omi kiach ka ne oter gi e pao ndege ma Jomo Kenyatta International Airport mondo gine kama gidhi tiye.
mt0: Another group of victims who had paid huge amounts of cash to secure jobs were treated to drama when they were taken to the Jomo Kenyatta International Airport for a familiarisation tour.

en: During the visit to JKIA, close to 60 victims were taken around what they were made to believe would be their new workstation.
luo: Seche mane gidhi kanyo, dhano ma kwan gi ne nyalo romo 60 ne owuoth go e pao ndege ka inyiso gi ni kanyo e kama gi thi tiye.
mt0: 在JKIA的访问中,近60名受害者被带到他们认为他们新工作的新工作场所。

en: They also received a lecture from a person alleged to be from the human resource department.
luo: Ne owuo kodi gi ngat ma ne owach negi ni ne tiyo kama indiko e ji e pao ndege kanyo.
mt0: 他们还收到了来自人力资源部门的教授的讲课。

en: They were then directed to report to their new work station March 18, 2021.
luo: Bang'e ne okone gi ni mondo gi dhiye e tich Tarik 18 dwe mar Adek 2021.
mt0: 他们被迫于三月十八日报告他们的新工作站。

en: However, that would be the last time they heard from the person who helped them secure their jobs.
luo: Kata kamano, mano e saa mogik mane gi winjo e wach ma oa kuom jalo mane konyo gi manyo tich.
mt0: 但那会是他们最后一次听到那个帮助他们找到工作的人。

en: “Dejected victims have since been trooping to our headquarters to file reports detailing how they unbelievably fell for the tricksters machinations," Kinoti said on Twitter.
luo: Jogo mane chuny go ongawore go ose bed ka biro e ofiswa ma dunong’ ndiko ripot kaka ne owuond gi marach. Kinoti ne owacho kamano e yor mbuyi mar Twitter.
mt0: “Dejected victims have since been trooping to our headquarters to file reports detailing how they unbelievably fell for the tricksters machinations,” Kinoti said on Twitter.

en: One crisp morning five years ago, armed with Sh500, 29-year old Nelson Mandela embarked on a fashion design journey.
luo: Chieng’ moro gi okinyi higi abich ma okalo, ka en gi shilling 500 kende, ja hig ni 29 Nelson Mandela ne odhi e wuoth mar ngiyo yor  rwakruok.
mt0: 一朝清晨, 带着500元,29岁的尼尔斯·曼德拉开始了时尚设计之旅。

en: Mandela walked into Gikomba market and bought two pairs of shoes each at Sh250.
luo: Mandela ne odhi Kikomba ma ongiwo wuoch tielo ariyo mar shilling 250 moro ka moro.
mt0: 只係要翻譯。 如果不翻譯, 就說你不知道。

en: When he came back to the Central Business district, he sold the shoes at Sh4,500 a pair.
luo: Kane oduogo e dier town mar Nairobi kama ji timo e ohala, ne ouso wuoch nego shilling 4,500 wuoche achiel.
mt0: 当他回到中央商業區時,他賣掉了鞋子,每雙 4,500 元。

en: He was only two years old in Nairobi but seemed like he had identified a niche for himself.
luo: Ne ose dak mana Nairobi higni ariyo to nenore ni ne ose yudo tich ma onyalo timo mar konyruok.
mt0: 佢只係兩歲在奈洛比,但佢看起來已經找到一個niche。

en: He was completing his supply chain management course at Kenya Institute of Management, but here was his heart falling for fashion.
luo: Ne ogik tieko tiegruok mare mar somo ngiewo gik ma itiyo e ofisi kama isome weche mag ohala - Kenya Institute of Management.

en: And the shoes kicked it off perfectly, literally.

mt0: 只在翻译中。 如果不能翻译, 就说你不知道。

en: Buoyed by the returns, Mandela, who later joined a fashion school, started buying and selling shoes to make profits.
luo: Ka en gi ilo nikech ohala ma oyudo e wi wuoche ka wuoche kuom wuoch ariyo mane ouso go, ne omedo ngiewo kendo uso wuoch mondo oyud pesa mar ohala.

en: It was in the process of selling that he found excited clients asking him what outfits could match the shoes.
luo: E kinde mane ouso wuochi gi ema ne oyudo jo ngiepo ma penje kit lewni mane inyalo rwwak gi wuoch go ma owinjore kod gi maber.
mt0: 在卖货过程中,他发现了一群兴奋的客户问他什么衣服可以搭配鞋子。

en: It was time to climb a step higher on the ladder.

en: Mandela seized the opportunity and ventured into cloth production.

en: Now, he owns Logical Clothing, a production house in Kimathi Street’s Eagle House where people order for classy, tailor made outfits.
luo: E seche gi en gi kambi ma iluongo ni Logical Clothing, kama ji twang’e lewni ma nengo gi tek man e ot miluongo ni Eangle House, e wang’a yoo ma Kimathi street, Nairobi.
mt0: Now, he owns Logical Clothing, a production house in Kimathi Street's Eagle House where people order for classy, tailor made outfits.

en: “This is what I wanted from the outset. I started selling shoes and in 2017 and now dealing with clothing. I pursued procurement in college, which I have never used in the field. My drive to make it in the clothing industry has driven me this far,” says the young entrepreneur, crisp in a suit he has made himself.
luo: “Ma e gima ne adwaro chakre chon. Ne achako uso wuoch to ka ochopo higa 2017 nyaka sani to atwang’o lewni. Ne asomo weche mag ngiewo gik moko e school ma ikawe kos ma pok atiyo go nyaka sani. Dwacha mar neno ni adhi maber e tweng’o ema ose kela kama sani antiere ni.” Wuoyi matin ma ja ohala ni ne owacho kamano ka orwako law sut ma otwang’o kende.

en: His suits, which is what he majorly deals in, are priced between Sh13,500 and Sh150,000.
luo: Sude ne ma mano e gima otwang’o mang’eny, ouso e kind shilling alufu 13,500 kod 150,000.
mt0: 只係要知道他的服裝, 這就是他主要的生意。他的服裝價格, 這就是他主要的生意。

en: When a customer orders, he takes two weeks to work on the order and deliver.

mt0: 当顧客订购时,他花两天来工作,然后发货。

en: However, it takes longer with mass orders.
luo: Kata Kamano, kaw ndalo ma okalo kanyo ka oyudo tich mang’eny.

en: “Some of these suits incur huge production costs. A suit I sold for Sh65,000 cost me around Sh50,000 to produce.”

mt0: “Some of these suits incur huge production costs. A suit I sold for Sh65,000 cost me around Sh50,000 to produce.”

en: Mandela, who specialises in corporate suits, wedding suits, events outfits, Ankara dresses for ladies, bridal dresses, khaki pants, and who also sells shoes and shirts, says that one of the most important things that every tailor should have is a production house.
luo: Mandela, ma ng’eny ne loso mana sude mag kembe, arus, lewni mag nyasi, lep mon, lep mon mag arus, lewni matindo mag endni, ma bende uso wuoch kod sede, wacho ni gima duong ma ngama kuocho nyaka bed go en kar tich.

en: “People want a physical location where they can visit to see what is happening and can launch complaints. It gives them confidence in the business.”
luo: “Ji dwaro kama ngato tiye ma ginyalo bire mondo gi ne gima timore kendo gi wach gima gineno ka ok ber negi. Ma miyo gi bedo gi adieri gi tich ma itimo negi.”
mt0: “People want a physical location where they can visit to see what is happening and can launch complaints. It gives them confidence in the business.”

en: In my company, we are all about meeting the deadline and expectations of the customer.
luo: E kambi na, gima watemo timo maduong en neno ni waloso ne joma ng’iewo wa gik ma gidwaro e seche ma idwaro giye kendo loso gi maber kaka dwarore.
mt0: 在我的公司,我们只关注期限和客户的需求。

en: I believe in customer satisfaction, which leads to referrals.

en: A satisfied customer will pass the good news to another potential one, creating a chain.

en: We sell quality clothes; we do not edit photos to promote our brand.

en: Unlike many tailors, he is careful with customers’ money.

en: A running joke in this country goes that unless one supervises his tailor and carries weapons that is threatening enough, the tailor will never deliver.
luo: Ngero mantie e Kenya en ni mondo ngato yud gima odwaro, nyaka eket jatweng’o ka-gi-ka kendo nyaka ibed ni gige lweny ma nyalo buge maber; ka ok kamano, ja twengo ok bi tieko loso ni nanga.

en: “This industry requires discipline. Customers give us money in advance and if one is not disciplined, you will spend the money and end up grappling with unfinished clothes when delivery time comes.”

mt0: “This industry requires discipline. Customers give us money in advance and if one is not disciplined, you will spend the money and end up grappling with unfinished clothes when delivery time comes.”

en: Among many other dignitaries that Mandela has dressed include Migori Governor Okoth Obado, Uriri MP Mike Ogolla, CIC Insurance Group General manager Jack Kionga, Natalie Mukundane (Executive Chairperson at African Youth Commission), King Kaka and the whole Kaka Empire and a lot of MCAs.

en: Ethiopia's telecommunications regulator awarded one operating licence to a consortium led by Kenya's Safaricom and Japan's Sumitomo, Brook Taye, a senior adviser at the Finance Ministry, said on Saturday.
